programme.title: Austin Stevens' Adventures: Hippo Face-off
programme.desc: Out of all the animals in Africa, the most dangerous is surprisingly the Hippopotamus. With huge jaws and canines that can reach 2 feet in length, this adventure will be the most dangerous yet.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Australian Alps
programme.desc: It may come as a surprise to non-Australians that the island continent renowned for its flat plains and searing deserts has snow-capped mountains at all.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Island of the Devil
programme.desc: Just 460,000 people live in Tasmania, an island off the southeast coast of mainland Australia. While its human population is small, the majestic state is rich in natural wonders and is known for its large tracts of pristine wilderness.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Red Desert
programme.desc: In this episode of Wild Places, we join botanist Peter Latz, who believes the biggest influence on the Australian arid landscape has been fire. Years ago, Peter wondered how different this country would have looked like without the influence of it.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Coast of the Whalesharks
programme.desc: On the remote coastline of Australia’s northwest, there are great natural wonders to be found. Above the sea on this sunbaked coast, there is very little; only a sparse landscape shaped by the arid conditions. But here, the miracle reveals itself…

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Rainforest
programme.desc: Daintree National Park is a magical meeting of rainforest and reef, lying at the heart of the world heritage listed wet tropics of Queensland.

programme.title: Snake Boss
programme.desc: Julia is led on an exhausting and not so merry chase by one of the world's most dangerous snakes.

programme.title: Snake Boss
programme.desc: Julia grapples with a massive python, before encountering a lightning fast whip snake and visiting a hospital to talk snake bites.

programme.title: Snake Boss
programme.desc: Johnny has one stinker of a day and Julia teaches us a few things about owning and caring for a lizard before dealing with a deadly trespasser.

programme.title: Snake Boss
programme.desc: Julia rescues a terrified Russian rapper from a neighborhood "gangster", Johnny finds himself in a tug of war with a python and bonny gets her first shot looking for snakes in the field.

programme.title: Snake Boss
programme.desc: Julia is put to the test trying to catch on of Australia's fastest snakes. Barry gives Julia a tough decision to make. A keelback is on the loose. Finally, Johnny and Julia are faced with a grim situation.

programme.title: Snake Boss
programme.desc: Julia rescues a policeman from an unwelcome intruder. Johnny gets to go up against a venomous snake all on his own. And Julia gets to go explore at night in a leech infested forest.

programme.title: Snake Boss
programme.desc: It's touch and go for a python that has been attacked by two dogs; Johnny's artistic side is ignited, and Julia tries to control some misbehaving kids.

programme.title: Snake Boss

programme.title: Snake Boss

programme.title: Snake Boss

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta, a huge emerald oasis in the burning heart of the Kalahari desert, is fed by the Okavango River and this perpetual cycle of wet and dry is the lifeblood of this extraordinary natural Eden.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ngorongoro: Born of Fire
programme.desc: Ngorongoro is thought to have formed about 2.5 million years ago from a large volcano, whose cone collapsed inward after a major eruption. This fertile land is full of wildlife, from cunning hyena and proud lions to vast herds of wildebeest and elephants.

channel.desc: Science lovers, Nature and History buffs: this is your channel! Voyager Documentaries takes you into Earth’s wildest corners, the forbidding realms of deep space, and the dramatic turning points of history.

programme.title: On the Case: Murder at Bird Key

programme.title: On the Case: Profile of a Killer
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman is found murdered in the basement of her brand new home, Police are forced to use cutting edge techniques to solve a terrifying mystery.

programme.title: On the Case: Final Words
programme.desc: A devoted mother returns home from work and finds her 17-year-old daughter has been murdered. Was her killer the mysterious boyfriend she had written about in her journal?

programme.title: On the Case: A Knock on the Door
programme.desc: A beautiful young mother is found murdered in the bedroom of her home. The only witness was her five year old son. Would he be able to help police solve the crime?

programme.title: On the Case: Painful Memories
programme.desc: A young marine comes home and finds his nine month pregnant wife savagely beaten in their bedroom. Was he an innocent victim or could he have been responsible for the terrible crime.

programme.title: On the Case: Snapshot to Murder
programme.desc: A high school student vanishes into thin air during a day studying in the park. Will a photograph from a nearby celebration help solve the case?

programme.title: On the Case: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A small town hair dresser is found beaten and strangled in her beauty salon. After the investigation goes cold, an act of conscience cracks the case.

programme.title: On the Case: Murder at Sunrise
programme.desc: A beautiful young mother is found murdered while walking her dogs. Investigators suspect her killer is someone she knew. Twenty-six years latter police make an arrest but is he the right man?

programme.title: On the Case: The Day After Christmas
programme.desc: A man and his girlfriend are attacked by a mysterious intruder in their home. Despite near fatal wounds, she survives and helps investigators solve the crime.

programme.title: On the Case: One Month of Terror
programme.desc: After abducting a 17 year old girl in front of her home her kidnapper taunts the family with phone calls and disturbing letters. But a tiny mistake will eventually lead police to his door.

programme.title: On the Case: Driven to Kill
programme.desc: A new father comes home to find his infant son and wife missing. Four months later their bodies are found in a remote wooded area. When police investigate the father's past they find the reason for the unthinkable crime.

programme.title: On the Case: A Long Journey To Justice
programme.desc: When a young college student is found murdered on the side of road, it is the start of a tormenting 26 year journey to justice for her family.

channel.desc: Become immersed by fascinating people, oddities, small details, and big facts. Full of insightful and entertaining lifestyle and true crime programmes, reality series full of inspiring characters and fascinating documentaries.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries

channel.desc: Watch classic episodes of Unsolved Mysteries on this eerie channel, Who knows? Perhaps YOU can help solve a mystery...

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 38
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to slingshot a person over the border and onto a mattress?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 39
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a tissue box in the back of a car kill the driver if the car crashes? Is it possible to split an arrow by hitting it with another?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 40
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a person make a parachute with an airplane escape slide? Can a stewardess survive a 33,000-foot fall while still strapped into her seat?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 41
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a person be blown away by a bullet? Can a bullet cause explosive decompression and tear a plane apart? Is running better than walking to keep dry in the rain?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 42
programme.desc: Myths tested: Could the Ancient Chinese have used drums to listen for tunneling invaders? Is the five second rule true?

programme.title: MythBusters: Buster Special
programme.desc: This special episode pays homage to Buster the Crash Test Dummy. Without him, either dozens of myths would have gone untested or Jamie and Adam would constantly be at the local hospital.

programme.title: MythBusters: Ultimate MythBusters Special
programme.desc: Every episode, Jamie and Adam put themselves and their skills to the test in the pursuit of answers to myths. But what do they really do? What attributes do you need to bust a myth?

programme.title: Mythbusters Hollywood Special
programme.desc: It’s lights, camera, action on this special episode of "MythBusters" as Adam and Jamie go Hollywood and pull the curtain back on a few brand new myths straight off the silver screen.

programme.title: Mythbusters Outtakes Special
programme.desc: It’s a shame that not all of the testing footage can be included in the final show that goes to air. In this special episode, the outtakes are in with never-before-seen footage.

programme.title: Mythbusters Revealed Special
programme.desc: The fans are in for a treat with this special episode which opens the archives to the best of the show’s bad takes, flubs and flops, many of which have never been screened before.

programme.title: Mythbusters Shopping Special
programme.desc: Tune in for a comprehensive alternative shoppers guide as the MythBusters show how they procure the weird and wonderful array of stuff they have used in the making of the show.

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 43
programme.desc: Myths tested: Did the Confederates really have a two-stage rocket capable of traveling 100 miles from Richmond to DC?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 44
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can two semi-trucks collide head-on and completely crush a compact car? Can vodka cure foot odor or bad breath?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 45
programme.desc: Myths tested: Do steel toe boots really put toes in more danger than a regular boot, to the extent that the steel toe would chop off the toes? Can bottle rockets be used to launch a human?

channel.desc: MythBusters explodes onto the screen, bringing with it two Hollywood special effects experts Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage & attempt to debunk urban legends. Expect science, experiments, explosions & disasters!

programme.title: The FBI Files: Firefight
programme.desc: In Miami, a gang of robbers targeted banks and armored cars. They carried assault weapons and weren't afraid to use them. They struck during the day, and sometimes twice a day. For awhile, they seemed unstoppable.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Temple of Fear
programme.desc: In Miami, the discovery of a mutilated body sent investigators on the trail of a deadly cult. But agents found a wall of silence around the cult's members. Potential witnesses, terrified of reprisals, refused to talk.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Family Secrets
programme.desc: A woman and her infant son vanish. The husband is frantic. The clues are scarce, but hopes linger, even as the hours and days tick by without a word. Was she on the run, or the victim of foul play?

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Secrets
programme.desc: Two young boys were the only witnesses to their mother's murder. The horrible crime appeared unmotivated, senseless and random.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Crazy Don
programme.desc: To the FBI, he was believed to be the boss of New York's most powerful mafia organization: the Genovese crime family. Was Gigante crazy or was his behavior a shrewd attempt to disguise his position as a ruthless mafia boss?

programme.title: The FBI Files: Backstage Murder
programme.desc: In the 1980's, two partners created a nightclub that would bring them wealth and international fame. The male strip club phenomenon promised female patrons fun and excitement. But the bright lights hid a dark side.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Predator
programme.desc: In the early 1990's, Washington, D.C., became the murder capital of the nation. Few were left untouched by gang violence, which was ignited by the drug trade. By 1994, that violence would strike at the very heart of law enforcement.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: In the early 1990's, a serial killer stalked lone victims in the dead of night, his hunting ground the suburbs of Washington, D.C., his target, anyone who owned a car.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Without Remorse
programme.desc: A small town without any crime was turned inside out by the arrival of one dangerous stranger. Some killers are cold and calculating; others are impulsive, unpredictable, and hard to pin down.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Dead Run
programme.desc: In Pennsylvania, an inmate escaped with the help of his female accomplice. Following a trail of fraudulent credit card receipts and deaths, authorities track the pair, but always find themselves one step behind.

programme.title: The FBI Files: No Remorse
programme.desc: A burning body in a dark alley shed light on a cold-blooded killer. His partners in crime would tell the story, if they lived. In the underworld of the drug trade, even a childhood friend can quickly become an enemy.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Bank robbery is a brazen yet simple crime. A mask, a gun, a note passed to a teller. But bank burglary is different. It takes skill to disable an alarm, to penetrate a locked vault.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Shattered Shield
programme.desc: In a city awash in narcotics the drug lords have all the power even over the police. Corruption in New Orleans grew like cancer, eating away at public safety and threatening to destroy the city. Crooked cops break the laws they were sworn to uphold.

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Ferris Wheel, Fear Factor Pizza, Water Platform
programme.sub-title: A Ferris Wheel, Fear Factor Pizza, Water Platform
programme.desc: Contestants play a game tossing pizza pans into big pots to determine which horrifying toppings will be on their pizza, then balance on a spinning wheel in this episode.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Bobbing In Blood,Tomato Hornworm,Skunk Crawl
programme.desc: Contestant bobs in tank of cow blood trying to retrieve as many dive rings. Contestants throw darts to determine the number of hornworms that they will eat. The contestant crawls through dark tunnels and retrieves 3 dead skunks.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Vertical Two Square, Eel Tan, Heli Rodeo
programme.sub-title: Vertical Two Square, Eel Tan, Heli Rodeo
programme.desc: In one stunt, the contestant will be placed on a 30 foot truss structure. Contestant moves electric eels from one side of tank to the other. In another stunt, the contestant will be seated on a barrel hung by 20 foot long cables underneath a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Save Your Spouse, Roach Transfer, Couples Hang
programme.sub-title: Save Your Spouse, Roach Transfer, Couples Hang
programme.desc: Contestants will be placed in a Plexiglas cabinet. One person retrieves roaches using only their mouth and transfers it to their partner's mouth, who in turn drops it into another bin.

programme.title: Fear Factor: All Animal Clip Show
programme.desc: This 30 minute clip show had highlights from animal stunts featured in the first three seasons of Fear Factor.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Helicopter Slalom, Piercing,Maggoty Cheese, Flag Snag II
programme.sub-title: A Helicopter Slalom, Piercing,Maggoty Cheese, Flag Snag II
programme.desc: Contestants must stand on the bottom rung of a ladder attached to a helicopter. One contestant eats a bowl of smelly cheese covered in maggots.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Heli Boat Drag, Mechanical Bull, Window Washer
programme.sub-title: Heli Boat Drag, Mechanical Bull, Window Washer
programme.desc: A contestant must climb out of a helicopter and down a 20 foot rope. A contestant rides a mechanical bull to determine what bull parts they will eat.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Inverted Water Hang, Fish Quicksand, Tanker Truck Surfing
programme.sub-title: A Inverted Water Hang, Fish Quicksand, Tanker Truck Surfing
programme.desc: In one exciting stunt, the contestant is hung upside down under the belly of a helicopter hovering over water. Another stunt has a contestant enter a large tank of water and fish scales.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Flatbed To Flatbed, Worm Coffin, The Tumbler
programme.sub-title: A Flatbed To Flatbed, Worm Coffin, The Tumbler
programme.desc: In one stunt from this episode, a contestant lies in a coffin in the ground as night crawlers wiggle over their entire body.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Dual Box Drop, Milk The Goat, Helicopter Box Escape
programme.sub-title: A Dual Box Drop, Milk The Goat, Helicopter Box Escape
programme.desc: Contestants will be placed in a plexiglass box. Contestants race two at a time to see who can be fastest to suck a goat udder. Contestant will be placed standing in a box that is 3 feet wide, 7 feet high and 2 feet deep.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Phantom Swing On Freemont Street, Slot Eye Ball, The Luxor Slide
programme.sub-title: A Phantom Swing On Freemont Street, Slot Eye Ball, The Luxor Slide
programme.desc: A contestant plays a custom-made slot machine to determine which type of cooked eye pairs they will have to eat. In another stunt, contestants will climb out on the 29th floor window at the Luxor Hotel in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Dual Helicopter Drop, Pot Lock Dinner, Tank Of Dead Mice, Pit Fall
programme.sub-title: A Dual Helicopter Drop, Pot Lock Dinner, Tank Of Dead Mice, Pit Fall
programme.desc: A contestant must enter a cylindrical glass tank filled with water, where dead, frozen mice are then dumped in. Other contestants face disgusting food and more horrors in this episode of Fear Factor.

programme.title: Fear Factor: A Submerged Hallway, Gross Items Transfer, Pipe Ramp into Boxes
programme.sub-title: A Submerged Hallway, Gross Items Transfer, Pipe Ramp into Boxes
programme.desc: Contestants transfer an assembly line of items using only their mouths. In another stunt, the contestant must drive their car up a pipe ramp and off of a 3 story high parking garage.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Clip Show of Greatest Fear Factor Moments From Season 1-3
programme.sub-title: Clip Show of Greatest Fear Factor Moments From Season 1-3
programme.desc: Joe Rogan, in a crowd of fans, counts down the top 15 stunts from all the shows up till this point.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Extreme Monkey Bars, Leech Coffin, Ham and Eggs Fear Factor Style, Platform Swing, Swim With Chum, Quad Lunch
programme.sub-title: Extreme Monkey Bars, Leech Coffin, Ham and Eggs Fear Factor Style, Platform Swing, Swim With Chum, Quad Lunch
programme.desc: Contestants hold onto monkey bars, suspended under a helicopter. Contestants search for rubber boots at the bottom of a tank of cut up fish parts. Contestants must run their motorcycles off of a cliff.

channel.desc: Imagine a world where your greatest fears become reality. In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, recruited contestants battle in extreme stunts. These stunts are designed to challenge the contestants both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Last Days
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes. Larry, a rookie rampie, makes a near fatal error while training on the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Push Comes to Shove
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts. But his over- zealous efforts result in a clash with the crew and with Joe, and a down-to-the-wire midnight departure to meet a deadline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: The Doghouse
programme.desc: Duane's decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract. Young DC-3 co-pilot Graeme sees his chance to move up to a bigger plane disappear when he falls out of favour with Joe.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Ice Strip
programme.desc: Mechanic Jimmy is sent to a northern mining camp to create an ice landing strip on a remote lake where AJ will have to land a DC-3 and the much bigger C-46. New co-pilot Tyler faces the ultimate test - flying the sked with Joe.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Expect the Unexpected
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine. High winds wreak havoc for Devan and his crew on another C-46 mission to help clean up an oil spill in the Northwest Territories.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Coming Home
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta. Mikey and Rod think they hit the jackpot when they buy a million dollar firefighting plane on eBay at a bargain price.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Dark Skies
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes within a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety, which is why he only trusts himself to perform a dangerous-looking DC-3 stunt landing for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Shut Down
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline. Ray and the Electra crew fly to Sachs Harbour to pick up a unique load - the hides, wool, and meat of 250 musk oxen.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: A Tale of Two Pilots
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joe's doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Ice Jam
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load he's ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac. City girl Christine moves to Yellowknife to give the unglamorous rampie life a shot.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: A Very Buffalo Christmas
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north. But a series of problems with the Electra leave the company in a jam.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Crash Landing
programme.desc: Captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake. The ice strip landing goes fine, but when the plane takes off from the strip, the right landing gear gets stuck in the wheel well.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: For Sale By Owner
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready. But a landing gear emergency puts him and chief pilot Justin in serious danger.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Over Seas
programme.desc: Buffalo has to get a CL-215 water bomber to buyers in Korea. So Justin and Cory fly the plane to Vancouver Harbour, where it will be hoisted onto a cargo ship sailing across the Pacific Ocean to its destinatin, a method of delivery no one has ever tried.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Water Wings
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalo's water bomber plane to buyers there but are frustrated by the buyers' poor planning. Tempers flare when they try to get the plane off the ship and delivered to its final destination

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Meltdown
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Ray's retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition. So Buffalo brings in Electra pilot Brian Harrison to finish the contract.

channel.desc: Ice Pilots is about an eccentric airline and its motley crew that fly vintage planes on impossible arctic missions. Buffalo Airways attracts young pilots seeking Arctic adventure and the chance to fly big, old, piston powered aircrafts from a bygone era.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: A Bridge Too Far
programme.desc: Spectre stoops to a new low when he reveals a game changer that leaves Playmaker without a play to make!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: The duel between Playmaker and Spectre comes to a crashing conclusion as the bridge they’re battling on begins to break apart!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Looking Back
programme.desc: Varis reflects on the past as he prepares for a future without LINK VRAINS!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Ring the Bell
programme.desc: Gore grapples with Varis as he looks to drop the hammer on the Hanoi!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Gore at War
programme.desc: Making a comeback is what Gore does best, but will his finisher be enough to vanquish Varis?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Truth and Consequences
programme.desc: Playmaker makes a final stand against Varis to save LINK VRAINS!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Storm Access
programme.desc: Playmaker’s life points are on the verge of elimination - along with any hopes of stopping Varis and the Tower of Hanoi!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: The Reveal
programme.desc: Varis reveals his true identity – as well as the terrifying truth behind the Ignis!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Illusion of Hope
programme.desc: Time’s running out as Playmaker has less than one hour before all of LINK VRAINS is destroyed!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Standing Tall
programme.desc: The Tower of Hanoi is nearly complete – leaving Varis a win away from deleting LINK VRAINS once and for all!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Link to the Future
programme.desc: Varis is on the verge of victory unless Playmaker can make one last play to stop him!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: On Your Mark, Get Set, DUEL!
programme.sub-title: On Your Mark, Get Set, DUEL!
programme.desc: Hoping to save his friends from the clutches of Sector Security, Yusei Fudo challenges his old nemesis Officer Trudge to a Turbo Duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Creepy Crawlies
programme.desc: With his Duel Runner on the line, Yusei finds himself dueling against a bully who battles with a deck full of bugs.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: Looking to get his Stardust Dragon card back from Jack Atlas, Yusei takes off in a race against time and Sector Security.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Blast from the Past, Part 1
programme.sub-title: A Blast from the Past, Part 1
programme.desc: After making it through to New Domino City, Yusei confronts his old friend Jack Atlas and challenges him to a Turbo Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Blast from the Past, Part 2
programme.sub-title: A Blast from the Past, Part 2
programme.desc: As the clash between Jack and Yusei comes to a climatic close, a mysterious creature appears as their two Dragons duke it out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Facility, Part 1
programme.desc: After being sent to The Facility, Yusei befriends an odd old man who duels with a treasure deck full of ancient mystic cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Facility, Part 2
programme.desc: Yusei duels the top dog at The Facility using Yanagi's treasure deck. Meanwhile, Jack learns about the mystery surrounding his Mark of the Crimson Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Fire It Up!
programme.desc: With Yusei still serving out his sentence at The Facility, Jack finds himself having to face off against former Turbo Duel Champion Hunter Pace in a rematch that could send Jack's career up in smoke.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Lockdown Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: After being sent to the Maximum Security Zone in The Facility, Yusei risks being permanently placed in lockdown when he decides to duel Chief Armstrong in order to win a pardon for his pal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Lockdown Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: As the clash between Yusei and the Chief comes to a shocking conclusion, Yusei must figure out a way to win the battle before his life points get zapped to zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Take Back, Part 1
programme.desc: After being freed from the Facility, Yusei risks being re-incarcerated when he tries to take back his Duel Runner from Sector Security's vault.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Take Back, Part 2
programme.desc: With Officer Trudge in hot pursuit, Yusei looks to rev his game up before the long arm of the law grabs a hold of him for good!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Duel to Remember
programme.desc: When Yusei can't remember his own name, he agrees to duel a pint-sized player named Leo in the hopes of getting his memory back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Bloom of the Black Rose
programme.desc: As Leo and his pal Dexter venture into the narrows of New Domino City to find the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose, Blister breaks out a plan to keep Yusei's friends in the Satellite Sector safe from Goodwin's goons.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Welcome to the Fortune Cup
programme.desc: The stage is set for the Fortune Cup as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on reigning champion Jack Atlas. However, for the Master of Ceremonies Rex Goodwin, it's not about who wins or loses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Battle With the Black Rose
programme.desc: The second duel of the Fortune Cup is about to get under way as the mysterious duelist known as the Black Rose finds herself having to face off against a medieval menace named Sir Randsborg.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Surprise, Surprise!
programme.desc: With the first Turbo Duel of the Fortune Cup set to start, a surprise guest forces Yusei's competition to take an unexpected pit stop.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 1
programme.desc: Director Goodwin enlists the hypnotic powers of the Professor to expose Luna as a Signer and uncover the secrets she unknowingly knows of the Duel Monsters Spirit World.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2
programme.sub-title: Return to the Spirit World, Part 2
programme.desc: As the battle between the Professor and Luna continues, Luna looks to keep a promise she made to protect the Duel Monsters Spirit World, but in order for her to succeed, she must first break free of the hypnotic hold the Professor has on her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Second Round Showdown, Part 1
programme.desc: The semifinals of the Fortune Cup are about to begin, and the first match of day two features Yusei going toe-to-toe with the tower of power - Greiger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Second Round Showdown, Part 2
programme.desc: With no cards left in his hand and his life points about to get blasted by Greiger, Yusei has one draw left to take down this tower of power to keep in the hunt to duel Jack in the championship round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dueling Minds
programme.desc: In the second battle of the semifinals, Akiza squares off against the professional profiler Commander Koda, but with her tournament life on the line, can Akiza outplay an opponent who claims to know her every move?

channel.desc: Giant monsters! Powerful magic! And ancient Egyptian legends! The Yu-Gi-Oh! Channel is your destination for action-packed adventure series that hold all the cards. It’s your move!

programme.title: The Winning Season: The Winning Season
programme.desc: The story of a washed up basketball coach who must learn to overcome his love of booze and his overdeveloped macho nature in order to re-invent himself as a real man and give a bunch of no-hopers a shot at a WINNING SEASON!

programme.title: Sweet Talker
programme.desc: A sweet-talking con man (Bryan Brown) starts to turn his life around when he falls in love in this family-oriented comedy.

programme.title: Baking Up Love
programme.desc: CEO of the Morton Pumpkin Company decides to commemorate the anniversary of the cutest town ever founded with a bake-off. The town sweetheart is expected to win. When her niece is left to stay, winning seems out of reach.

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: Hapless Insurance Loss Adjuster - Martin Dyer - feels his life is spiralling out of control but discovers that even when you reach rock bottom, that some clouds really do have a silver lining.

programme.title: You May Not Kiss the Bride
programme.desc: Bryan is a quiet, photographer but when he falls foul of local gangsters, he is forced to marry the boss's daughter, Masha, in order for her to get her green card. They are sent to a remote tropical island for a honeymoon that is far from idyllic.

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: In this down-to-earth dramedy, a widowed advice columnist and single father (Steve Carell) falls in love with a French beauty (Juliette Binoche) only to discover she is dating his brother.

programme.title: Benjamin
programme.desc: A family calls in an intervention for Benjamin, a kid who they think is under the influence. Soon, it becomes clear that those who are confronting Benjamin's problems are much more dysfunctional than he is.

programme.title: But I'm a Cheerleader: But I'm a Cheerleader
programme.desc: A cheerleading-obsessed teenager is sent to a strict summer camp when her parents suspect her of being a lesbian.

channel.desc: For the most hilarious, most quotable, most excellent movies that will keep you in stitches 24/7, watch Pluto TV Comedy Movies. With a library of lunacy and a litany of ludicrousness, this is the place when you are looking to LOL.

programme.title: Couples Vacation
programme.desc: When Jack and Amanda head off on a glamping trip to "reignite their spark", their blissful romantic getaway is rudely hijacked and they are left in more trouble than before!

programme.title: Where Angels Fear to Tread
programme.desc: A story of a rich Edwardian widow who marries a handsome Tuscan dentist but dies in childbirth. Her English family travel to Italy in order to bring the child back home to England, but are unprepared for what unfolds...

programme.title: Back To Love
programme.desc: A young widow returns home for the first time in three years to help prepare her sister's wedding. She is forced to confront her past, including the man she never expected to fall for.

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Emma has made a career out of her sensible, and responsible approach to relationships. She has a radio talk show, and a loving relationship with her fiancé, Richard. Then Emma finds out that she is already married to a man she’s never met before

programme.title: Dance-Off
programme.desc: "Dance-Off" tells the story of two rival dance studios whose star-crossed lovers, Brandon and Jasmine, must compete against each other for $25,000 and the top award, the Platinum Platinum.

programme.title: 2 Years of Love
programme.desc: Samantha has a great marriage, until the pressure to have a baby comes up. Things get tricky when she starts falling for one of her clients, not realizing it is secretly her husband. Will they be able to make it through this rough patch?

programme.title: Joy & Hope
programme.desc: Joy and Hope run Two Sisters Ranch upstate New York. When a handsome stranger comes to town to find inspiration to get over writer's block, he learns how special Christmas on the ranch really is.

programme.title: Life With Music
programme.desc: In this life affirming story of hope, struggling pianist finds inspiration with a free-spirited music critic.

channel.desc: Celebrate love with Pluto TV Romance, with wall to wall Rom Com's, tear jerkers, and epic love stories which will make you laugh, cry and feel all fuzzy inside.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: A Night at The Leeds Museum Part 1
programme.sub-title: A Night at The Leeds Museum Part 1
programme.desc: Four floors of terror! Objects from around the world are at home in the museum, but what is attached to them, which now roams the floors and corridors after dark?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: A Night at The Leeds Museum Part 2
programme.sub-title: A Night at The Leeds Museum Part 2
programme.desc: With activity sending the team into a spin on the top floor, is there something attached to the museum's main attraction, the mummy?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Lost Souls of One Melling Road
programme.sub-title: Lost Souls of One Melling Road
programme.desc: The team heads to Liverpool to help a restaurant uncover what could be haunting there. Bex and Sean encounter the spirit of a white lady in the private quarters.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Full House at Northwich Plaza and Bingo Hall
programme.sub-title: Full House at Northwich Plaza and Bingo Hall
programme.desc: Bex and Sean head into Northwich, Cheshire to investigate a disused bingo hall. Bex braves a lone vigil, which she will never forget as a door seemingly opens on its own.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Last Orders at The Fleece Inn
programme.sub-title: Last Orders at The Fleece Inn
programme.desc: The team heads to Elland to investigate ghostly-goings on in this haunted pub. It's not just the spirits behind the bar lurking here. Multiple hauntings, murders and death surround this public house.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Liverpool's Secret Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Bex and Sean delve deep into Woolton Hall, a derelict mansion in Liverpool. They appear to be forced out of the building by an unknown force and it takes its toll on one of the team members.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Celebrity Special - The Black Horse in Pluckley Village
programme.sub-title: Celebrity Special - The Black Horse in Pluckley Village
programme.desc: Bex and Sean are joined by reality TV star Charlie Doherty in the most haunted village in the UK and investigate the most haunted pub in the UK, The Black Horse.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: The Night Before The Storm
programme.desc: In this special episode, it's the night before Sean and Bex are joined by their celebrity guest and they check out The Black Horse in Pluckley Village to investigate the paranormal hauntings at the most haunted pub in the UK.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: High Spirits at The Gothic Mansion
programme.sub-title: High Spirits at The Gothic Mansion
programme.desc: Bex and Sean investigate a haunting inside a gothic mansion, that is said to be haunted by the former owner of the building.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: The Blues Haunting at The Winslow Hotel
programme.sub-title: The Blues Haunting at The Winslow Hotel
programme.desc: Bex, Sean and the team head to Liverpool and investigate a very famous hotel, which Everton football club supporters have frequented for over 100 years and it would appear that some of the guests have never checked out.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Fun and Games at The Sportsman Inn
programme.sub-title: Fun and Games at The Sportsman Inn
programme.desc: Bex, Sean and Paul, investigate claims of paranormal incidents inside of a haunted inn. Once three separate cottages, will any of the previous residents join the investigation tonight? Or is there something more sinister haunting here?

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Witches and Vampires Haunting St James Cemetery
programme.sub-title: Witches and Vampires Haunting St James Cemetery
programme.desc: St James Cemetery is set behind Liverpool Cathedral and is claimed to be the worlds most haunted, with the remains of over 58,000 people buried at the location and multiple claims of paranormal sightings.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension
programme.sub-title: A Social Club for the Paranormal
programme.desc: Bex and Sean delve deep into a building that has survived world wars and is home to some very social ghosts. They come face to face with an angry spirit too, and something strange appears to be lurking in the basement.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: A Unexpected Haunted Adventure
programme.desc: The team heads to Lydiate Abbey to investigate claims of a ghostly white lady and stumble upon a totally hidden gem deep in the woods, which has its own spirits haunting.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Spirits Flying High at Speke Aerodrome
programme.sub-title: Spirits Flying High at Speke Aerodrome
programme.desc: The team head to Speke Airport to investigate claims that some of the aircraft located there have ghostly passengers still aboard, waiting to take flight.

programme.title: Ghost Dimension: Bump In The Bingo Hall
programme.desc: The team head out to Blackpool for a day out at the seaside that they will never forget. Investigating one of Blackpool's iconic buildings The Empire Bingo Hall. Many famous acts have played here and it seems that some may have never left.

channel.desc: A 24/7 channel that takes Ghost investigations to a whole new level. Using the latest technical instruments to collect and record evidence as well as incorporating good old fashioned ghost hunting techniques.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 21
programme.desc: Lucy and Martin visit a log cabin in Cornwall, a basement studio flat in Kent and a three bedroom terrace in Liverpool. All these properties are up for auction and we will be finding out who buys them when they go Under The Hammer.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 3
programme.desc: Lucy & Martin travel to Folkestone to see a Victorian house that could offer someone a foot on the property ladder. Then it's on to Hertfordshire to see a 3 bed terrace and in Devon there's an old inn up for sale where last orders have been called.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit a two bedroom house in North London.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 4
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a Farm House that's had a lot of refurbishment in Nottingham, a grubby London Flat and 4 acres of Kent Countryside.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 4
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Nottingham which has some unusual offerings to help you onto the property ladder; an attractive two-bedroom semi in Kent which needs a little love and care and finally, an ex-council first-floor flat in Shropshire.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit a house on the outskirts of Manchester.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view a property in Wales, a cottage in Kent and a big house with a problem in Ripon.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit houses in Derby, Reading and Margate.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 29
programme.desc: In Benwell, Newcastle there's a one bedroom flat that's been burnt out but will someone make it rise from the ashes? In Woolage Green, Kent it's last orders for an old pub with plenty of potential! Finally, in Harrogate a former hairdressing salon.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 17
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a three bedroomed house in Stoke on Trent next to a commercial property, a small two bedroomed flat in Surrey and a property in London.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 12
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Staffordshire, a bright house in Hertfordshire and property in Cornwall.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a plot of land in Hampshire, an end-of-terrace cottage in Derbyshire and a dingy one-bedroom flat in London.

channel.desc: This British daytime TV institution is now in it 22nd season on BBC1 and show's no sign of losing any of it's curb appeal.Wannabe property developers chance their arm in the auction room buying properties to let.

programme.title: Biggles - Adventures in Time
programme.desc: Hurrah! DevilsMen, Ginger, Algy et al are back and raring to take another crack against the beastly Hun and their mysterious ally, in a spectacular battle that will stretch across time!

programme.title: Knock on Wood
programme.desc: Discovering that a ventriloquist is travelling to Zurich, a spy ring hides secret plans in his dummies' heads. When a second spy ring learns of the plans, they descend upon the ventriloquist, causing city-wide pandemonium.

programme.title: Elvira's Haunted Hills
programme.desc: ELVIRA'S HAUNTED HILLS culls its outragousness from the classic Vincent Price/Roger Corman films of the early 60's along with a little Rocky Horror Picture Show and Fearless Vampire Killers.

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.

programme.title: Out There
programme.desc: When an award winning photographer finds proof of alien existence in an old camera's undeveloped film, he seeks help from the Air Force, newspaper, a UFO freak, and a tabloid. After the story gets published, his life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Jabberwocky
programme.desc: A young peasant, with no interest in adventure or fortune, is mistaken as the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

programme.title: Blood Orgy of the She-Devils
programme.desc: Lorraine and Mark enter the world of witchcraft where Mara foretells the future and helps them remember their past lives.

programme.title: Christiane F.
programme.desc: A teen girl in 1970's Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

channel.desc: From the “so bad it’s good” to the “so weird it’s great,” Pluto TV Cult Films is like having your own personal drive-in movie theater playing the wildest, funniest, and most-beloved cult classics ever made.

programme.title: Hunter: Murder He Wrote
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the death of a multi-millionaire, whose four heirs become prime suspects.

programme.title: Hunter: Silver Bullet
programme.desc: The only clue in a series of murders is a trail of police-issued ammunition that leads Hunter and McCall to suspect a colleague as the killer.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: A boy is the only witness to the shooting of his parents. As McCall attempts to unravel the circumstances surrounding the murders, Hunter must get the boy to talk about the shocking incident.

programme.title: Hunter: The Baby Game
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall enter the world of baby brokering when the murdered body of a call girl and an unharmed two-year-old are left in front of the woman's television set.

programme.title: Hunter: Presumed Guilty
programme.desc: McCall finds her loyalties sharply divided when an important murder case being prosecuted by the Assistant District Attorney, with whom she is in love, is jeopardized by Hunter.

programme.title: Hunter: Dead on Target - Part 1
programme.desc: While investigating the apparent suicide of Hunter's friend from the Vietnam War, the pair uncovers a 20-year-old betrayal that is still killing people today.

programme.title: Hunter: Dead on Target - Part 2
programme.desc: While investigating the apparent suicide of Hunter's friend from his days in Vietnam, the pair uncovers a 20-year-old betrayal that is still killing people today.

programme.title: Hunter: No Good Deed Ever Goes Unpunished
programme.sub-title: No Good Deed Ever Goes Unpunished
programme.desc: Mysterious tape recordings accusing a company of illegally dumping toxic waste seem like a prank until Hunter and McCall find that someone is willing to kill to conceal the truth.

programme.title: Hunter: Honorable Profession
programme.desc: When Hunter confronts the police department to defend the actions of a Chinese-American policewoman critically wounded in the line of duty, the pair heads to Chinatown.

programme.title: Hunter: Payback
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall try to solve a bank robbery and murder while coping with the double and triple-crossing schemes of a criminal who once saved Hunter's life.

programme.title: Hunter: Partners
programme.desc: When the husband of a policewoman is murdered, evidence of wife abuse makes Hunter and McCall suspect the woman's patrol partner who knew about the beatings.

programme.title: Hunter: The Pit
programme.desc: A veteran police dispatcher is blackmailed into undermining Hunter's and McCall's investigation of a multimillion-dollar gold robbery when her son is kidnapped.

programme.title: Hunter: City Under Siege - Part 1
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

programme.title: Hunter: City Under Siege - Part 2
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

programme.title: Hunter: City Under Siege - Part 3
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall track a pair of killers through a Los Angeles suburb where a crime wave and backlash vigilantism threaten to tear the community apart.

channel.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives the Lamborghini Gallardo Superleggera; DJ Christian O'Connell is challenged to a stunt driving routine.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Iwan Thomas accepts a stunt challenge from world-famous precision driver Russ Swift.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson returns to Anglesey for more shootouts; Tom Ford visits Spain to drive the new Land Cruiser; Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford visits billionaire Bernie Ecclestone's sprawling garage to explore his rare collection before he auctions off more than 50 of these unique models.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom and Jonny enter the grueling Exeter Trial, a 24-hour off-road driving event that has been held for 100 years, in an old Volkswagen Beetle.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff gets to drive the Aston Martin DBS, the latest James Bond car; Jonny Smith embarks on a 600-mile transcontinental trip to test out the world's first diesel Grand Tourer.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith hunts down three cars that fall within budget for parents on their first year of motoring.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson attends a shootout between two chic superminis: the BMW Mini One and the Fiat 500.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato meets Paul Vickery, captain of the England rugby team; Tom Ford journeys to the Arctic to test the Volvo XC70 in extreme conditions; Tiff Needell tests out the Lexus IS-F.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato joins Britain's best downhill skier, Chemmy Alcott, to drive a Group N rally car; Tom Ford drives the Citroen C5 in Lisbon; Tiff takes a look at the latest Subaru Impreza.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny tries to find some fine coupes for less than £1,500.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki takes two of Ford's fastest and most iconic hot hatches to Anglesey; Tom Ford volunteers to aid mountain rescue teams equipped with Hummer H3s.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Car nut Tim Shaw joins the team to tackle ways to spend less money on fuel; Tom tests Ford's new Kuga SUV; Jonny sees if a car is actually worth more as scrap than as a functional vehicle.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw takes Renault to task for overcharging customers; Tiff runs a shootout between two coupes; Vicki spends a day with Formula One star Lewis Hamilton.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato races two fast estates; Tom Ford tests the latest Honda Accord and assists the HM Plant Honda Superbike Team along the way.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith tests the VW Passat CC vs. the Mercedes CLS; Jonny Smith becomes an ice cream man for the day to test out the newly revamped Citroen Berlingo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford performs the only televised test of the Dodge Challenger; Jonny Smith heads to the Ultimate Street Car show at Santa Pod to judge the "Show & Shine" competition.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this packed episode of "Fifth Gear," Tom Ford delivers a verdict on the new Volkswagen Scirocco, Vicki heads to the track to test out Porsches and Tiff tests out the world's first underwater car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford test drives the new Ford Fiesta; Vicki and Tiff are aided by renowned trainer Simon Pavey in a motorcycle race.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason battle it out on the track in go-karts; Tom Ford tests the Renault Laguna; actor Dick Benedict joins Jonny Smith in a luxury road test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny tests the latest Jeep Wrangler to see how it stacks up against the original WWII model; Tim Shaw tackles the car tax; Jason Plato goes behind the wheel of the new Aston Martin V8 Vantage.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford tests the new Grande Punto Abarth; Tim Shaw investigates whether it's possible to save huge amounts of money by going back to basics and servicing your own car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford conducts a shocking crash test that could prove to be essential viewing for family motorists; Tim hits the road with the latest camera alerting systems.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim takes the driving test again to see if the test really is getting harder or not.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny looks into budget convertibles, which go for even lower prices during the winter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason race each other in monster trucks. Tim finds out if super diesel produces more horsepower than standard diesel. Vicki challenges 17-year-old Tom Cave to a bit of rally racing.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim puts a variety of car polishes to the extreme test to simulate a year of abuse.

channel.desc: Resident presenters and most knowledgeable drivers on TV, Tiff Needell, Vicki Butler-Henderson and Johnny Smith, provide the inside track on all things motoring.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These women burn madly with jealousy, an anger so deep they’ll kill to satisfy it. What makes them turn from “green with envy” to “lethal with jealousy?" Find out as we explore their hearts of darkness.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: The heaviest judgments of convicted killers are reserved for those who committed premeditated murder. These women plot and plan. They know the consequences of their actions, but still they go forward to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Psychopathic killers lurk in society, mostly acting alone. Sometimes fate brings them into contact with another person who shares their cold power to kill.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Greed is one of the oldest motives for murder, and these deadly women are no exception: they’ll do anything to satisfy their need for cash. This is the dangerous world of the fortune hunters.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: A rifle in a shopping mall, a syringe of potassium chloride and a syringe of insulin, each in the hands of a mentally disturbed woman, lead to the tragic end of many lives.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Hearts of Stone
programme.desc: Deadly Women are not always the ones you expect. They are not the strangers lurking in the dark, they are a young mother, a supportive wife and a grandmother - all killers. Behind their loving masquerade lies a wake of family horror and pain.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Under His Control
programme.desc: These are love stories with bleak, bloody endings. Blinded by desire, obsessed and malleable, some women fall into lethal relationships with dangerous, controlling men.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Behind their friendly smiles, deadly women hide histories of bloodshed and murder.

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: Naked Science: The Big Bang - The First Three Seconds

programme.desc: 13.7 billion years ago there was absolutely nothing. No space, no time, and no matter. Naked Science follows the first three seconds of creation when a speck of light appeared from nothing and rapidly expanded into an enormous Universe.

programme.title: Naked Science: How To Destroy A Planet
programme.desc: The Earth is built to last. It is a 4,550,000,000-year-old, 5,973,600,000,000,000,000,000-tonne ball of rock and iron. It has taken more devastating asteroid hits in its lifetime than you've had hot dinners, and it still orbits happily around the sun.

programme.title: Naked Science: Diamonds

programme.title: Tornado Chasers: Home: Part 1

programme.title: Tornado Chasers: Home: Part 2

programme.title: Tornado Chasers: Stranded

programme.title: Tornado Chasers: Nemesis: Part 1

programme.title: Destruction Decoded: TORNADO

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: El Niño

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Hurricanes

programme.title: Deadly Disasters: Floods

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas
programme.desc: See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat
programme.desc: Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas
programme.desc: See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes
programme.desc: The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Getting There
programme.desc: Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial 'swords into ploughshares'.

programme.title: The New Frontier: The Dark Side
programme.desc: Perhaps that American politician was right. There are indeed things we know we don’t know.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Orbit
programme.desc: The International Space Station is undoubtedly the jewel in the crown of low Earth orbit; observation post, research lab and class room.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.sub-title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: MOON SHINE
programme.desc: The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Man's science fictional demise.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way
programme.desc: This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas
programme.sub-title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire
programme.desc: The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: The New Frontier: From There To Here
programme.desc: Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Slingshot
programme.desc: Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Living In Space
programme.desc: How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: The New Frontier: Hyabusa
programme.desc: The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stranger Than Fiction
programme.desc: A millionaire is found dead, murdered for a stash of buried silver. A young woman dates violent men, only to be killed by her best friend.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Elements Of Murder
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison. When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Medical Examiners's Casebook
programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims. And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder. These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Aim
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own fingerprint, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Loved To Death
programme.desc: A victim usually never foresees danger when the perpetrator turns out to be a friend or a lover. Science and microscopic evidence can unmask these killers and find justice for those who are Loved To Death.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Drawing Conclusions
programme.desc: A teenager is abducted on a shopping trip. Two hikers disappear from the Appalachian Trail.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Trails of Evidence
programme.desc: In criminal investigations, a simple clue can provide the missing link by placing a suspect at a crime scene. Dirt left on shoes, tires or clothes, or even a tiny piece of plastic can pinpoint a crime scene.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Flames Of Justice
programme.desc: Arson fires are set for their own sake, or to cover a different crime, such as murder. Think fire consumes all vital clues? Think again. Arson investigators can glean important clues from scorched rubble and ignite the unquenchable flames of justice.

programme.title: The New Detectives: To Kill Again
programme.desc: Some people do get away with murder at least for a while. Flush with their success, serial killers murder again and again. But each time they kill, they leave behind a few more clues, which ultimately lead to their capture.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Camera Clues
programme.desc: Forensic Photography: Forensic photographers are among the first people at a crime scene, capturing vital clues on film. What do the cameras capture that can't be seen first-hand, and who are the men and women who analyze the camera's clues?

programme.title: The New Detectives: Fatal Error
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Military Justice
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Bloodlust
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

channel.desc: THE NEW DETECTIVES profiles the work of world-renowned forensics experts and criminal investigators and the techniques they use to solve murders and other crimes.
