programme.title: Andromeda: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.sub-title: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding.

programme.title: Andromeda: All Too Human
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka and Trance go with Rommie to find out about a weapon being developed on a planet that distrusts AI.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda is tasked with escorting medical ships safely through Drago-Kazov space.

programme.title: Andromeda: Home Fires
programme.desc: A planet of Commonwealth survivors led by Dylan's former fiancee is invited to join the new Commonwealth, but when they vote not to join, the Magog are suspected of playing dirty.

programme.title: Andromeda: Into the Labyrinth
programme.desc: An agent of the Abyss tries to lure Harper into joining the Magog.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When they rescue a young prince from an uprising that kills the rest of his family, Dylan and Tyr are asked to be his advisors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and his new Commonwealth fleet take on the Drago-Kazov fleet but find it much larger than expected.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog eggs in Harper are starting to hatch, so the team builds a Teseract machine.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan takes over a tourist barge in an attempt to escape mercenaries.

channel.desc: During an uprising in the Systems Commonwealth, the Andromeda & it’s Captain Dylan Hunt, are caught at the edge of an event horizon, freezing in time. 300 years later, they are freed from the black hole and set out to "rekindle the light of civilization."

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In 1999, Kiwi engineer Aaron Hopa and his English colleague Robert Glazzard were murdered on board a survey ship in the Persian Gulf in.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Stone Cold
programme.desc: In 2004, Brendan Percy was found dead of hypothermia and dehydration in a sub alpine area above Oamaru in suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughter’s fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Blood Money
programme.desc: Psychics Kelvin Cruickshank (NZ) and Deb Webber (Aus) investigate the unsolved murder of Lower Hutt pensioner 91 year old George Engelbrecht. In 1979, a burglar broke into George's home and beat the old man to death in his bed.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: In this episode of Sensing Murder we learn about the murder of Angela Blackmoore, a 21 year old woman with a 2 year old child. The child was not harmed and the killer has not been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

channel.desc: Sensing Murder, a documentary drama series for real unsolved murder. In this series, psychic detectives are challenged to put their powers to the test, delving into the lives of deceased victims and uncover secrets that surround their tragic deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.sub-title: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.sub-title: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.sub-title: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.sub-title: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.sub-title: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Sallie-Anne Huckstepp and Juanita Nielsen were iconic figures in the shadowy King’s Cross scene of the 1970s and 1980s. They lived dangerous lives – challenging the status quo of the period and met with mysterious and violent deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Evil Heart: The Murder of Donna Wheeler
programme.sub-title: Evil Heart: The Murder of Donna Wheeler
programme.desc: The bloodied, semi-naked body of 30-year-old Donna Wheeler is discovered by her estranged husband Keith Bond and 12-year-old son.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.sub-title: No Mercy: The Killing of Virginia Morse
programme.desc: The horrific story of killers Allan Baker and Kevin Crump who began their murderous spree in rural NSW by killing a complete stranger for $20, a packet of cigarettes and a couple of litres of petrol.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.sub-title: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

channel.desc: Crime Investigation Australia, the ultimate destination for true crime, uncovers its country’s most horrific crimes that shocked the nation. Watch chilling re-enactments & interviews and witness how police & forensic investigators solve the case.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Back in Pennsylvania, Paris and Nicole must cope with a plastic surgery internship which is less than glamorous, and bond with their fun loving host family.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole's next stop is Baltimore, Maryland, where they work at a local news station and try to fulfill the rock dreams of their host family's eldest son.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stop in Delaware, where they help their new host family with a space problem, while their internship is at a lively daycare center.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole continue their travels through Maryland, living with a host family who Paris offers to cook for, and working at a bakery.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: As their latest internship with a psychic is only a short distance away, Paris and Nicole remain at the Foot family home, where they attempt to match make.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Back in New Jersey, Paris and Nicole work at an elderly living center, where they give the seniors a day to remember, before teaching their host family about the cruelty of hunting.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a mother and son in Miami whose unusual pets prove useful for their ad agency internship, which involves creating a campaign for a new breakfast sandwich.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Havoc ensues when Paris and Nicole begin an internship with the Atlantic City Fire Department, while they task themselves with finding the daughter of their host family a new friend.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls intern at a manufacturing firm where their work proves dull, however they manage to have fun with their host family.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole stay with a family in Tennessee, where they play matchmakers once more, while their internship is with a wedding planner.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Before they leave for New York, Paris and Nicole stay with the family of a former beauty queen, who convinces Paris to take part in a pageant, while their internship is at a dentist's office.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole take the place of a stay-at-home mom who has a young daughter, and also happens to be nine months pregnant!

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole trade in their designer dresses for traditional Pakistani attire when they take over the responsibilities of a Pakistani housewife.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole fill in for a housewife who feels her marriage is lacking a spark.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole spend the day tending to the needs and whims of four rambunctious kids.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole plan competing weddings for a lesbian couple.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole must take care of a toddler, as well as throw a party for his second birthday.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole take a break from household chores and go on a family vacation.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are paired with a hard-to-please husband.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole visit an artistic family with varied talents.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris can’t stand to spend another day as a housewife and hires an impersonator to take her place, giving Nicole an opportunity to exact her revenge.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie say goodbye to their jet-setting lifestyle in Los Angeles, and move in with the Ledings, a family in Altus, Arkansas.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are hired to work at a dairy farm operated by Albert’s no-nonsense friend, but after tiring of the hard work and smell, they head for a nearby hot tub… and end up getting fired.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole are hired to work at a fast-food restaurant, but they’re bored and frustrated by the demands of the job, and soon rebel by pulling pranks during each of their assignments; when the Ledings reprimand them, the girls just go out dancing.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole agree to be honorary co-chairs of the Springtime Gala, but instead of working at the gala, they engage in their usual shocking behavior; the Ledings are embarrassed, and everyone in town is gossiping about Paris and Nicole.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: The girls go to work for a cattle auctioneer, but when they’re sent to buy cattle feed, they charge several other items without permission; the auctioneer comes after them for the money, and the girl try to lie their way out of the debt.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole finally get a job they enjoy: working at a gas station, where there are plenty of guys to flirt with; but a confrontation erupts when Albert and Janet tell the girls to stay away from the small town boys, and the girls disobey them.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole reminisce about their month in Altus, make amends, and say goodbye to the people they’ve come to know before returning to Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Leeza Gibbons hosts a look back at Paris’ and Nicole’s stay in Altus, Arkansas, as the girls reunite with the Leding family in front of a studio audience.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole depart from Miami Beach toward their first destination, the Batten Family Ranch.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole get jobs at Weeki Wachee Springs in Florida and play a surprising game of hide-and-seek with their boss's daughter.

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: Paris and Nicole work as maids at the Caliente Nudist Colony and learn the meaning of the word "termination."

programme.title: The Simple Life
programme.desc: While staying with a host family, Nicole butts heads with their oldest son and decides to give him a taste of his own medicine.

channel.desc: The challenge, whether surviving 30 days with a family on a farm, accepting various internships or travelling across country by bus, it’s no phones, no credit cards, no money. Paris Hilton & Nicole Richie give everything up for “The Simple Life.”

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mark King, the CEO of the world’s top golf equipment brand, Taylor Made, goes undercover as Al Bower, an unemployed golf enthusiast trying to land his dream job in the golf industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

channel.desc: Undercover Boss takes real life big corporation CEOs out of their comfort zone, to work undercover within their own companies amongst their unsuspecting workforce. Will they be satisfied with what they uncover?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Urgent!
programme.desc: We pick were we last left off, in Hawaii, for the reveal. Jason and Grant were called back for a very important personal case, the Reid House, in Rhode Island, to help a scared 4 year old.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Uninvited Guests
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS has been asked to help the 1875 Inn in Tilton, New Hampshire. The Inn has had two major fires, one of which supposedly took the life of a child named Laura, who now haunts the hotel.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Flooded Souls
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Hales Bar Dam and Marina in Tennessee, to investigate a dam that was built on Native American land.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghostly Refuge
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Oswego, New York to investigate the renowned Fort Ontario. TAPS has investigated many forts, but never one that once served as a sanctuary for Jewish refugees during World War II.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Curtain Call
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Joliet, Illinois to investigate the Rialto Square Theater, which is becoming known for being more than just an entertainment venue.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Distillery of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Buffalo Trace Distillery in Frankfort, Kentucky to investigate hauntings at the oldest operating distillery in America.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Rocky Mountain Hauntings
programme.desc: This week TAPS answers the Wrights begging call heads to Manitou Springs, Colorado to investigate the Briarhurst Manor located at the base of Pike's Peak.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Norwich State

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All My Children
programme.desc: For a guy who started life as a free spirited outlaw-biker Dog has certainly turned into a family man. His children touch everything he does today, from searching for the perfect gift for his daughter Cecily's birthday to hunting a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Baby
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joining the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rain Check
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Love on the Run
programme.desc: Today Dog finds himself looking for more than one fugitive. He starts the day looking for a woman who has skipped out on her court date. But he soon learns that she has teamed up with a woman whose criminal exploits have attracted the local media.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jump Start
programme.desc: Dog gave a break to a young man with a drug problem who promised to enter drug rehab. But this commitment to rehabilitation seems to have ended when he bolted from the car on the way to the drug treatment center and went on the run.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Ice Man
programme.desc: Dog's latest fugitive doesn't think small when it comes to illegal drugs: he was carrying almost a pound of meth when he was arrested. Now he's on the run with his pregnant girlfriend on the high plains of Colorado.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trouble in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog is back in Hawaii and tracking a dangerous fugitive through the jungles of the Big Island. Their prey is being protected by a ring of family and friends that Dog must forcefully confront to bring in his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Power
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Ties
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Special Delivery
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.sub-title: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

channel.desc: Go on the prowl with real-life bounty hunter Duane "Dog" Chapman, his wife Beth, and their family as they chase down fugitives in the Hawaiian islands. The hunt is on, and Dog always gets his man on this exclusive 24/7 channel.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jerky Boys
programme.desc: A decision to try and make some duck jerky leads the boys to Godwin's garage and a minibike race. Phil and Kay have made Willie the executor of their will, and Phil wants to show Willie what he and his brothers will inherit when he and Kay pass away.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Going Si-ral

programme.sub-title: O Little Town of West Monroe

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Boomerang Becca

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown

programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard

channel.desc: From keeping law and order in Alaska to travelling some of the deadliest routes in the world, follow some extraordinary people as they take on the toughest jobs in the world, so you don’t have to. Pluto TV Tough Jobs - home of the extreme workday!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Takashia says Brendon doesn’t approve of her friends, doesn’t trust her and is controlling. Brendon says he can’t trust Takashia because she is a nonstop attention seeker and never passes up an opportunity to flirt with men.

programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Track Me Down
programme.desc: Briana is suspicious of Geovani because she claims he is way too sexual and can’t keep his hands off her. She thinks that if he has that much drive for her, how could he not have it for other women.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Back Seat of My Jeep
programme.desc: Bumping in the night in the back seat of his jeep has caused all our problems! Kelsey says Justin cheats, doesn’t pay bills and is always angry. Justin argues that she’s a liar and doesn’t help around the house ever.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

channel.desc: Divorced! Wronged! Hunted! On Judge Nosey, find the most intense real-life courtroom drama on TV with the likes of Divorce Court and Eye for An Eye, all here 24/7.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Hand on a House Episode
programme.sub-title: The Hand on a House Episode
programme.desc: Nick and others enter a contest to win a house.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Good Day Seattle Episode
programme.desc: A new morning show is launched at the station, but Nick must cohost it with a self-serving reality star. Meanwhile, Marilyn moves in with the family.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Hyphenated Name Episode
programme.desc: A newlywed couple (Terry Crews, Essence Atkins) with two children face various blended-family obstacles in this sitcom based on the 2005 film of the same name.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Credit Check Episode
programme.desc: Cash-flow problems strike the family when Suzanne's credit issues surface and Nick's work necessitates a new van.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Day Off Episode
programme.desc: Nick tries to help his mother forge bonds with Kevin and Lindsey. Meanwhile, Suzanne gets the day off.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Soccer Episode
programme.desc: Young Kevin gets a kick out of soccer, but Nick doesn't see the appeal. Meanwhile, Lindsey's secretiveness exasperates Suzanne, who then snoops online into her teen daughter's private life.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Rat inThe House Episode
programme.desc: When a rat gets lost in the home, Kevin scurries to care for it. Meanwhile, an ex-flame creates surging tension between Lindsey and Gigi.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Booty Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne isn't a sport when Nick watches a game with friends at a sports bar with alluring waitresses. Elsewhere, the children ask for more allowance, but they reject doing any added chores.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Spelling Bee Episode
programme.desc: Nick meets a famous actor, who shadows Nick in preparation for a role. Meanwhile, Kevin gears up for a spelling bee.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Kleptomaniac Episode
programme.desc: Nick is enlisted to host a charity walkathon. Meanwhile, Marilyn's bracelet goes missing, and the children train for their participation in the charity walk.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Michelle Obama Sweater Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The No Nah Nah Episode
programme.desc: An exhausted Nick resists Suzanne's romantic advances, leading her to worry about the health of their relationship.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Get Together Episode

programme.sub-title: The We Ain't Going Out Like That Episode
programme.desc: When Nick tries to be spontaneous, but Suzanne resists and instead plans a date night that fails, they attempt to be spontaneous together--until they realize it's better if she makes plan.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Oh No She Di-in't Episode
programme.sub-title: The Oh No She Di-in't Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne grows jealous of Nick's pretty young field producer. Elsewhere, Gigi falls for a man, who has children, so she enlists Kevin and Lindsey to help her better relate to kids.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Nick's Manny-Pedi Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne infiltrates Nick's night with the boys, so he retaliates by crashing her all-lady spa getaway.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Gold Party Episode
programme.desc: When Marilyn throws a gold party at Nick and Suzanne's, and Nick learns Suzanne's wedding ring isn't real, he sets out to have a real ring made before Suzanne learns the truth.

programme.desc: When Suzanne suspects that Lindsey's athletic new crush from school is gay, Nick sets out to prove that he isn't.

channel.desc: Kick back and enjoy the best of Black Hollywood through all your favorite urban series! Featuring reality shows and box office hit dramas, this channel is guaranteed to have everything you’ve been waiting for in one place.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fury
programme.desc: Kathy, her two daughters and her new husband, "Farmer" thought they had the perfect, quiet life deep in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Detour
programme.desc: With time off between cases, Ryan suggests to the PRS team they choose a random town to investigate. They roll into St. Helens, Oregon, home of Twilight, where they learn about the long history of the paranormal in the area.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Haunted Piano
programme.desc: Ryan and the PRS team are called in when unlucky antique collectors unwittingly bring a paranormally-infested piano into their home. The team attempts to dismantle and destroy the offending instrument.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: Ever since Wes and his family moved into their new home in York, PA they've been struggling with a dark force that's made everyday a living hell. Wes feels his mental and physical health is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

channel.desc: Watch as Ryan and his team investigate disturbances and try to work out what these alleged paranormal phenomena really could be!

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Nunnington Hall Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this large manor house that is said to be swarming with paranormal activity of every kind, and gets more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates two buildings, a forge and the cottage. He could not have imagined the activity that unfolded around him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Margam Castle P2
programme.desc: The upper floors of Margam Castle are said to be haunted by many different spirits, Stuart goes it alone to try and find them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Charlton House
programme.desc: Karl investigates Carlton house library for the first time and quickly realises that he is not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action

programme.title: Most Haunted: Haden Hill House Part 1
programme.desc: An old house in England’s West Midlands gives the Most Haunted team a night they will never forget.

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Leopard Inn Pt 3
programme.desc: In the final part of their investigation into the abandoned old hotel above the Leopard Inn, Yvette and her team are tested again to their very limits.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large country house. Without exception every member of the team experience something unexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all but forgotten piece of British history.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small theatre with a big problem…ghosts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on their biggest challenge yet in a prison where many have lost their lives and some seem to have remained.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Black Country Living Museum
programme.desc: The team have a whole village to investigate with results that amazed the all. With a playful spirit communicating through the Ouija board and the EVP machine at the same time the team seem to have their first two-way conversation with the dead.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Abbey House Museum
programme.desc: Yvette introduces a brand new Most Haunted team member, Watson, a bulldog. This location starts to give up its mysteries as soon as the team arrive and they have go film differently to accommodate a particularly aggressive poltergeist.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Fleece Inn
programme.desc: This old pup in the heart of West Yorkshire is said to be one of the Most Haunted places in England.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Karl in the main prison block, Stuart checks out the isolation unit, with dramatic results.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.

channel.desc: Join Yvette Fielding and the team investigate paranormal happenings at some of the world's most haunted locations, all on their very own 24/7 Most Haunted channel!

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Popcorn, Peanuts and Crackerjacks
programme.desc: A minor-league baseball team never wins, so Jonathan and Mark set out to help them. They also come to the aid of an elderly vendor who has been kicked out of the stadium.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Smile in the Third Row
programme.sub-title: The Smile in the Third Row
programme.desc: The lead actor in a Broadway play claims that God is attending the show's performances, sitting in a third-row orchestra seat.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Secret
programme.desc: The teenage daughter of Mark's friend tries to find her biological mother. It may tear the family apart.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Monster - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark connect a young blind woman with a disfigured artist.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Monster - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark's friend Scotty is on hand to provide legal assistance. He defends the young artist with a facial deformity who has been accused of assaulting a blind girl.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Good Doctor
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark go to work at a football team. They learn that one of the players has been getting drugs from the team doctor.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Alone
programme.desc: A homeless boy wishes that someone would love him.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Close Encounters of the Heavenly Kind
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of the Heavenly Kind
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a bullied orphan whose eccentric grandfather is in danger of losing him to a heartless social worker.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Change of Life
programme.desc: Mark switches places with an attractive movie star who has a low opinion of men.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Keep Smiling
programme.desc: Jonathan must help his own widow regain her love for life.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Last Assignment
programme.desc: An errant angel has been on probation for two centuries because he's always breaking the rules.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Bind the Wounds
programme.desc: A father attempts to have a memorial made to commemorate his son who was killed in Vietnam.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Heaven on Earth
programme.desc: Mark asks Jonathan to help erase everything bad that's happened to him recently. Mark's idea is to create his own vision of heaven on Earth.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Summit
programme.desc: A dying woman was forced to leave a son behind in the Soviet Union during World War II.

channel.desc: Binge watch Highway To Heaven, the classic 80s fantasy drama, starring Michael Landon, an angel sent back to Earth to help people in need, right here on it’s very own channel!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: With Danny away, and Du Plessis undertaking an ignominious stretch of community service, Ed is left in charge of running the Endangered Species Project.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny and Ed are anxiously preparing for a review with JLW, the pharmaceutical company that fund their Endangered Species Project. They are desperate for it to go smoothly, and as a result are driving the rest of the family mad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Following the loss of their funding, the family are in dire financial straits. Danny and Ed attempt to get an extension on their mortgage but are refused. Fiona spurs Ed on, telling him that the man she used to know would have a plan for survival.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Strange things are happening at Leopard's Den. The family awake to find frogs everywhere, seemingly having rained down overnight; the giraffe refuses to budge from the front gate and the cheetah is off its food.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Scabby Monkey
programme.desc: Contending with overweight cats and their over protective owners was not what Danny Trevanion had in mind when he became a vet. So when a scruffy, barely alive African monkey arrives at his practise Danny is fascinated by the challenge.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Danny is having second thoughts about the wisdom of uprooting his new family and ploughing all their money into a business venture that they know next to nothing about.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Work To Do
programme.desc: A successful giraffe capture means everyone is in high spirits, until the arrival of Evan and Olivia's real father, Simon, throws the family into turmoil.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Meerly Evan
programme.desc: Evan lets the mischievous meerkats loose in Rosie's room to cause havoc. Rosie is devastated when they destroy an irreplaceable photograph of her mother and rages at Evan. She decides once and for all to go back to Bristol.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Evan Meets Elli
programme.desc: Rogue young male elephants are rampaging through Leopard's Den and destroying everything the family have built, so Danny introduces a matriarch elephant in the hope that she will calm them down.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Dawn Feeling
programme.desc: At a typically rowdy family breakfast, Rosie is excitedly looking forward to the arrival of her friend Izzy, whilst Danny is concerned about the rumour of ivory poachers in the area. Unnoticed, Miranda the lion cub pads off into the bush.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Trevanions have been living at Leopard's Den for over a year. The wildlife is roaming freely and the family are settled into African way of life. Business however is not good. With an abundance of game lodges competition is fierce.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: It's the grand reopening of Mara and a British wildlife charity is using the event to release a vulture back into the wild. Fatani, the new, young and ambitious manager of Mara has hired Danny as the vet to oversee the release.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Leopard's Den is looking after a sick and orphaned baby elephant called Togo. However, despite Evan and Du Plessis' constant vigil, Togo is dying from a broken heart. Evan is distraught and Du Plessis promises they will look after her together.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Sarah's absence couldn't have come at a worse time for Leopard's Den. Nature Conservation is carrying out their annual inspection and everything has to be tip top. Danny's determined they pass with flying colours and everyone is roped in to help.

channel.desc: Wild at Heart, the feel good British family drama series, which sees Bristol Vet (Stephen Tompkinson) and his family emigrating to start a game park in South Africa. Watch it now 24/7!

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Line Goes Dead
programme.desc: When the severed head of a wife and mother is found, Lt. Joe Kenda uses forensics and interrogation to find both her body and her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My First Case
programme.desc: In his first case with the homicide unit, rookie burglary detective Joe Kenda volunteers to work a bloody multi-victim shooting deemed “unsolvable” by the veterans.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don’t add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Run for your Life
programme.desc: A slain body of a marathon runner is found just hours before a big race. With the help of a trusted K-9 officer, Kenda sets off to find the killer himself before he strikes again.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My Worst Fear
programme.desc: Police are shocked to find a 13-year-old boy killed in an explosion, but their grief turns to alarm when they discover a second, unexploded bomb.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Grip
programme.desc: When a speeding truck crashes into a residential building, officers find the lifeless body of Michael Faast behind the wheel. But he didn’t die in the wreck – he was shot point-blank in the temple.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: When police find 24-year-old Patrick Ray with a gunshot to the temple, the scene has all the telltale signs of suicide. But Lt. Joe Kenda's instinct says otherwise.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Sisters
programme.desc: The bullet-ridden bodies of two sisters are found in a suburban house that’s littered with mysterious clues. Joe Kenda learns that the two unassuming young mothers shared an explosive secret.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Rearview Mirror
programme.desc: When a retired military man runs over a pedestrian, it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine if it was bad brakes or bad intent.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Magic Bullet
programme.desc: A hard-working father of two is shot in the head just steps from a notorious strip club. The case is stuck in neutral until Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organized by an unlikely triggerman.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Time Bomb
programme.desc: In 1978, Lt. Joe Kenda is new to the CSPD, and gets more than he bargains for when a local bank is the target of a massive explosion.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Run for your Life
programme.desc: A slain body of a marathon runner is found just hours before a big race. With the help of a trusted K-9 officer, Kenda sets off to find the killer himself before he strikes again.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Justified
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down, leading Lt. Joe Kenda to delve into his troubled past and his connection to the world of rare coins.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: A mother of two is found dead in the most expensive part of Colorado Springs, leaving Lt. Joe Kenda stumped—until he looks into her personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Snitch
programme.desc: When officers respond to a shooting , they discover the body of a young man they know all to well -- police informant Jimmie Stevenson. it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: When the Music Stops
programme.desc: Vietnam War veteran Charles Walker is found unconscious, after a stabbing attack so savage even 45 units of blood couldn’t save his life.

channel.desc: Joe Kenda has solved 387 homicide investigations, with a 92% solve rate. Each episode of Homicide Hunter uses Kenda’s first person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stores of his most disturbing and challenging murder cases.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tenacious B
programme.desc: A French Bulldog is anxious around other dogs, and a Vizsla is afraid of cars. Can Cesar help one dog improve his social skills and steer the other's behavior toward the fast lane?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tyson, Moose, and Rylie & Tucker
programme.desc: Model Kim Strother is in desperate need of rescuing. Her Yorkshire Terrier Moose is a menace to society. when they go for walks, barking and biting at passersby and their dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Anti-Social Sasha
programme.desc: Sasha, a pound pup, is perfect in the house, but outside she shows aggression towards other dogs. Angler, a Lab, is blind, and exhibits strange behavior around food.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Riley & Sophie, Aussie and Lulu, Bebe, & Sasha
programme.sub-title: Riley & Sophie, Aussie and Lulu, Bebe, & Sasha
programme.desc: A couple of adopted basset hounds have a bad case of sibling rivalry. A dingo mix from Australia hasn't adjusted to her new life in California. An overly protective poodle.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Boo and Britney Dawg
programme.desc: Pit bull, Britney Dawg, is a tricky dog. However, her parlor tricks don't make up for her aggression. Dachshund mix, Boo, is aggressive at feeding time and hates to have his nails trimmed.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: J & Alice
programme.desc: J is unpredictable and aggressive and his owner is now dealing with a lawsuit. Alice is depressed and aggressive towards the other two dogs in the house – a potentially lethal combination.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Teenage Savior
programme.desc: Over 2,000 people gathered at a local PETCO in hopes of a session with Cesar. This episode follows two of these troubled canines. Things get serious when Cesar's son joins in to help.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Sasha & Shep
programme.desc: Lhasa Apso Sasha, bares her teeth at anyone who takes anything from her. White German Shepherd, “Shep,” goes after strangers, making it impossible for his wheelchair bound owner to control.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Wilshire and Butch
programme.desc: Wilshire, a hyperactive Dalmatian in Los Angeles, runs amuck in Firehouse 29 and the city attorney threatens to take him away if he doesn't shape up. Cesar tries to clear Wilshire's spotty past.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tillie and Leo
programme.desc: A rehabilitated Wheaten Terrier mix grows overly attached to his rescuer. The owners of a Shar-pei must deal with the result of their dog’s growing aggression towards other dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Optimus & Gigi and Sissy
programme.desc: Cesar lends his hand reforming Great Dane Optimus, who has a biting attitude, and Sissy, a fearful Shepherd mix rescued from a terrible hoarding situation.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Buster, Jack & Marley and Sparky
programme.desc: Dog groomer Lauren asks Cesar for assistance with her three worst cases. Jennifer and Michael haven't been able to implement Cesar's techniques with one of their three dogs, head strong pit bull Sparky.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Maya, Sara, and Lilly
programme.desc: Maya, an adopted Border Collie/Spring Spaniel Mix loves to jump but is hurting her owner’s neck. Next we meet Sara, an overly-aggressive Shepherd mix and Lilly, a pushy Poodle.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Roxie & Foxy, Charlie, and Bubba & Lucky
programme.sub-title: Roxie & Foxy, Charlie, and Bubba & Lucky
programme.desc: Two Dachshunds are overprotective of their owners. A couple wants to keep their biting Lhasa Apso. A couple working from home calls in Cesar for some canine conflict resolution.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Power of the Pack
programme.desc: The pack is a vital tool. In this intimate and revealing episode, witness some of the most memorable moments and experience the power of the pack.

channel.desc: Cesar Millan is one of the most renowned and sought-after experts working in the field of dog training. This is not just a series about dog training, it’s people training for dogs. Each episode tackles real-life problems faced by dog owners everywhere.

programme.title: Baywatch: Scorcher
programme.desc: LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach. Lifeguarding gets more chaotic for the team when the Secret Service shows up to inform them that the President is going to go jogging on the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch: Beachblast
programme.desc: To sponsor the Special Olympics at the beach, Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast:" a live televised tournament. After being evicted from his apartment, Cody moves in with CJ and Caroline, creating a surplus of sexual tension.

programme.title: Baywatch: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Baywatch: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Baywatch: Buried
programme.desc: Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Baywatch: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Baywatch: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Baywatch: Bachelor of the Month
programme.desc: Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Baywatch: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Baywatch: Talk Show
programme.desc: Mitch gets his “15 minutes of fame” when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Life Guardian
programme.desc: After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Baywatch: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Baywatch: Rendez-vous
programme.desc: When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Baywatch: Hot Water
programme.desc: While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Baywatch: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Baywatch: Golden Girls
programme.desc: A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman – who doesn’t speak English.

channel.desc: On a Los Angeles beach, a team of lifeguards led by Lieutenant Mitch Buchannon saves lives, deals with personal tragedies, fights crime, and participates in extraordinary adventures every day.
