programme.title: Beyond Belief: Fact or Fiction: Episode 11
programme.desc: This episode features the following cases: Bon Voyage, The Man in the Model T, The Scoop, Angel on Board, Buenos Dias.

programme.title: Beyond Belief: Fact or Fiction
programme.desc: This episode features the following cases: The Hand, The Battered Doll, Poker Justice, Above the Clouds, Screen Saver.

channel.desc: This cult anthology series presents stories that appear to defy logic, ghosts, the supernatural and the divine, and offers the viewer a chance to decide what is fact and what is fiction.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: When the comic predicts that Dizzy will become a rock star, the "Dister" surprises everyone by entering a local "Canadian Idol" type contest.

programme.title: Dark Oracle
programme.desc: When Vern decides to use his expertise in the dark arts to grow his own "familiar", Cally and Lance use the comic clues to find it before the it hatches.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Devil Sells His Soul
programme.desc: Colonel March hypnotizes five people to solve the stabbing murder of Lord Telford, while he himself portrays the murder victim.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: Murder Is Permanent
programme.desc: Colonel March investigates a murder in a beauty salon; there are plenty of suspects and it's up to him to single out the murderer.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Silent Vow
programme.desc: A customer dies from poisoned wine dining at a café, and the waiter falls under suspicion because he was a former chemist.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: Death and the Other Monkey
programme.desc: A cancer research scientist believes his test monkey was not only stolen, but also replaced. He is later found dead from gas; suicide or not?

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Stolen Crime
programme.desc: A man demands to be arrested for murdering his wealthy wife whose death is attributed to natural causes. A valuable coin collection holds the answers.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: The Silver Curtain
programme.desc: Behind the "silver curtain" spray from a fountain, a man is found dead with a knife in his back. Colonel March is called in to investigate.

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard: Error At Daybreak
programme.desc: A shady businessman collapses on an oceanside jetty, the apparent victim of a heart attack, but March discovers blood and a needle near the body.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Prize
programme.desc: In Scandinavia, at a prize-awarding ceremony, Peter must rescue a writer being held for speaking out against her repressive government.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Flight into Darkness
programme.desc: Dr. Stephens believes his anti-gravity research will endanger mankind; he destroys the papers and disappears. Brady is summoned to track him down.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Decoy
programme.desc: Identical twins Toni and Terry Trent are a popular musical act, performing for the troops on a USO tour of Britain. Brady volunteers to help Toni when Terry disappears at a Soho hotel where she had earlier witnessed a murder.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The White Rabbit
programme.desc: French authorities call Peter when a doctor brings in a white rabbit she says materialized out of thin air before her eyes.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Man in Disguise
programme.desc: The Invisible man is investigating an international drug ring when his identity is stolen by a beautiful young woman and used to smuggle drugs.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Gun Runners
programme.desc: Terrorists in an Italian market gun down a family. This sparks an investigation into how the killers got the guns, which Peter is tasked with.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Man in Power
programme.desc: Brady aids the heirs of a Middle East king, who has been murdered by his power-crazy army chief to regain their father's throne.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 4
programme.desc: McQueen has a deprogramming center for demons, but Raphael is skeptical about reforming evil.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 5
programme.desc: Raphael must join Sara and Goodwin after they are transported into a demonic version of the Old West.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 6
programme.desc: A friend of Goodwin's is killed, leading Raphael to suspect demonic forces are behind a building.

programme.title: The Immortal: Episode 7
programme.desc: Sara discovers a TV production company is using its product to negatively influence viewers.

programme.title: Vampire virus
programme.desc: A young woman contracts a deadly virus after an unusual sexual encounter.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: About the inhabitants of a small Iowa town suddenly plagued by insanity and then death after a mysterious toxin contaminates their water supply.

channel.desc: Horror fans rejoice, your channel is alive. It’s a never ending fright-fest on Pluto TV Horror. Don’t turn on the lights, don’t answer the door, and don’t change that channel.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: New Lease on Life
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have near-death experience when Bob nearly crashes their car.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Fish at the Bat
programme.desc: Bob gets cajoled into joining his office softball team.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Book Club
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret join a book club in the hopes of expanding their tiny social horizon.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Candidate
programme.desc: Margaret finds herself inadvertently running for City Council when the candidate she is supporting drops out of the race.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Undefined Border
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret go cross-border shopping in the United States.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Strangers in a Strange Land
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret are mortified to discover that while they have been cooped up at Cookie and Melvin's house in Mississauga Ontario, their dogs have been left unattended by Penny, Bob's unreliable receptionist.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A New Life
programme.desc: At a creepy chiropodist social night, Bob and Margaret encounter a couple who are rapturous about the new planned community where they now live.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Getaway
programme.desc: Margaret is nominated for the Golden Arch Support award for outstanding service in the field of footcare.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob Gets Wired
programme.desc: When Margaret forgets to pay for some sprinkles at the local cake shop, she is hauled in as a shoplifter.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: My Foot Hurts
programme.desc: Margaret gets her own local call-in radio show entitled My Foot Hurts. On the first day, nervous and short on callers, she mentions her favourite curry house on the air?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Player
programme.desc: Bob attends a personal finance seminar to help him get his hopeless financial house in order.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Outward Bound
programme.desc: Bob joins his male colleagues on a canoe trip to a provincial park.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Bob or Two
programme.desc: Bob buys an inexpensive painting from the neighbours at a junk sale (mostly motivated by pity since these neighbours have fallen on hard times) and hangs it in his surgery to brighten things up?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Fly on the Wall
programme.desc: Feeling belittled by his family, Bob jumps at the chance to be the subject of a fly on the wall documentary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Gone to Seed
programme.desc: Bob decides to donate his sperm to a local sperm bank.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: No Trouble
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Discomfort of Strangers
programme.desc: Margaret fears that her relationship with Bob is getting stale after they have a petty argument.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Age Before Beauty
programme.desc: Margaret gets a new hairstyle but Bob doesn't even notice.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Cottage Country
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret get invited up to the cottage of Dr. Yoselheiffer, President of the Canadian Council of Dentists.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair
programme.sub-title: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair
programme.desc: When a patient dies of natural causes while in Bob's surgery, the local papers pick up the story?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween. It is also Bob father's birthday and his mother wants to celebrate by visiting his grave. Bob is not comfortable with this and tries to get out of it.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Neighbours
programme.desc: In this story of neighbourhood social angst, Bob is having a complex burglar alarm installed by Graham, a sad, lonely man whose confidence is lifted immeasurably by this rare sale to Bob.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Cuckoo in the Nest
programme.desc: When Bobs old friend Clive, (who is a real drunken slob), is dumped by his wife, Bob lets him stay for a few days despite Margaret's objections?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: I, Bob
programme.desc: When an efficiency expert comes to assess the Inner City Dental Clinic, Bob gets side shifted out of a job.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Driving Bob
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have put it off for too long. They need to get their Canadian drivers' licenses.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Dental Convention
programme.desc: The time for the annual dental convention has come. Bob is not keen on going when he sees that a colleague from his student days, Bernard Wiggins, a "loud mouthed big shot", is a featured speaker.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Til Death Do Us
programme.desc: Bob gets conned into buying a cemetery plot for Margaret as a surprise 15th wedding anniversary gift.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Mummy's Boy
programme.desc: Bobs mother is coming all the way from England to visit him.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Very Fishy Christmas
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret experience a truly Canadian Christmas.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob's Burglary
programme.desc: While Bob and Margaret are sleeping, the local criminals, Beany and Boney clear their house - TV, video, microwave and electric toothbrush all go.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Stranded in Toronto
programme.desc: When Bob and Margaret take a trip to New York, their flight is re-routed to Toronto due to a storm.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Holiday
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Animation, full of fun, weird, action-packed and classic cartoons that everyone can enjoy!

programme.title: On the Case: One of Their Own
programme.desc: The daughter of an FBI agent is abducted from the Tucson airport, where she had gone to pick up her husband. Months later, her body is found in a shallow grave, sparking what would become one of the FBI's longest homicide investigations.

programme.title: On the Case: The River's Edge
programme.desc: When seventeen year old high school student Stacey Fairchild disappears from a mall parking lot in Lancaster Ohio, police wonder if she ran away, was kidnapped for ransom or the victim of senseless murder.

programme.title: On the Case: Texts, Lies, and Videotape
programme.desc: When a young mother disappears, a series of text messages from her phone lead police to believe she left on her own. Then, her family uncovers evidence that she may have actually been the victim of foul play.

programme.title: On the Case: Hidden in Plain Sight
programme.desc: A nine year old girl scout disappears while delivering cookies to a neighbor.

programme.title: On the Case: A Predator in Deerfield
programme.desc: March 17, 1986 in Deerfield Beach, Florida 5- year-old Stacy Savage happily bounded up the street to the spot where her mother Angela Savage and her little brother met her after school. But when Stacy got there, her mother was nowhere to be found

programme.title: On the Case: Christina's Story
programme.desc: When a young girl vanishes while walking her dog on a military base, it marks the beginning of a missing persons case that would capture the hearts of the entire county.

programme.title: On the Case: Dreams and Nightmares
programme.desc: An 18-year-old woman is murdered the night before her college career is about to begin.

programme.title: On the Case: Unfinished Journey
programme.desc: Jamie Bowie disappears while driving from Phoenix to Los Angeles on Interstate 10, then her body is found near the highway a month later.

programme.title: On the Case: Circled by Vultures
programme.desc: A tourist takes a photo of vultures in Joshua Tree National Park and inadvertently discovers a gruesome homicide.

programme.title: On the Case: Classified Murder
programme.desc: A couple answers a classified ad to buy a collectible motorcycle, but is never seen again. The ad turns out to be an untraceable fake, and the case will go cold for years until an unlikely witness comes forward.

programme.title: On the Case: A Complicated Relationship
programme.desc: A beloved mother of four disappears just days after her stepdaughter vanished. Police must investigate to find out if their complicated relationship led to tragedy.

programme.title: On the Case: Stolen Dreams
programme.desc: John Greathouse finds his stepdaughter, Kelli Bailey, murdered in her bedroom; investigators find a video tape and a dead man's forged check and hope these clues will be the keys to bringing Bailey's cold-blooded killer to justice.

programme.title: On the Case: Ring of Truth
programme.desc: When a young woman's body is discovered high in the San Bernardino Mountains, detectives must figure out who she was and how she got there before they can catch the cold blooded killer who murdered her.

programme.title: On the Case: Footsteps in the Dark
programme.desc: A beautiful young woman's is murdered in a dark parking lot. Did she know her killer or was she the victim of a deadly predator?

programme.title: On the Case: What Happened to Sarah
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl's mysterious runaway note raises difficult questions for police. Had she really left home on her own or had someone close to her pieced together writing from her journals to cover up an unthinkable crime.

programme.title: On the Case: Betrayal in Big Cottonwood Canyon
programme.desc: A young woman is ambushed and murdered in Utah's Big Cottonwood Canyon.

channel.desc: On The Case explores intriguing murder mysteries through in-depth interviews with those closest to the case and examines the forensic evidence that helped unravel the mysteries.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Sydney's on the hunt for a Pirate's booty, but will a traitor force her to walk the plank?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Women Want to Know
programme.desc: Sydney has found a temple with an idol of Ganesha and it is being filmed for TV, but they get trapped inside when the local rebels stumble onto them. Can Nigel and Karen help from USA?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Star of Nadir
programme.desc: An anonymous Sultan's wife Danielle dies in mysterious circumstances in the desert. However, she had called for Sydney to help. Sydney believes Danielle was searching for the Star of Nadir.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Hunting with the Enemy
programme.desc: An urn commissioned in a Cambodian monastery by the Chinese emperor for the remains of Confucius is about to be destroyed by systematic bombing of a whole province.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Under the Ice
programme.desc: Despite terrible weather, Sidney drags Nigel along to an Arctic base where an ancient Indian mummy has been found, who turns out to be an Anasazi.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Antianeirai
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel travel to Istanbul to investigate the death of one Sydney's friends, a professor who was trying to prove Hercules did exist by finding the Belt of Hippolyte.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E5 - Promises
programme.desc: Everyone finally reunites on Moya. But Aeryn returns with Scorpius, who claims to have saved the former Peacekeeper's life.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E6 - Natural Election
programme.desc: Crichton correctly predicts a wormhole's appearance near Moya, but simultaneously a giant space plant captures the Leviathan.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E7 - John Quixote
programme.desc: Crichton and Chiana get stuck in a video game where they encounter strange/twisted versions of their friends.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E8 - I Shrink Therefore I Am
programme.sub-title: Farscape: S4 E8 - I Shrink Therefore I Am
programme.desc: When Moya is raided by bounty hunters working for the Peacekeepers, every crew member is captured except for Crichton and Noranti.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E9 - A Prefect Murder
programme.sub-title: Farscape: S4 E9 - A Prefect Murder
programme.desc: While Moya and her crew are resupplying on a generally xenophobic planet, Aeryn kills the next prefect while under a strange form of suggestion.

channel.desc: FARSCAPE, THE DEAD ZONE (Anthony Michael Hall) and RELIC HUNTER (Tia Carrere), watch them all right here on Pluto TV Sci-fi Series, where imagination knows no bounds. Take a journey through space & time to watch all the best sci-fi series in the galaxy!

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Wrongly Released
programme.desc: This special episode shines a light on criminals who have been brought to justice for one crime only to be released to commit further terrible acts.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Ann Maguire
programme.desc: The tragic story of Ann Maguire, who was stabbed to death by a teenage pupil while teaching a Spanish lesson at Corpus Christi Catholic College in Leeds.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Beverly Allitt
programme.desc: Beverley Allitt was thought to be a 'model' nurse. Very astute, caring and always willing to help, why did she murder four children and attempt to kill 11 others?

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Steven Wright
programme.desc: A closer look at the crimes of Steve Wright, who was dubbed 'The Suffolk Strangler' after murdering five women who worked as prostitutes in Ipswich in 2006.

programme.title: Robbie Coltrane's Critical Evidence: Dead Man's Hollow: Nishan Bakunts
programme.desc: In 2002, an off-duty fireman discovered a body in a field charred beyond all recognition. All the police knew was that the man had died a brutal death, having been stabbed repeatedly, shot in the head, and drenched in petrol before being set alight.

programme.title: Robbie Coltrane's Critical Evidence: Countryside Killings: Graham Backhouse
programme.desc: Robbie Coltrane examines why Graham Backhouse attempted to kill his wife with a car bomb before murdering his neighbour in 1984.

programme.title: Robbie Coltrane's Critical Evidence: Far From Home: Kyu Soo Kim
programme.sub-title: Far From Home: Kyu Soo Kim
programme.desc: Robbie Coltrane examines the harrowing case of a London landlord who sadistically tortured and murdered two of his tenants.

programme.title: Robbie Coltrane's Critical Evidence: Bodies Of Evidence: Roger Severs
programme.desc: In November 1993, Derek and Eileen Severs disappeared without a word. When police spoke to their son, Roger, he insisted they were on holiday. However, there was no evidence of this apparent trip, and Roger was soon arrested on suspicion of murder.

programme.title: Robbie Coltrane's Critical Evidence: DNA Of A Murder: Andrew George
programme.sub-title: DNA Of A Murder: Andrew George
programme.desc: Hilda Murrell, a 78-year-old distinguished rose-grower, was found dead in woodland near her home town. Despite a huge investigation by the British police, detectives failed to find her killer and conspiracy theories muddied the waters still further.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Stephanie Slater
programme.desc: Estate agent Stephanie Slater reveals the story of her abduction, rape and incarceration, which occurred in 1992 whilst showing a man around a house.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Omagh Bombing
programme.desc: Survivors, victims' relatives and former detectives reflect on the Real IRA car bomb that killed 29 people in Omagh, Northern Ireland in 1998.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Shipman
programme.desc: Doctor Harold Shipman was convicted of killing 15 patients in 2000, but he is thought to have killed up to 215. Discover how he was eventually caught by detectives.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Dale Cregan
programme.desc: It's 2012 and drug dealer Dale Cregan murders police officers Nicola Hughes and Fiona Bone. Dermot Murnaghan investigates.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Manchester
programme.desc: The series returns to take a closer look at the most horrific crimes ever committed on British soil, starting with the May 2017 Manchester Arena bombing.

programme.title: Homicide: Hours To Kill: Five Million Reasons For Murder
programme.desc: Five Million Reasons For Murder: Reality series following US detectives as they reconstruct murder victims' catastrophic final hours to help catch their killers.

programme.title: Homicide: Hours To Kill: A Murder in Marietta

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
programme.desc: Bear and Joseph Gordon-Levitt navigate Kenya's unyielding terrain; Joseph and Bear navigate a perilous rappel, milk a camel for hydration, ascend a massive rock dome and battle a crocodile for dinner; Joseph talks about his family and rise to fame.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Kate Hudson
programme.desc: Oscar-nominated actress Kate Hudson goes on a journey with Bear that involves a treacherous mountain range in Italy; Kate shares details of her unique upbringing.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Ed Helms
programme.desc: Actor Ed Helms faces sheer cliffs, crumbling rock and a cringeworthy dinner menu while atop Colorado mountains; Helms discusses the road to his career in comedy.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Shaquille O'Neal
programme.desc: Bear and NBA legend Shaquille O'Neal are lifted from a freight train via helicopter and whisked away to a dense forest in the remote Adirondacks; they face blood-sucking leeches, and a 200-foot rock face as they search for their exit.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Ben Stiller
programme.desc: Ben Stiller travels to Northern Scotland to face the Isle of Skye's rugged mountains. Stiller discusses his background while they navigate slippery terrain, searching for food and clean water.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Lost in the African Bush
programme.desc: Private plane crashes in the Kalahari Desert. Two of the surviving passengers decide to leave their injured party behind without food or water in order to find help.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: A Walk into Hell
programme.desc: In June 1996, a group of 5 teenage scouts and 3 adult guides hiked into the Grand Canyon during a heatwave; the route was an off-trail route in the vicinity of the Nankoweap Trail.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Ice Cave Survivor
programme.desc: A Father and Son initially enjoy their experiences, but a sudden snowstorm wreaks havoc and they are forced to spend a night in a cave without any supplies or food.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Alaskan Avalanche
programme.desc: Two climbers and close friends are scaling an ice wall near Alaska’s Mount Johnson when Jim falls down and suffers some major injuries.

programme.title: I Shouldn't Be Alive: Crash in a Volcano
programme.desc: When a Hollywood camera crew set out to film an active volcano they end up in a helicopter crash into the active volcano. All rescue attempts are delayed by lava, toxic gases and bad weather.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: In this episode of Parts Unknown, Tony returns to one of his favourite places on Earth, Vietnam.He journeys to a city he has never been to, Hu?, The City of Ghosts.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Welcome to Putin’s Russia. If you don’t fall into line, you could be the target of a show trial and be thrown into a penal colony. But if you’re hungry you might actually find something worth eating.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: With the slight relaxation of control by the government of Myanmar, Tony is finally able to explore one of the most fabled and beautiful areas of Asia.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Libyan hip-hop, Italian restaurants, tribal allegiances and post-war uncertainty in Libya. Bourdain looks at the country through personal stories, food, and the music of anti-Qaddafi rapper expats.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: A country of only six million people where a vast percentage of the land is steaming hot jungle or a huge scrub desert known simply as The Chaco. This is one of the least known nations in the world.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: For the first time, Tony visits Budapest, 25 years after democracy planted its flag –alongside the Oscar-winning master of light, cinematographer Vilmos Zsigmond, as one of his key guides.

channel.desc: Are you a fan of loud guitars and killer riffs? MTV Rocks offers you the best mix of rock music videos.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Season 9 Reunion Part 1
programme.desc: Dr. Drew and Nessa begin the biggest reunion ever by chatting with each of the moms, but conflict between Jenelle & Nessa leads to major drama.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Season 9 Reunion Part 2
programme.desc: Jenelle returns to discuss her final season of TM2, Kail and Vee look back at their tumultuous past, Briana calls out Devoin, and Chelsea opens up about her post-partum issues.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Season 9 Reunion Part 3
programme.desc: Kailyn announces the newest member of the Teen Mom 2 cast. Jace's dad, Andrew, makes an appearance for the first time since the first Teen Mom 2 Reunion. Cole and Aubrey join Chelsea on stage.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Reunion Part 1
programme.desc: Chelsea and Leah meet Jade and discuss their similarities. Kail defends her parenting decisions and Briana reveals where things really went wrong with John. Later, Leah is joined by Jeremy on stage.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jarrod & Abby
programme.desc: How do young people who've embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others they've never met in person before. The problem -- that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kya & Alyx
programme.desc: In this episode we meet Kya and Alyx, who fell in love quickly after meeting online. Are they being honest with each other? Hosts Nev Schulman and Max Joseph investigate.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Joe & Kari Ann
programme.desc: Joe was sceptical when Miss Teen USA, Kari, sent him a friend request. Now, after months of communication, Joe thinks it might be the real deal, and he might have found love with her.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tyler & Amanda
programme.desc: After a year and a half of chatting with her online, Tyler thinks he may have a future with Amanda. But are Tyler's friends correct because they suspect that something isn't right?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rod & Ebony
programme.desc: Rod met Ebony on a dating web site four years ago, now it's time for the two to meet in person. Is Ebony who she says she is? What will happen when they meet in real life for the first time?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Stephanie & David
programme.desc: Catfish brings together couples who've interacted solely through screens. In this edition, Stephanie searches for the man she's been talking to in an unseen episode.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rico & Ja'Mari
programme.desc: Rico wants to move to England to care for his ailing mother, but his intense online relationship with Ja'mari, an international male model, is giving him second thoughts about leaving.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Felicia
programme.desc: Mike and Felicia met online and soon hit it off. After agreeing to meet, Felicia stood Mike up, offering only thin excuses. Can Mike trust Felicia - or will he end up disappointed?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Cassie & Steve
programme.desc: Cassie was on a downward spiral until she got a friend request from a rapper named Steve. Two and a half years later, Cassie and Steve are engaged - but they have yet to meet.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ramon & Paola
programme.desc: Ramon met Paola on Facebook and established an exclusive online relationship. But after many failed attempts to video chat, is she really who he thinks she is?

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: With Charlotte back in the house, all eyes are on Gary and Marnie and whether they'll decide to continue sleeping together. (S8, ep4)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: Things kick off in the house as Aaron hears Vicky and the girls slagging him off on the eve of his third date with Vicky. (S8,ep5)

programme.title: Geordie Shore
programme.desc: New boy Kyle gets properly settled into the house by spending the night with Holly, and the Geordies take Tash on Tours international as they jet off to Reykjavik, Iceland for some partying. (S8, ep6)

channel.desc: Catch all of your favourite MTV reality shows together on one exclusive channel, MTV Pluto TV. Featuring Catfish, 16 & Pregnant, Teen Mom, Geordie Shore and more!

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Sacred Sites
programme.desc: Ancient in architecture and detailed in design, these man-made masterpieces stand as testaments to the strength of human faith. These sites endure as a timeless reminder of resilience, respect, and the need to reflect.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coasts
programme.desc: Along coasts, one element ends and another begins. No two days are ever the same on a coastline: the only thing that remains a constant is the timeless power of the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanoes
programme.desc: There are few sights on earth as compelling as a volcanic eruption. Volcanoes have the potential to cause death and widespread destruction in a heartbeat, but they also give rise to new life and ecosystems.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Cruises
programme.desc: There is something seductive about setting sail. Cruises offer us a chance to dip our toes into the 70% of our planet awash with oceans, rivers, and lakes, exploring places that can only be reached by daring to leave the shore.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Deserts
programme.desc: For all their reputation as inhospitable places, deserts are full of incredible plants and animals that have adapted to the climate. They are bursting with geological wonders that inspire and are home to some of the most life in the world.

channel.desc: The world is full of inspiring places. World’s Greatest goes on a breathtaking journey around the planet, revealing the best cities, natural wonders, animal encounters, journeys and adventures, monuments, and islands.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Back/The Ballad Of Buster Baxter
programme.sub-title: Buster's Back/The Ballad Of Buster Baxter
programme.desc: Buster's coming home! The word spreads fast, but so does the fear that Buster will be different. Then, it seems to Buster, not only have his friends changed while he was gone, but they've forgotten all about him! Will he ever fit in again?

programme.title: Arthur: When Duty Calls – Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: Ladonna finds out the Army is transferring her dad to Oregon, and the whole Compson family is moving again. Fern and the others can tell Ladonna is upset, but don’t know how to help. What can they do to make the transition easier?

programme.title: Arthur: Flippity Francine/Muffy Takes the Wheel
programme.desc: When Muffy posts a goofy video of Francine on the Muffington Post, Francine worries she will become the laughing stock of the entire school. And it's the 1st Annual Lakewood Derby and Muffy's revved up!

programme.title: Arthur: No Acting Please/Prunella Deegan and the Disappointing Ending
programme.sub-title: No Acting Please/Prunella Deegan and the Disappointing Ending
programme.desc: When Fern lands a role in a community production, she fears she's not talented enough to be a star. Finally, the final volume of the Henry Screever series is out. Prunella and Marina compete to see who can finish the book the fastest.

programme.title: Arthur: So Long, Spanky/Buster's New Friend
programme.desc: D.W.'s beloved bird gets very sick, and despite D.W.'s eager ministrations, Spanky dies. Can she risk giving her heart to another pet? Then, Buster doesn't have time for Arthur. And all he wants to talk about is a new friend named Mike.

programme.title: Arthur: The Wheel Deal/The Buster Report
programme.desc: After an injury, Brain has to spend some time using a wheelchair. Will he be able to compete in a basketball tournament for charity? The kids are assigned to write a report on someone they admire, and George picks….Buster!

programme.title: Arthur: Blabbermouth/All Grown Up
programme.desc: Buster is hurt when he learns his friends don't trust him to keep a secret. Then, the gang finds a mysterious fortune telling game at the library and gets a hint of what their futures could hold.

programme.title: Arthur: Best Wishes/The Tardy Tumbler
programme.desc: After George has a lucky streak, his friends pressure him to wish for a snow day. Can George deliver? Prunella's excited about making the gymnastics team, until she realizes practice starts at 6am! Will she practice or snooze?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Sells Out/Mind Your Manners
programme.desc: To earn the money for a new video game, Arthur decides to sell his old toys through his school's Web site. The Tibble Twins want to take Grandmother out to dinner, but she'd rather stay home. Is it because of their terrible table manners?

programme.title: Arthur: The Lousy Week/You Are Arthur
programme.desc: An army of lice has descended on the heads of Lakewood Elementary. Who or what is strong enough to defeat them? What if you could be Arthur for a day? View Arthur's life through his very own eyes for this special episode.

programme.title: Arthur: Pick a Car, Any Car/Jenna's Bedtime Blues
programme.sub-title: Pick a Car, Any Car/Jenna's Bedtime Blues
programme.desc: The family car is broken, and so is Arthur's heart. How can Mom and Dad even think of replacing it? It’s Muffy's annual slumber party, and Jenna is finally invited! But what if the other girls discover that she's an occasional bed-wetter?

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella's Tent of Portent/Mutiny on the Pitch
programme.sub-title: Prunella's Tent of Portent/Mutiny on the Pitch
programme.desc: At the Elwood City Picnic, Prunella pretends she can see the future at her fortune telling booth. The Lakewood Elementary soccer team has had enough of Francine's bossy behavior.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Birthday/Francine Frensky, Superstar
programme.desc: Only four more days until Arthur's birthday party! But to Arthur's horror, it turns out Muffy's having her birthday party on the very same day. And, now that Francine finally has the lead in a school play, she's has become a stage tyrant.

programme.title: Arthur: Feeling Flush/Family Fortune
programme.desc: During a drought, Francine bets Arthur that her family can use less water than his. The TV show, Treasure Caravan, is coming to Elwood City! Arthur and D.W. are convinced they'll find treasures that will make them rich and famous.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Baby/D.W.'s Baby
programme.desc: Arthur is not too sure he's ready for a new baby in the house. What do babies do besides cry? Then, living with a baby is no picnic. Just how long will Baby Kate be hanging around, anyway? And who would even miss D.W. if she ran away?

programme.title: Arthur: Vomitrocious!/Sue Ellen Chickens Out
programme.desc: It's just a regular day until Francine starts to feel queasy, and then throws up in the cafeteria! Now Francine is afraid to go back to school. And, Sue Ellen learns that a fast-food chain is taking over the beloved Sugar Bowl.

programme.title: Arthur: Hide And Snake/Muffy's New Best Friend
programme.sub-title: Hide And Snake/Muffy's New Best Friend
programme.desc: The kids capture a snake and learn that it's possibly poisonous--after it gets lost in Arthur's house! Why is Muffy interviewing for a new best friend? She and Francine are usually inseparable, but lately it seems they have less in common.

programme.title: Arthur: Unfinished/D.W., Bossy Boots
programme.desc: Arthur is completely riveted by a book and can't wait to see how it ends. But the last few pages are missing! Now what? For D.W., there's nothing better than getting her own way--that is, until all her friends stop playing with her.

programme.title: Arthur: Attack Of The Turbo Tibbles/D.W. Tricks The Tooth Fairy
programme.sub-title: Attack Of The Turbo Tibbles/D.W. Tricks The Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: If you think the Tibbles are bad now, imagine what they'd be like if they had super powers! Then, D.W. needs money, quick. When she tries to pull a fast one on the Tooth Fairy, will Arthur have to pay?

programme.title: Arthur: Cast Away/The Great Sock Mystery
programme.desc: Arthur is thrilled when Dad invites him to go fly-fishing for the weekend. But a change in plans forces them to include D.W. Find out once and for all where socks disappear to when Baby Kate and Pal team up to solve the great sock mystery.

programme.title: Arthur: Baseball Blues/Brain's Biggest Blunder
programme.desc: It's Grebelings season and George can't wait to play! After all, no one knows more about baseball than George. Then, wBrain gets teamed with Buster and Binky in the annual Arithmattack competition.

programme.title: Arthur: The Butler Did...What?/The Trouble with Trophies
programme.sub-title: The Butler Did...What?/The Trouble with Trophies
programme.desc: Bailey is missing! Muffy discovers a series of clues and is left wondering, who exactly IS Bailey? Then, everyone loves getting trophies, right? It turns out that Fern could not care less about them.

programme.title: Arthur: Background Blues/And Now Let's Talk To Some Kids
programme.sub-title: Background Blues/And Now Let's Talk To Some Kids
programme.desc: Wouldn't it be cool to find out that your ancestors were famous frontier explorers? But what if they were just...plain folks? The Magic Toolbox show is coming to Ratburn's class to put the kids on TV!

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen Adds It Up/Wish You Were Here
programme.sub-title: Sue Ellen Adds It Up/Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Math, schmath. That's what Sue Ellen thinks… until she runs into a problem her artistic vision can't solve. Sue Ellen can't wait to meet her pen pal in person.

programme.title: Arthur: Bully for Binky/Misfortune Teller
programme.desc: Is Binky Barnes really the most disgusting, nasty, horrible person on the planet, or is he just misunderstood? Next, what's got four sides and the answer to everything? Prunella's cootie catcher!

programme.title: Arthur: Two Minutes/Messy Dress Mess
programme.desc: Power shifts in the Tibble household when the twins find out Tommy is two minutes older than Timmy. Ladonna's thrilled when Muffy loans her a beautiful recital dress, but a run-in with a painted bench creates a problem.

programme.title: Arthur: Big Horns George/Bleep
programme.desc: George is inspired to write and perform his own blues song when he's introduced to the music of Koko Taylor. And, D.W. overhears a mysterious word she doesn’t know the meaning of. Can D.W. risk the consequences of blurting out <"BLEEP!">?

channel.desc: Based on the beloved books by Marc Brown, these are the adventures of Arthur, an 8-year-old aardvark, and his family and friends as they grow up and learn how to be good neighbours to one another.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Lost Tanks of D-Day
programme.desc: In Normandy, June 6, 1944, a dozen Sherman tanks equipped with floats, the famous Duplex Drives (DD), leave their ship to swim to Omaha Beach... not all of them make it.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Last Flight of the B-17
programme.sub-title: The Last Flight of the B-17
programme.desc: Twenty-six metres beneath the waves at the foot of the majestic Calvi Citadel in Corsica lies an American plane from the Second World War.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: Secret Bunkers of Omaha Beach
programme.desc: On June 6th 1944, Lieutenant-colonel Rudder’s Rangers company climbs the cliffs of the Pointe du Hoc in Normandy with the mission to destroy the German cannons.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Tragic Sinking of Leopoldville
programme.desc: On the 24th of December 1944, 2 237 American soldiers of the 66th Infantry Division are aboard the Steamer Léopoldville.

programme.title: WWII's The Great Escapes: The Freedom Trails: Slovenia: The Crow's Flight
programme.desc: Monty heads to Slovenia to retrace one of the most daring, yet unknown, mass escapes of Allied prisoners during the second world war, made possible only with the help of partisans and locals.

programme.title: WWII's The Great Escapes: The Freedom Trails: Italy: The Sulmona Trail
programme.desc: Monty follows the route taken by prisoner of war Len Harley, who spent months on the run before braving snow, ice, and Nazi patrols to escape over the mountains of the Majella in Italy.

programme.title: WWII's The Great Escapes: The Freedom Trails: Italy: Operation Galia
programme.desc: Monty’s journey sees him follow the path 33 SAS soldiers took after they were parachuted behind enemy lines to attack the enemy and create chaos to draw Nazi-fascist forces away from the front line.

programme.title: WWII's The Great Escapes: The Freedom Trails: France and Spain: The Pyrenees
programme.desc: Monty treks one of the toughest and most famous freedom trails out of Nazi controlled France, taking him through the valleys and high ridges of the Pyrenees mountains and into Spain.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Lost Tanks of D-Day
programme.desc: In Normandy, June 6, 1944, a dozen Sherman tanks equipped with floats, the famous Duplex Drives (DD), leave their ship to swim to Omaha Beach... not all of them make it.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Last Flight of the B-17
programme.sub-title: The Last Flight of the B-17
programme.desc: Twenty-six metres beneath the waves at the foot of the majestic Calvi Citadel in Corsica lies an American plane from the Second World War.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: Secret Bunkers of Omaha Beach
programme.desc: On June 6th 1944, Lieutenant-colonel Rudder’s Rangers company climbs the cliffs of the Pointe du Hoc in Normandy with the mission to destroy the German cannons.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Tragic Sinking of Leopoldville
programme.desc: On the 24th of December 1944, 2 237 American soldiers of the 66th Infantry Division are aboard the Steamer Léopoldville.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: The battles of the first world war were battles of attrition and trenches; the battles of the second world war were vastly different. In this episode we study tank battles, blitzkrieg, commando raids, amphibious landings, and mobile warfare in the desert.

programme.title: World War II: Battles Won and Lost
programme.desc: The second world war was conflict on an unprecedented scale. Its battles set new marks for the sheer size of forces deployed and for the power of their weapons. In this episode we study the first battle at sea, and the largest army to have ever marched.

channel.desc: Look behind the important battles, daring bombing raids, and devastating amounts of bloodshed that helped shape British history. Watch key events as you’ve never seen before in colourised archive footage providing new windows into the past.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jesse & Brian
programme.desc: Jesse met Brian online. They made plans to meet, but Brian stood her up. Now, years later, Brian has asked her to live with him. But, she can't stop wondering - what is Brian hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ayissha & Sydney
programme.desc: Sydney and Ayissha were in an online romance for years before Sydney revealed she is not who she says. But Ayissha still loves her and seeks Nev and Max's help. (S4, ep16)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Brittany & Bryon
programme.desc: Brittany finds love online with Bryon, a marine who may get deployed again to Iraq, she seeks Nev and Max's help before she runs out of time to discover if the perfect military man is real. (S4, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Felipe & Jasmine
programme.desc: Single father Felipe is ready to settle down with Jasmine. However, the two have been talking online for eight months and have never met. Max returns and joins Nev to investigate. (S4, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Aaliyah & Alicia
programme.desc: Aaliyah has been able to share her life struggles with Alicia. However, despite living only 70 blocks away, Alicia refuses to meet her as she hasn't come out to her friends and family yet.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antwane & Tony
programme.desc: Nev and Max are contacted by Carmen who is sounding the alarm on behalf of her cousin, Antwane. He's been in a three-year romance with a man named Tony that he met on a telephone chat line.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Craig & Zoe
programme.desc: Craig's sister introduced him to a beautiful girl named Zoe on Facebook. After talks online of a future life together, things turn sour. Now he wants to know who he gave his heart to.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Devan & Rylan
programme.desc: For shy Devan, meeting Rylan was love at first click. Devan wants to believe that Rylan is marriage material but her suspicious behaviour is leaving him with doubts. (S4, ep18)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Blaire & Markie
programme.desc: When Blaire's Instagram lover Markie broke her heart, she moved on. But now Markie is back and wants to meet. Blaire needs Nev and Max's help to make it happen and reveal Markie's secret. (S4, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rod & Ebony
programme.desc: Rod met Ebony on a dating web site four years ago, now it's time for the two to meet in person. Is Ebony who she says she is? What will happen when they meet in real life for the first time?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Thad & Sara
programme.desc: Thaddius sought refuge from his struggling marriage through an online relationship with Sara. When she starts telling tales of seizures and kidnappings, he starts to question her identity. (S4, ep14)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jordan & Austin
programme.desc: After two years of chatting, Jordan believes Austin is the one. But every time they arrange to meet, Austin cancels. Can Julie and Oobah finally bring them together? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harlin
programme.desc: Julie and Oobah uncover more than they were expecting, as their search to help Emma find her online love Harlin takes a sinister turn. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jamey and Ari
programme.desc: Jamey fell for Ari online, and he will do anything to meet her, but she will only do it on TV! Nev and Max help Ari share her story, and she hopes Jamey will accept her as she is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Courtney & Isaak
programme.desc: Courtney broke up with Isaak, who she met online. He's doing everything to get her back. Beauty queen Cassidy Wolf joins Nev to get Isaak to leave Courtney alone for good.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Miracle & Javonni
programme.desc: Smart, single mum Miracle fell for Javonni, a dreamy-eyed Instagrammer. With Max on hiatus, Nev teams up with TV personality Charlamagne to take Miracle on a hunt for the man of her dreams.

channel.desc: Catfish: The TV Show" tackles the mystery and complexities of dating in a digital world. Nev Schulman and Max Joseph take viewers on a journey that goes inside the stories of young people as their online-only romantic relationships collide with real-life.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 120
programme.desc: Franklin needs to let Erica, his friend of 5 years, know how he really feels about her. Wayne, a rapper, reveals his true feelings to Megan.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 110
programme.desc: After going to the last two proms with Taylor as friends, Polly is ready to upgrade her relationship. Stephanie wants to retire her party girl image and ask Josh to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Hills: I Heidi Take Thee Spencer / Don't Cry On Your Birthday
programme.sub-title: I Heidi Take Thee Spencer / Don't Cry On Your Birthday
programme.desc: When Lauren and Heidi have a run-in, they put their feud aside and remember why they used to be friends. Justin shocks Audrina by whisking her away to Palm Springs! Last in the series. (S4, ep20)

programme.title: The Hills: New City, New Drama
programme.desc: Lauren moves from Laguna Beach to Los Angeles for an internship at Teen Vogue, and fashion school. Can she juggle work, school, partying, and all of the drama that will follow? (S1, ep1)

programme.title: The Hills: A Change of Plans
programme.desc: Lauren has to face her boss after the party. Meanwhile, Heidi doesn't take school seriously and makes different plans for her future. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The Hills: An Unexpected Call
programme.desc: Teen Vogue sends Lauren on an over-night errand that lands her in New York City, Heidi learns that work in party promotion isn't just a party, and Audrina looks to Brian for love. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The Hills: Lauren and Jason: Part 2
programme.desc: When Jason, Lauren's ex flame from Laguna Beach, reappears in her life, Lauren thinks she may not be over him. Meanwhile, Heidi asks if the price of a new job is worth paying for. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The Hills: Jason's Birthday
programme.desc: After a Teen Vogue event, Lauren hurries to get home to Jason for his birthday. However, things don't end up so well when Jason only wants to hang out with his friends. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, & an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: The City: Working Girls
programme.desc: Whitney wonders if working with a friend is a good idea when Roxy steps out of line on day one. Olivia wins Joe Zee's approval on a new project at ELLE, but Erin isn't impressed. (S1, ep15)

programme.title: The City: Its All Who You Know
programme.desc: Whitney goes behind Kelly's back to show her fashion designs to Bergdorf Goodman. Olivia shocks Erin by using her fashion world connections to succeed at her biggest ELLE task. (S1, ep16)

programme.title: The City: Meet the Fackelmayers
programme.desc: Whitney meets some cute brothers. Olivia thrives at an ELLE Magazine cocktail party & Erin reminds her that the fashion business isn't just about who you know but what you know. (S1, ep17)

programme.title: The City: Hit It And Quit It
programme.desc: Whitney grows cautious about Freddie just as her ex, Jay, comes back into the picture. Roxy clashes with Olivia when People's Revolution and Elle join forces to put on a party. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: The Hills: Boyfriends and Work Don't Mix
programme.desc: Jason becomes a distraction in Lauren's life, Heidi finally gets her big chance to work in the nightclub, and when a model drops out from a Teen Vogue fashion show, Whitney steps in. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The Hills: Somebody Always Has to Cry
programme.desc: It's the gang's first holiday in LA but not everyone gets what they wish for. A New Year's kiss is hard to come by for Lauren when Jason learns she got a call from an old flame. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: You Can't Just Be With Me?
programme.sub-title: You Can't Just Be With Me?
programme.desc: Jason wants to make Lauren's 20th birthday special, but when she lies to him about working with male models for a Teen Vogue assignment, their relationship is put to the test. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: The Hills: Love is Not a Maybe Thing
programme.sub-title: Love is Not a Maybe Thing
programme.desc: Heidi decides she's had enough drama with Jordan. When she turns to the girls for advice, she realises what she has to do. And are Lauren and Jason's fighting days finally behind them? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The Hills: Timing is Everything
programme.desc: Lauren's work at LA Fashion Week brings a career opportunity of a lifetime, but she's torn between her job and Jason. Whitney leaves LA; Heidi and Audrina are single in the city. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Weekend at Freddie's
programme.desc: On a weekend trip to the Hamptons, Whitney finds out some surprising news about Freddie. Erin has to pick up the slack when Olivia drops the ball on a big interview assignment. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: The City: Friends And Foe-Workers
programme.desc: When Whitney fights with Roxy at Miami Fashion Week, Kelly questions if they should work together. Erin expects Joe to come down hard on Olivia, but things don't go as she hoped. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: The City: Forget About Boys
programme.desc: Whitney and Roxy go on a series of dates ending in a blow-up at a club. When Olivia gets preferential treatment on a photoshoot, Erin reveals the real reasons she dislikes Olivia. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: The City: If You Want Something Done Right...
programme.sub-title: If You Want Something Done Right...
programme.desc: Whitney lets Roxy work on a big project, even though Kelly thinks Roxy can't be trusted. When Olivia comes up short for a new assignment, she and Erin have a huge fight. (s1, ep22)

programme.title: The City: Everything on The Line
programme.desc: A sales presentation with Bergdorf Goodman doesn't go as Whitney hoped, but it leads to an even bigger opportunity. Erin & Olivia work together to put Joe Zee on the Today Show. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: The City: Show 'Em What You Got
programme.desc: Whitney shows her line at NY Fashion Week when one of Kelly's designers drops out. Joe Zee solves the issues between Erin & Olivia by promoting Olivia to an on-camera interviewer. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: The City: Friends In High Places
programme.desc: Kelly pushes Whitney to market her line after her first fashion show. Olivia refuses to support Whitney's line at ELLE Magazine, but Erin goes over her head to Joe Zee. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: SOS
programme.desc: A new celeb arrives which threatens Sofie and Kori. Kaz continues struggling to live with her ex Theo, Nathan and Tommy make up and the Shack Of Secrets is revealed much to KC's horror. (S2, ep3)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Secret Kisses
programme.desc: KC's ex Michael enters from the Shack Of Secrets, leaving everyone floored by his heartfelt apology. Kori and Ella get closer while Theo and KC have a secret kiss. (S2, ep4)

programme.title: NEW EPISODES Celebrity Ex on the Beach: Loose Lips
programme.desc: Michael's secret mission is revealed in the Shack Of Secrets but could his loose lips bite him in the butt. An ex spells trouble for Kori and Ella and KC gets the green light from Kaz. (S2, ep5)

channel.desc: If you like relationship drama, fake tan, and extraordinarily white teeth then MTV Reality is the channel for you! From wild nights out on the Geordie Shore, to the glamour of the LA Hills, MTV Reality is the ultimate guilty pleasure!

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Star of Nadir
programme.desc: An anonymous Sultan's wife Danielle dies in mysterious circumstances in the desert. However, she had called for Sydney to help. Sydney believes Danielle was searching for the Star of Nadir.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?

programme.title: Renegade: Liar's Poker
programme.desc: A woman escapes from a correctional facility and goes on the run. Reno and Bobby take on the case and enlist the help of a local Sheriff.

programme.title: Renegade: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Reno poses as a ranch hand once again and uncovers a plot where con artists are selling illegitimate horses as supposed top thoroughbreds.

programme.title: Renegade: An Uncle in the Business
programme.desc: Reno goes to see Lisa, the daughter of the hit man who was sent to kill him. While he's there, someone breaks into the house.

programme.title: Renegade: Offshore Thunder
programme.desc: A well publicized death at a regatta gets Reno's attention when he sees his dead fiancée's sister on television.

programme.title: Renegade: Studs
programme.desc: A woman from Bobby's past gets victimized by an upscale male escort service that sets up robberies of its wealthy clients.

programme.title: Renegade: Another Place and Time
programme.desc: A mafia prince is murdered in broad daylight. The assassin is so well connected that he is virtually untouchable.

programme.title: Renegade: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Dutch Dixon's son Donnie gets out of prison and decides that he will sell his father up the river for the right price.

programme.title: The Debt Collector
programme.desc: French is a martial artist that takes on a job as a mob debt collector in order to make ends meet. He does whatever it takes to chase down individuals until he meets a bartender that makes him question whether he should do the right thing.

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.

channel.desc: It’s time to go into overdrive by jumping off buildings, flying a burning plane, driving in a car chase and saving the world. Pluto TV Action brings you blockbusters, stars, and a strong dose of high-octane excitement.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Natalee Holloway: New Clues In Paradise
programme.sub-title: Natalee Holloway: New Clues In Paradise
programme.desc: A report on new details into the search for Natalee Holloway, a U.S. teenager who disappeared on May 30, 2005 during a post-graduation trip in the Caribbean island of Aruba.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Scared to Death
programme.desc: Police Lt. Jim Barton found his wife, Vickie, murdered execution-style on their farm in Warren County, Ohio, in 1995. With limited physical evidence and no suspects, the investigation lay dormant for nine years until a tip opened the case.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Terror at the Morgue
programme.desc: Dr. O.C. Smith, a medical examiner, was apparently attacked on June 1, 2002, as he was leaving work. He was found wrapped in barbed wire with a bomb strapped to his neck. Dr. Smith survived but expressed concern that his assailant might attack again

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Question of Murder
programme.desc: John Maloney, a Wisconsin police officer, was convicted of murdering his estranged wife, Sandy, in 1999. He has always maintained his innocence. After Maloney’s conviction, the prosecutor, Joe Paulus, pled guilty to accepting bribes to fix over 20 cases

programme.title: 48 Hours: Texas Confidential
programme.desc: A report on the 1997 murder of Doris Angleton, the wife of a successful Houston, Texas bookie. Doris’ husband Bob who claimed that his brother Roger was Doris’ killer, was tried for the crime in state court and acquitted. But the case did not end there.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Black Dahlia Confidential
programme.desc: The brutal murder in 1947 of Elizabeth Short, a young, struggling actress whose body was discovered in a vacant lot in January 1947, has baffled the Los Angeles Police Department for decades

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Ride
programme.desc: Jane Mixer, a student at the University of Michigan Law School in March of 1969, had just agreed to get married and had arranged a ride home to tell her parents. Her body was found in a small, rural cemetery just miles from her dorm.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Jeffrey MacDonald: Fight for Truth
programme.desc: A report on the 1970 murders of U.S. Army Doctor Jeffrey MacDonald’s pregnant wife and two daughters at their Fort Bragg home. Having served 25 years in prison for the murders, MacDonald still proclaims his innocence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: Dr. Richard Illes, a heart surgeon, and his wife, Miriam, were a prominent couple in Williamsport, PA. Then, on Jan. 15, 1999, Miriam was fatally shot as she stood in front of her kitchen window. Investigators think that Richard was responsible.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Exposed
programme.desc: A report about serial killer Bill Bradford, who posed as an amateur photographer and told women he’d make them famous. Convicted of two murders, Bradford has been on death row since 1988.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Endgame
programme.desc: Janet Levine March, a wife and mother of two young children, disappeared on August 15, 1996. In December 2004, a grand jury indicted her husband, Perry, for her murder, based on circumstantial evidence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Millionaire Manhunt
programme.desc: After a review of the circumstances surrounding the 1987 murder of Lita McClinton Sullivan and the police investigation of her husband, Jim Sullivan, the program follows Sullivan’s extradition from Thailand in 2004 and his ensuing trial for Lita’s murder.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: In her divorce case, Frieda Hanimov feared that she would lose custody of her children because she suspected that the judge ruling on her case was corrupt. She went to authorities with her suspicions, Hanimov agreed to go undercover and, wearing a wire.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Perfectly Executed - Part 1
programme.desc: A report on the 1994 murders of the Rafay family -- Sultana Rafay, her husband Tariq and their autistic daughter, Basma -- focusing on the pursuit and arrest of the two suspects: Atif Rafay, the only surviving family member, and his friend Sebastian Burns

programme.title: 48 Hours: Perfectly Executed - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 focuses on the role of the Canadian Mounted Police in the investigation and sting operation put in place to obtain confessions from Rafay and Burns. Having taken refuge in Canada, Rafay and Burns were extradited to Seattle to face murder charges.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 1
programme.sub-title: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 1
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 2
programme.sub-title: Two Wigs, A Gun, and A Murder: Part 2
programme.desc: Fred Jablin, a devoted father was gunned down in his driveway. His ex-wife, Piper was the prime suspect. Circumstantial evidence, including an airline ticket and two wigs indicated that Piper had masqueraded as her older sister and killed her husband.

channel.desc: Pluto TV 48 Hours brings viewers behind the scenes of the most intriguing murders. Follow the investigators, meet the accused, and review the evidence in the original true crime docuseries, with stories of obsession, revenge, and crimes of passion.
