programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop is surprised by the first day of cold weather, Barney helps her see that winter is a wonderful time. On a hot summer day, Barney teaches BJ about all the activities you can do in the summer.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Big Little Day
programme.desc: Barney helps Baby Bop and the children discover big and little things in the world around them. And by the end of the day, the kids have learned that big or little, they're all wonderful just the way they are!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Shrinking Blankey - Things I Can Do
programme.sub-title: The Shrinking Blankey - Things I Can Do
programme.desc: Baby Bop's blankey seems to be getting smaller; she's convinced it's shrinking. But Barney shows her that, actually, she is growing. Baby Bop is not sure she likes this idea at first.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Venice, Anyone?
programme.desc: Emma can't play with her friends because she has to complete a school project about her family. Before you know it, Barney brings Emma on a trip to Venice to learn more about her great granddad.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Today is the big dance party in the park. Barney tells Baby Bop the story of “The Princess Without a Song to Sing.”

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A New Friend
programme.desc: While Barney has fun with his friends every day, there's something special about making a brand NEW friend! When Mr. Boyd's niece, Colleen visits the park, she's eager to make friends with the other kids...but being the "new kid" isn't easy.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: A game of hide and seek takes a turn when Baby Bop claims that an elephant is hiding in the park!/BJ and Riff engage in a friendly contest to see which of them can find the loudest sound in the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Home Sweet Earth
programme.desc: It's Earth Day, a great time for everyone to learn how to help take car of our world, but Ben is wasting paper while BJ isn't too concerned about cutting down a tree to make room for a new playground.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is waiting for a very special letter from his pen pal in China. Everyone is anxiously awaiting Mrs. Matuma’s Harambee Dance Troupe to arrive.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: On the Road Again
programme.desc: Barney and his friends have a "wheel good fun" day learning about cars. Barney creates a colorful, kid-size car, the dinos learn about seatbelt safety, and everyone discovers there are many different styles of cars.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Let's Make Music
programme.desc: Barney, Baby Bop and BJ have fun learning about music, rhythm and musical instruments. Barney introduces many different instruments and BJ dreams of one day becoming a rock 'n roll star. They discover that music gives everyone a happy feelin.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play It Safe!
programme.desc: It's always fun to share a day with Barney—but it's also important to learn how to "play it safe!" Baby Bop, wanting to be a good helper, has been attaching adhesive strips to her frustrated (and uninjured) brother, BJ.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: As he watches birds fly overhead, Riff begins to daydream of flying himself. After seeing all the Moms playing with their kids in the Park, Baby Bop wonders what makes somebody a Mommy.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Magic Caboose - Arts
programme.desc: Melanie is sad because she misses her friend who is visiting relatives in India. Barney shows his friends that it's fun to go to new places and see new things by taking them on an imaginary journey on the Magic Caboose!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Making a Move
programme.desc: Welcome to the neighborhood! Anna has just moved to the neighborhood and is missing her old friends. Barney and his friends help her discover that moving is an adventure with new places to explore and new friends to meet.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Baby Brother
programme.desc: Barney reminds Baby Bop and BJ that although babies start out little, they grow fast. Through pretend play, favorite songs and fun games, they learn about the many ways we grow every day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: All About Me
programme.desc: Baby Bop and BJ have fun playing ball in the park. Barney helps them learn that trying something new can also be fun. Baby Bop prepares a special picnic for BJ, but much to his surprise, it consists mostly of her favorite foods.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Caring Hearts
programme.desc: A special project provides the perfect opportunity for Barney, Baby Bop and BJ to learn about love and relationships the "heart" way as they make a "Friends and Family Tree."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Let's Go For A Ride!
programme.desc: Barney and the children have fun playing with and learning about busses and cars.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bop Til You Drop - Sharing
programme.desc: The park is especially full of kids today, but all of them are busy playing. Baby Bop can't find anyone to play what she wants to play. When the others notice she is sad, they tell her they will play whatever she suggests.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The Park Kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets. A rainy day has everyone stuck in the Caboose. Barney suggests fun activities.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Baby Bop thinks the half-moon is somehow broken, Barney and Friends take an imaginary visit to the moon where Barney eases her concerns.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop, BJ and the children prepare for the Shapes Carnival in the park./When it starts to rain at the park, Baby Bop joins Barney and BJ inside the caboose.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ learns a lesson about bragging when, playing superhero CAPTAIN PICKLES, he tells everyone that he can leap over the moon!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Butterflies - Nature Of Things
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it. Baby Bop is surprised to discover Monty inside a chrysalis. Everyone is excited to find Monty—now a beautiful butterfly!

channel.desc: Join Barney & Friends for adventures, songs, dancing and lots of fun every day on Pluto TV. In Barney's world, sharing and caring are key!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Driller Instinct
programme.desc: Ton & Allen encounter aggressive outdoorsmen in the Alaskan wilderness. The guys discover an 8-wheeled ATV that travels on both land & water and an air percussion hammer that can drill through solid rock!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Rodeo Ton
programme.desc: 1970s El Toro mechanical bull used to train bull riders; silver WWII era banjo; a collection of 1800s handcrafted hunting duck decoys.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!

channel.desc: Finding everything from vintage vending machines to rare guitars to antique firearms, expert storage locker buyers Allen and Ton travel to auctions across Southern California, bidding on abandoned units they can quickly flip for a tidy profit.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Impossible Choice
programme.desc: Tensions erupt when Jade asks her parents to move out. After an x-ray, Leah grapples with the possibility that Ali's condition is progressing. Briana and family move into their new house. (S10, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Piece of Me
programme.desc: Kail celebrates Isaac's birthday while life-changing news weighs on her. Leah reveals secrets about her past. Chelsea tries to change Aubree's visitation agreement with Adam's parents. (S10, ep9)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Do Something
programme.desc: The coronavirus threatens Leah's travel plans and brings up serious concerns for Ali's health. Briana holds a summit with Devoin and Luis to insist they take on financial responsibility. (S10, ep10)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Until the World Ends
programme.desc: The threat of coronavirus intensifies as Chelsea travels for work. Leah and the girls go into self-quarantine to protect Ali. Briana's new fling has the potential for major heartbreak. (S10, ep11)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Remote Control
programme.desc: Despite quarantine, Leah's book release pushes her and Jeremy to confront their past. Jade is forced to close her salon during lockdown. (S10, ep12)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Not So Normal Times
programme.desc: As the country emerges from quarantine, Briana struggles with the decision to send Nova back to school. Kail and Jo struggle with the decision to let Isaac have more say. (S10, ep13)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Bizarre New World
programme.desc: Kail gives birth to her 4th child. Chelsea worries about her health amid Cole's COVID-19 scare. Briana and Devoin fight about finances. Jade calls Sean out for being unmotivated. (S10, ep14)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Tongue-tied
programme.desc: Tensions erupt between Jade and Sean at Kloie's birthday dinner. After their intense text fight, Briana tries to put aside her anger with Devoin for Nova's birthday. (S10, ep15)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Say OK
programme.desc: Jade's frustrations force her to break up with Sean. Kailyn tries to co-parent through the stress of virtual learning. Chelsea gets busier as COVID-19 numbers spike in South Dakota. (S10, ep16)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Just Don't Sink It
programme.desc: Leah steps in when tensions between the twins boil over. Kailyn is forced to navigate the fallout of strong statements she made about Javi. (S10, ep17)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Under The Big Top
programme.desc: Chelsea makes a difficult decision about her future. Leah withdraws Gracie from cheer in order to keep Ali safe. Jade deals with Sean's messes after he breaks her window. (S10, ep18)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Spring Has Sprung
programme.desc: In Teen Mom 2 Uncut, Ashley takes an anniversary trip with her boyfriend. Leah receives life altering news about her health. Kail says goodbye to her old house and bittersweet memories. (S10, ep22)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: It's never a quiet life for our teen mums. Sassi plasters over the cracks, Megan prepares for her big day, Amber's love life is in tatters, Chloe buys a house and the all-new Mia is here! (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Labour And Love
programme.desc: More tears, tiffs and true love in Teen Mom UK. Megan has a baby, Amber has a meltdown, and romance is in the air for Mia. Sassi celebrates her 1st Mother's Day and Chloe tackles her weight. (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Lads Trip
programme.desc: Megan welcomes a new addition to the family... a horse! Chloe heads to the gym while Jordan heads to Amsterdam. There are fireworks for Amber and Ste, and Sassi plans a Christening. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Making Memories
programme.desc: Sassi almost misses her own Christening, Amber helps Ste celebrate his big day, Chloe remembers what it's like being a teenager, Megan makes a decision and Mia is left feeling frustrated. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Now Or Never
programme.desc: In the season finale it's make or break for Megan and Dylan and you'll never guess who's going on a date! As Sassi boards a plane, Mia jumps out of one. Chloe treats herself, big time. (S2, ep8)

channel.desc: `Teen Mom' chronicles the challenges teenagers Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting a job, beginning college and moving out on their own.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Adoption Special
programme.desc: Dr. Drew goes in depth and explores the adoption stories of Teen Mom's Catelynn and Tyler, and 16 and Pregnant's Ashley.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Where Are They Now?
programme.desc: We catch up with the girls of 16 And Pregnant to find where they are now.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Mackenzie
programme.desc: Mackenzie has always lived in the moment, until she has to suddenly get serious about her own life when her boyfriend is nearly paralysed in a car accident just weeks before her due date.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Katie
programme.desc: Once her days were filled with college applications and racing quad bikes with friends, but after getting pregnant, Katie has to completely rearrange her priorities.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Briana
programme.desc: Briana gets pregnant at the same time as her sister, but their relationship becomes tense when they make different decisions regarding teenage motherhood.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Lindsey
programme.desc: When Lindsey unexpectedly gets pregnant, she struggles to find a stable living situation with her inconsistent boyfriend, and to follow through with her dreams.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Alex
programme.desc: Alex finding out she's pregnant at 16 puts everything on hold. Her boyfriend Matt is also growing increasingly unreliable, and Alex considers whether adoption might be the best choice.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Jordan
programme.desc: Jordan and her sister were models and best friends until Jordan's pregnancy put all that on hold. Now her boyfriend and her sister are competing to be her number one.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Myranda
programme.desc: Myranda finds that love isn't the answer to everything when she gets pregnant. As her mum battles substance abuse, Myranda and her boyfriend struggle with preparing for a baby on their own.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Sarah
programme.desc: Sarah and Blake were high school sweethearts, until an unexpected pregnancy began to pull them apart. Blake wants to move away for work, but Sarah needs him to stick around for their baby.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Hope
programme.desc: Ex-party girl Hope is pregnant after losing her virginity to Ben, a guy she barely knows. Hope and Ben try to make a go of their relationship in order to provide a good family for the baby.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Sabrina
programme.desc: Sabrina used to be a cool California girl, with an athlete boyfriend and big group of friends. When she gets pregnant, Sabrina must start a new life, and hopes her boyfriend will come too.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Devon
programme.desc: Devon wants to raise her baby with her boyfriend Colin, an Iraq war veteran who is still in the reserves. If Colin is deployed, can Devon handle not living at home?

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Kristina
programme.desc: When Kristina's boyfriend Todd dies just weeks after the couple finds out she's pregnant, Kristina must deal with the tragic loss while also preparing to welcome their baby into the world.

programme.title: 16 & Pregnant: Where Are They Now?
programme.desc: Catch up with girls from Season 3 and find out about the engagements, surprise break ups, crazy living arrangements and family feuds that have taken place since the cameras stopped rolling.

channel.desc: Young women share their personal journeys as they cope with the challenges and mounting responsibilities of unexpected motherhood.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Page Turner
programme.desc: When two people turn up dead with radiation poisoning, it sparks an urgent investigation before it turns into a deadly outbreak in New York City when it's tracked down to a book at the NYC Library.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Turbulence
programme.desc: When an Air Marshal turns up dead on a flight on which Mac is a passenger, the victim it turns out, isn't a Marshal at all. The real Marshal was killed earlier and his ID stolen.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Sex, Lies, and Silicone
programme.desc: When a prominent journalist named Ann Steele turns up dead at a street party, the investigation leads the team to a life-size silicone doll company.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Dead Inside
programme.desc: A man is found dead in a basement, but the house where the death occurred is found miles away on a barge in the East River. Meanwhile, Flack discovers that his sister lost her job and has a drinking problem.

programme.title: CSI: New York: My Name Is Mac Taylor
programme.desc: When two men who share the same name as detective Mac Taylor are killed, detective Taylor rounds up all the other Mac Taylors in New York and tries to figure out who will be the next victim.

programme.title: CSI: New York: The Triangle
programme.desc: CSI investigates the death of a armored truck security guard, which appears to be related to a disturbance at a so-called "Bermuda Triangle" of electric activity near the Empire State Building.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Rush To Judgment
programme.desc: While investigating the death and dismemberment of a high school wrestling coach, detective Flack gets in trouble when a suspect dies in his custody.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Green Piece
programme.desc: An environmental terrorist group bombs the home of an electronics recycler, and his daughter is killed--but the daughter is part of the terrorist group. Meanwhile, Danny considers proposing to Lindsay again.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Communication Breakdown
programme.desc: CSI tries to figure who is responsible for the death of the chief of a Native American tribe who were some of the original inhabitants of Manhattan.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Prey
programme.desc: A murder victim turns out to be a violent stalker, and the killer may be one of his stalking victims who learned to cover her tracks by attending one of Bonasera's college seminars.

programme.title: CSI: New York: The Past, Present and Murder
programme.desc: A man is killed when he falls out a window in media mogul Robert Dunbrook's building, but did Dunbrook throw him? During the investigation, Mac discovers that the case is connected to an earlier case involving a missing flash drive.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Greater Good
programme.desc: As Lindsay goes into labor, Mac suspects that a man who served a prison sentence in a manslaughter case is protecting the actual culprit.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Pay Up
programme.desc: A group of violent kidnappers capture Robert Dunbrook's son just before he is scheduled to testify to a grand jury against his father, and the CSI team is rocked by a tragedy.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Blacklist (Featuring Gravedigger)
programme.desc: The case of a cyber killer, who appears to be targeting medical health-care workers, turns personal when the suspect invokes the name of Mac's father who had died nearly two decades earlier.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: While investigating the DNA from a murder scene, Hawkes discovers that the DNA is connected to more than a dozen cases over a three-state area. But does the city really have a serial killer on their hands, or is there another explanation?

programme.title: CSI: NY: One Wedding and a Funeral
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of a groom on his wedding day and the appearance of a mysterious box on the hood of Stella’s car.

programme.title: CSI: NY: The Thing About Heroes
programme.desc: Mac travels to Chicago in order to solve the mystery of the 333 caller while the rest of the CSI team works on a murder in a subway car.

channel.desc: Forensic scientists and investigators of the New York City Police Department unveil the circumstances behind mysterious and unusual deaths.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Internal Affairs
programme.desc: When Natalia's ex is found dead at his home, Horatio must step into the investigation to keep his team safe from an overeager investigator.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: No Man's Land
programme.desc: The robbery of a police truck containing confiscated weapons is connected to a plot to spring Clavo Cruz from prison, and one of the guns stolen in the robbery is used in the shooting of a young boy.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Man Down
programme.desc: While the manhunt for Clavo Cruz continues, Delko fights for his life after the shooting.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Triple Threat
programme.desc: A real estate developer is murdered, and the investigation uncovers a complex web of deceit involving his wife her two identical triplet sisters. But the apparently-murdered developer may have had a surprise of his own.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Rush
programme.desc: An actor is found dead in the trunk of a stunt car, but the investigation reveals that he actually died in his room at a high-profile celebrity rehab facility.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Just Murdered
programme.desc: A far from amicable divorce comes to a bigger crisis when bodies start piling up, and Delko falls afoul of a former nemesis when he misses a payment.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Burned
programme.desc: While investigating a possible arson case, Horatio discovers that Yelina is back in Miami working as a private investigator. Meanwhile, Wolfe's prior relationship with one of the suspects gets him in hot water with his superiors.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Kill Switch
programme.desc: While CSI tries to find out who killed a carjacker, Wolfe is forced to become an adversary as he takes a job as a television crime analyst.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Dangerous Son
programme.desc: A probation officer is shot and killed, and one of the suspects turns out to be Horatio's biological son.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Cyber-Lebrity
programme.desc: An Internet celebrity's boyfriend is killed with a bow and arrow. During the case, Horatio becomes a "cyberlebrity" himself, which puts his life in danger.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Inside Out
programme.desc: Horatio goes on a manhunt to find two criminals who escaped from a prison bus after their arraignment. However, he also learns that his son's life is in danger in prison.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Deep Freeze
programme.desc: A former star pro quarterback is killed. But the investigation determines that the person who initially tried to kill him did not deliver the fatal blow.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Sunblock
programme.desc: A man is killed during an eclipse. But when a second person is killed in her home, Horatio suspects that he may be dealing with a serial killer who targets his victims only at night.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: A model is electrocuted on a runway, and CSI discovers that the case is connected to a heroin smuggling ring involving a designer and the prisoner who held Horatio's son hostage.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Permanent Vacation
programme.desc: When a family vacation turns deadly, the CSIs must find the killer before the survivors take justice into their own hands.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Stand Your Ground
programme.desc: An attempt on Calleigh's life puts both her professional and personal life in jeopardy. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: CSI My Nanny (aka Family Portrait)
programme.desc: Lifestyles of the rich and famous come under the microscope of Horatio and the CSI team when a wealthy family's nanny turns up dead.

channel.desc: Follow Horatio Caine, a former homicide detective, and his team of Miami-Dade Police Department forensic scientists as they try to unveil the conditions behind the mysterious deaths and crimes.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Metal on Metal
programme.desc: A athlete is gunned down just weeks before starting college, leaving family heartbroken and detectives stumped. The man seems an unlikely target, until Lt. Joe Kenda pries into his personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A gathering of friends turns deadly when two gunmen shoot William Davis in the head. Kenda and his team dig into his past and start to suspect someone in William’s circle is lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Magic Bullet
programme.desc: A hard-working father of two is shot in the head just steps from a notorious strip club. The case is stuck in neutral until Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organized by an unlikely triggerman.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Murder Bites
programme.desc: A young woman is found naked and strangled in a park not 200 yards from her home. It isn’t until Lt. Joe Kenda rethinks the entire case that he realizes someone has been lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Snitch
programme.desc: When officers respond to a shooting , they discover the body of a young man they know all to well -- police informant Jimmie Stevenson. it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Time Bomb
programme.desc: In 1978, Lt. Joe Kenda is new to the CSPD, and gets more than he bargains for when a local bank is the target of a massive explosion.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My First Case
programme.desc: In his first case with the homicide unit, rookie burglary detective Joe Kenda volunteers to work a bloody multi-victim shooting deemed “unsolvable” by the veterans.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Justified
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down, leading Lt. Joe Kenda to delve into his troubled past and his connection to the world of rare coins.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: After School Special
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes when a beloved teacher is poisoned in her classroom. As doctors fight to save Barbara Lewis’ life, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team delve into her personal affairs.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My Worst Fear
programme.desc: Police are shocked to find a 13-year-old boy killed in an explosion, but their grief turns to alarm when they discover a second, unexploded bomb.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Raise the Dead
programme.desc: When a tip comes in suggesting foul play on a 71yr old man, Lt. Joe Kenda is left with only one way to reveal the truth: exhume the body from its grave.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don’t add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Grip
programme.desc: When a speeding truck crashes into a residential building, officers find the lifeless body of Michael Faast behind the wheel. But he didn’t die in the wreck – he was shot point-blank in the temple.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Frozen Terror
programme.desc: Environmentalist Louis Hastings wants to blow up the Alaskan Pipeline but wants to eliminate possible witnesses first. He stalks his victims one by one, determined to carry out his murderous plan.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Mountain Man
programme.desc: The remote Chulitna is the perfect spot for rafting, fishing, and murder. When a couple is reported missing, troopers discover they’re the victims of cold-blooded murder and begin a manhunt.

channel.desc: Aftershock’s Crime channel brings some of the world’s most must-watch true crime series together, keeping you glued to the screen with all their shocking twists and turns.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Phil’s stint on a movie set leads to romance with the female star. Holly struggles with having to fire someone for the first time.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Phil makes a big mistake on his first date with a movie star so Holly has to infiltrate the red carpet to bail him out. Stuart and Haskell compete over who can get the most Twitter followers.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Holly and Nicki plan a girls’ night out, but wind up competing for the same guy. Phil realizes dating a movie star is much more difficult than he imagined.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Phil and Stuart have a fight with Haskell and he moves out. Holly, desperate to keep them all together, sends Phil and Stuart to bring him home.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Holly accidently convinces Stuart to quit his dental practice and buy a restaurant. Haskell, sick of paying alimony, tries to persuade his ex wife Margo to marry her fiancé.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Stuart and Holly convince Margo to hold her wedding at their restaurant. Haskell, still desperately in love with Margo, tries to stop it.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The God Couple
programme.desc: Oscar grumbles when Felix helps Dani prepare for a choir solo and encourages the group to attend church to support her.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Conscious Odd Coupling
programme.desc: After a heated argument, Oscar and Felix decide it might be best to change their living arrangement and find new roommates.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Pilot
programme.desc: Oscar Madison reluctantly agrees to let Felix Unger, his uptight former college roommate, move in with him after both of their marriages fail.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The Ghostwriter
programme.desc: When Oscar is hired to ghostwrite the autobiography of a retired baseball player, Felix offers his "help" by advising Murph to go in a different direction, making Oscar's job more difficult. Geoff Stults guest stars.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The Birthday Party
programme.desc: When Oscar realizes he's forgotten Felix's birthday, he pulls together a last-minute surprise party in his honor in an attempt to impress Casey. Dwight Howard guest stars.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The Blind Leading The Blind Date
programme.sub-title: The Blind Leading The Blind Date
programme.desc: When Dani reveals she's depressed that she'll be the only single one at her high school reunion, Oscar and Felix each put their distinctive dating strategies to work to help her find a boyfriend.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The Wedding Deception
programme.desc: When Oscar and Felix attend the wedding of an old college friend, Oscar aims to reconnect with an old flame while Felix is determined to show his ex-wife (guest star Christine Woods) that he's a changed man.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Heal Thyself
programme.desc: Felix's hypochondria kicks into overdrive when Oscar starts dating the most important person in Felix's life - his doctor. Erinn Hayes guest stars as Sharon.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Secret Agent Man
programme.desc: Felix convinces Oscar to appear on a sports television show against Teddy's advice to stick with radio. NFL Network's Rich Eisen and 'Inside the NBA on TNT's' Kenny Smith guest star as themselves.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The Unger Games
programme.desc: When Oscar feels threatened by Felix's surprising performance on the softball field and basketball court, they agree to a decathlon to determine which one of them is the better athlete. Geoff Stults guest stars.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Sleeping Dogs Lie
programme.desc: When Oscar and Felix make a trip to Ashley's (Christine Woods) to retrieve Felix's special pillow, a secret that he has kept from Oscar is revealed. Five-time NBA All-Star Chris Webber guest stars.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Enlightening Strikes
programme.desc: When Felix substitute teaches a yoga class, his teaching style rubs everyone, including Emily, the wrong way. Weird Al Yankovic and Regis Philbin guest star.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Jealous Island
programme.desc: Oscar becomes obsessed with living up to Murph's (Geoff Stults) standards when he finds out the girl he is seeing used to date the handsome ex-baseball player.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: The Audit Couple
programme.desc: When the IRS decides to audit Oscar and his ex-wife Gaby, Felix offers to mediate between the contentious exes when he realizes that he might be the reason Oscar was audited in the first place.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: All About Eavesdropping
programme.desc: After Oscar and Felix become obsessed with eavesdropping on their bickering neighbors, they try to subtly intervene and help them save their marriage.

programme.title: The Odd Couple: Unger The Influence
programme.desc: With the help of Murph, Oscar decides to throw a big party when Felix finally agrees to spend the weekend away. Also, Felix and Emily have their first sleepover.
