programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bait and Switch (Finale Part 1)
programme.desc: It's the final week of the season and Hard Merchandise holds a narrow lead over the fleet

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: There are less than five days left before the Atlantic Bluefin Tuna season in Gloucester, Massachusetts closes and the competition will come downto the very last day of fishing

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Masters of Bluefin (Special)
programme.desc: Take a look back at the best moments from previous seasons as the top fishermen of Gloucester, Massachusetts, battle for supremacy while they pursue the elusive Atlantic Bluefin Tuna

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: First Blood
programme.desc: It's the first day of the new Bluefin tuna fishing season in Gloucester, Massachusetts, and every captain in the fleet wants to the land the coveted first tuna of the year.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Anchor Anger
programme.desc: The rivalry between captains Dave Carraro and Tyler McLaughlin intensifies, while other boats in the fleet push to bring new mates up tospeed in the North Atlantic Bluefin fishing season.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bluefin Beatdown
programme.desc: An old rivalry re- ignites after a fight at the dock between captains Tyler McLaughlin and Dave Carraro, of FV- tuna.com, while a crewmember fights to keep his job on the Hot Tuna.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Harpoon Hellraising
programme.desc: It's week four of the North Atlantic Blue Fin Tuna Season and oneveteran Gloucester captain has yet to catch his first fish, while two rival harpoon boats go head to head.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Go Hard or Go Home
programme.desc: It's week five of Gloucester's Bluefin tuna fishing season, and when a sudden storm engulfs the fleet, each captain must decide if the risk of staying out on the water is worth the reward.

programme.title: Bent Rods and Broken Hearts
programme.desc: It's week six of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna fishing season and the Gloucester fleet's underdogs struggle to turn around their seasons.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Maine Event, The
programme.desc: It's week seven of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna fishing season, Gloucester captains must decide whether go where the fish are biting or take their chances fishing inshore.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Battle At Midway
programme.desc: It's week eight of the Atlantic bluefin tuna season, the midway point of fishing where crews either knuckle down and push hard, or crumble from the grind.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Wicked Pissed
programme.desc: It's week nine of the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season and Captain Paul Hebert, struggles to prove his worth as a captain after catching only three tuna in the first two months of fishing.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: When Push Comes to Shove
programme.desc: It's week ten of the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season in Gloucester, Massachusetts, and, with only six weeks of fishing left, the competition is heating up.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Three’s a Charm
programme.desc: It's week 11 of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna season, and bad luck, bait problems and big egos plague the Gloucester fleet.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Triple Crossed
programme.desc: It's week 12 of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna season, and one captain's decision to withhold information fractures ties with an important ally.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Tuna Trifecta
programme.desc: It's week 13 of the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna season and, with only three weeks left to fish, and the number one position on the line, every Gloucester captain is desperate to stack the deck with bluefin.

channel.desc: Teams of salty fishermen battle the elements, and each other, to land the biggest bluefine tuna in this gripping reality series.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Secret Life
programme.desc: In Calgary, Alberta, a beautiful Ethiopian woman is found brutally strangled. The victim’s husband seems genuinely distraught over his wife’s death, but there is something strangely suspicious about him.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Double Cross
programme.desc: The investigation of the murder of a shady Montreal businessman takes detectives into the lurid underworld of drug dealers, con men, and crooked lawyers.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Dead End
programme.desc: A young couple hits the road, hitchhiking across North America. Free spirits keen to explore the world. When the young woman stops phoning home, her father is alarmed.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Betrayed
programme.desc: 19 year old Greg Parsons is convicted of brutally murdering his mother mainly on evidence of the audio tape of a song he'd written, "Kill your Parents".

programme.title: 72 Hours: The Violinist
programme.desc: Surgically clean body parts start turning up on a highway. Stranger still, they have been drained of every drop of blood.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Mad Bomber
programme.desc: In 1996 a serial bomber begins planting bombs in public places and terrorizes the Prince Edward Island community. The mystery person leaves a strange swastika as a calling card, eluding capture for eight years.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Pride and Joy
programme.desc: Pride and Joy focuses on Eric Napoletano who brutally murdered his victims, including his wife Myra. Napoletano eluded the law from New York to Albuquerque, New Mexico before he was finally arrested on March 27, 1991.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Release Me
programme.desc: Release Me chronicles the story of Texas killer Kenneth Allen McDuff who received the death sentence in 1966 for a murderous rampage that left three teen-agers dead. He was paroled years later only to kill again.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Flames of Rage
programme.desc: When firefighters in suburban Indianapolis are called to a house fire, what they find inside shocks the entire community, a respected minister and his wife have been murdered with an ax.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: The Missing Heiress
programme.desc: In February of 1977, Helen Vorhees Brach walked out of the famed Mayo Clinic in Minnesota, and into the pages of Chicago folklore. The wealthy widowed heiress of the Brach Candy fortune was never seen again.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Career Criminal
programme.desc: A loving mother disappears without explanation in Arlington, Texas. Investigators suspect foul play but search fruitlessly for any sign of her whereabouts.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: An Unlikely Suspect
programme.desc: The community of Dover, Delaware is shocked when human body parts turn up throughout the city. Authorities determine that the remains are all from the same victim, but it will take the best forensic scientists in the country to make a positive ID..

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Deadly Medicine
programme.desc: When the death rate at a rural Indiana hospital skyrockets, an investigation implicates a nurse, Orville Lynn Majors. State Police are left with a daunting task.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Silent Partner
programme.desc: Roy Radin was a successful New York theatrical producer with a knack for making money and a taste for the high life. His hopes for making it as a Hollywood producer ended abruptly in a remote canyon outside of Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Prosecutors: In Pursuit of Justice: Short Fuse
programme.desc: Robert Peernock was an expert in pyrotechnics who knew how to blow things up. But when he tried to kill his wife and daughter by rigging their car to explode, something backfired, and his daughter survived.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Once Bitten
programme.desc: Both natural disease and sports injury are likely suspects in Eric Brody's death. But then Dr. G learns that he was treated with antibiotics for a spider bite prior to his death.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Deadly Decisions
programme.desc: Police make a grisly discovery: a woman’s battered and dead body. With little evidence and no witnesses, Dr. G must identify the body and determine the cause of death to catch her killer.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Deadly Mistake
programme.desc: A pregnant teen is admitted to a mental hospital after threatening suicide but is found dead days later. Dr. G must dig deep to uncover what took Claudia’s life.

channel.desc: Get deep into the world's most shocking crimes 24/7 on Pluto TV Investigation.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Menthol Murderer
programme.desc: A week-long search for a missing 10-yr-old Indiana girl ends sadly with her body being discovered in a nearby stream.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Abducted Atheists
programme.desc: American Atheist Madalyn Murray O'Hair and her family vanished in August 1995, leaving behind an ominous note.

programme.title: Crime Stories: Ronald Glenn West: The 22 Caliber Killer
programme.sub-title: Ronald Glenn West: The 22 Caliber Killer
programme.desc: When two suburban housewives are killed in their homes within a week of each other in May 1970, it leaves Toronto in fear.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Doctor of Death
programme.desc: When emergency services arrived at the office of respected neurologist Richard Boggs following the report of a patient's death, they had their suspicions regarding the circumstances...

programme.title: Crime Stories: Douglas Robert Worth: The Pictou Sadist
programme.sub-title: Douglas Robert Worth: The Pictou Sadist
programme.desc: On December 11, 1987 a hard luck child living in a group home in Ontario was reported missing when she failed to return home from school.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Homocidal Drifter
programme.desc: In the city of Moncton, New Brunswick police discover the bodies of Joan Hicks and her 11-year-old daughter, Nina ‚Äì both brutally murdered late in the night.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Bedroom Strangler
programme.desc: Women are being attacked in their beds at night. Police are baffled as to how this intruder is gaining access to apartments sometimes more than 15 stories up.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Casebook Rapist
programme.desc: An international student is found raped and murdered in the bathroom of her high-rise apartment.

programme.title: Crime Stories: David Shearing: The Wells Grey Gunman
programme.sub-title: David Shearing: The Wells Grey Gunman
programme.desc: In August of 1982, six members of the Bentley/Johnson family disappear in the Wells Grey National Park without a trace.

programme.title: Crime Stories: Girls Just Wanna Get Found
programme.desc: Cindy Zarzycki is 13 years old when she goes missing on her way to a Detroit ice cream store.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Lethal Injector
programme.desc: In 1996, nurses and patients at the Veteran's Affairs Medical Center in Northampton are concerned. It seems that wherever nurse Kristen Gilbert goes, death follows.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Yosemite Park Murderer
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day weekend 1999, three tourists from Yosemite National Park disappeared and were found murdered a month later.

programme.title: Crime Stories: Wayne Clifford Boden: The Vampire Rapist
programme.sub-title: Wayne Clifford Boden: The Vampire Rapist
programme.desc: Known as the Vampire Rapist for his distinctive modus operandi, Wayne Boden would rape, strangle and bite the breasts of his victims.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers: Volker Eckert
programme.desc: Volker Eckert, a German truck driver, strangled and killed as many as nineteen women across Europe in a murderous career that lasted over thirty years.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers: Joachim Kroll
programme.desc: Joachim Kroll murdered at least thirteen people during a span of over twenty years.

channel.desc: Prepare to be immersed in the thrilling world of investigations, mysteries, and the pursuit of justice. Tune in to More TV Crime and embark on an unforgettable adventure into the heart of darkness, where truth is the ultimate prize.

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Morris suspects Allan's weight loss is due to addiction.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 3
programme.desc: Internal wounds and a collapsed lung.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 4
programme.desc: Treatment for a broken leg and a neurological disease.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 7
programme.desc: In Barnsley's Casualty department, it's a battle of life and death every single day.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 8
programme.desc: Barnsley Casualty is facing one of its toughest shifts to date with beds becoming limited.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 7
programme.desc: New biker cop recruit PC Lucy Watson is on home turf in the seaside resort of Southend on Sea. From a suspect who does a runner to rowdy kids at night, she's got her hands full.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 8
programme.desc: Biker paramedic Mark Hayes goes to the rescue of an RAF medic seriously ill on a platform at New Street Station and Steve Harris helps a pensioner who's had a nasty fall at market.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 9
programme.desc: A 9 year olds been knocked over on his way to school and biker paramedic SteveHarris finds himself on a canal boat. T

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 2
programme.desc: The biker cops continue their crack down on some of the busiest roads in the UK. Other motorcycle units are clearing some of the country’s most iconic scenic routes after too many thrills and spills.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 9
programme.desc: A woman has a life-threatening allergic reaction to nuts. A man has an arm injury.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 1
programme.desc: The team treats patients suffering from heart attacks and road traffic collisions.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 2
programme.desc: The staff at Barnsley Hospital receive patients with a heart attack and chainsaw wounds.

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts: Episode 3
programme.desc: A man with potential spine injuries is given pain relief while waiting for scan results.

programme.title: Helicopter ER: Rough Day on the A1
programme.desc: On the A1 motorway, a lorry crashes into a concrete matrix sign leading to a major rescue operation.

programme.title: Helicopter ER: To Make Things Worse
programme.desc: A premature baby has breathing difficulties and there's a desperate race to fly mother and child 30 miles away for life-saving treatment. Plus, a biker is badly hurt after a crash with a car and the team must treat him in a bed of stinging nettles.

programme.title: Helicopter ER: Looking Over All the Land
programme.desc: Cameras follow the flying doctors and paramedics of the Yorkshire Air Ambulance, who cover thousands of square miles of rugged landscapes, dramatic dales and bleak moors.

channel.desc: Across the UK, ambulance teams and Casualty department staff experience dramatic highs and lows as they attend to people in urgent need of medical assistance. 5 Emergency Rescue follows them as they tell their incredible stories of life and death.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sci Hard
programme.desc: While attending a tech convention, Team Scorpion is taken hostage by a group attempting a virtual heist.

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.

programme.title: Scorpion: Faire is Foul
programme.desc: For Sylvester's birthday, Team Scorpion visits a renaissance festival, but the revelry is cut short when a group tries to rob a nearby police evidence locker.

programme.title: Scorpion: It's Raining Men (Of War)
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Team Scorpion's new neighbor, Florence \, joins them at sea on a mission to destroy a floating island of trash, but her flawed contribution leaves her, Walter and Happy stranded on the quickly dissolving island.

programme.title: Scorpion: Crime Every Mountain
programme.desc: As Cabe's trial looms over Team Scorpion, a simple case goes sideways when they help a father and his daughter whose plane crashes nearby.

programme.title: Scorpion: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.sub-title: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.desc: As Team Scorpion anxiously awaits the verdict of Cabe's trial which could send him to prison, they focus their nervous energy on trying to save a dog stuck in a cistern.

programme.title: Scorpion: A Christmas Car-Roll
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, when Walter chooses work over spending quality time with his friends, he falls down the stairs and hits his head, and as he lays unconscious, he enters a dream world where Team Scorpion never existed.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Bunker Games
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with Toby's nemesis, Quincy Berkstead and his wife, Amy , when they are locked inside an artificially intelligent doomsday bunker that aims to kill them.

programme.title: Scorpion: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact.

programme.title: Scorpion: Wave Goodbye
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must prevent an incoming tsunami from hitting a vulnerable nuclear power facility, and Toby secretly helps his ex-fiancée retrieve her stolen identity.

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dumbster Fire
programme.desc: The geniuses of Team Scorpion turn into knuckleheads and Paige must simplify the science for them, when their mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole.

programme.title: Scorpion: Dork Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Team Scorpion inadvertently crashes a bank robbery in progress and is taken hostage. Also, Sylvester's feelings for Florence grow.

programme.title: Scorpion: Gator Done
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to the bayou to track down a cagey alligator in order to stop a deadly mosquito-borne virus, and Paige teaches Walter the concept of the 'white lie.'

programme.title: Scorpion: Foul Balls
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must use their high IQs to win a softball game when the homeland director challenges, with all of their future government contracts on the line.

programme.title: Scorpion: Kenny and the Jet
programme.desc: Paige's maternal side goes into high gear when Team Scorpion must save an unconscious, a hypothermic boy stuck in the wheel well of their airborne airplane.

channel.desc: An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Vow
programme.desc: Megatron's plan to split up the Autobot team and defeat them individually fails when it's revealed that the minicons have their own, secret agenda.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Rebellion
programme.desc: The Decepticons lose another battle: Megatron takes out his frustration on Starscream, beating him half to death for no reason. Sideways uses the situation to try to foment unrest and rebellion.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Chase
programme.desc: Trapped in cyberspace with Sideways, Alexis, Rad, Carlos and their minicons become aware of a massive evil entity, far more powerful and dangerous than Megatron, lurking threateningly in the background. Or was it all a dream?

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Tactician
programme.desc: A new transformer enters the solar system. On the moon, Thrust the master tactician arrives to assist Megatron in his battle against the Autobots, but all does not go according to plan.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Linkup
programme.desc: With Optimus damaged and temporarily out of commission, the newly-arrived Jetfire takes command - and seriously underestimates the Decepticons. But on the verge of defeat, Optimus reveals a new ability.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Detection
programme.desc: On the moon, Thrust continues his plotting with Megatron. On earth, despite Jetfire saying he's one of the good guys, the kids are suspicious of Sideways - as are the Decepticons. And something huge and ominous is approaching earth.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Awakening
programme.desc: The massive Tidalwave joins the Decepticons, but is, seemingly, defeated in battle by Hot Shot and Blurr. Alexis discovers three new minicons, which Sideways says combine to create another ultimate weapon, the Requiem Blaster.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Desperate
programme.desc: The kids try to gather the three Requiem Blaster minicons together. Sky Blast at first resists, then sings the others to him to save Optimus. They all realise there's more to the minicons than first appears.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Runaway
programme.desc: Understanding that the minicons want to be in charge of their own destinies, the kids sneak the new team out of the base. Thrust finds them, but so do the Autobots who save the day. It's agreed the minicons should not be forced to fight.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Past, Part 1
programme.desc: Enthusiastic young Sideswipe, Blurr's hero-worshipper, joins the team and Optimus tasks Hot Shot with training him. Wheeljack also arrives on earth, bent on revenge for Hot Shot seemingly abandoning him during a battle on Cybertron.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Past, Part 2
programme.desc: Desperate to make amends to his old friend, Hot Shot allows Wheeljack to shoot him, but this isn't enough. Wheeljack takes Sideswipe hostage, but Hot Shot rescues him. On the moon, Megatron welcomes Wheeljack to the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Sacrifice
programme.desc: Megatron sacrifices Starscream, leaving him to face the Autobots alone while the Decepticons infiltrate the Autobot base to capture the Requiem Blaster. Smokescreen sacrifices himself to try to protect the Blaster minicons.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Regeneration
programme.desc: Hearing Megatron say he is nothing more than disposable cannon fodder, Starscream defects with the Star Sabre. To prove he's genuine, he gives the Autobots details of the moon base. Red Alert works on what's left of Smokescreen.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Rescue
programme.desc: With Starscream's help, the Autobots infiltrate the Decepticon moon base, attempting to rescue all the minicons Megatron has captured and forced into building a spaceship.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Mars
programme.desc: Alexis tracks a minicon in the vicinity of Mars. Starscream gets there first, but is disabled by Tidalwave. Jetfire rescues him: on the way back Starscream spots and tries to entice the minicon. But first they must get past Megatron.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Crack
programme.desc: With the kids befriending and welcoming him, the Autobots deeply suspicious of him, and driven by his need to kill Megatron, the deeply conflicted Starscream trusts Thrust and returns to the moon base with the Star Sabre and Skyboom Shield.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Threaten
programme.desc: Sabre, Shield and Blaster together create the Hydra Cannon. Installed on their new ship, the Decepticons test it on a comet - then Megatron orders Starscream to use it to destroy the Autobot base. Problem is, that'll also destroy the earth.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Crisis
programme.desc: Optimus and Jetfire attack the ship, but can't stop the Hydra Cannon being deployed. Optimus makes the ultimate sacrifice and takes the full blast. Afterwards only his minicon and his matrix are found, but at least earth survives.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Remorse
programme.desc: Hot Shot insists they should take vengeance on the Decepticons: Scavenger, with the support of the minicons, reminds him of their true purpose. With Hot Shot's realisation of the right way forward, Jetfire hands over command to him.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Depart
programme.desc: With the Autobot ship ready to leave, Hot Shot, supported by the rest of the team, refuse to let the children accompany them. But then the minicons refuse to allow the ship to depart unless the kids are on board.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Miracle
programme.desc: As the Axalon chases the Decepticon ship, hundreds of minicons appear. The 'Cons turn back to fight, and the 'Bots seem doomed, but the minicons resurrect Optimus.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Puppet
programme.desc: Hot Shot and Red Alert are sucked through a wormhole. The minicons guide the Axalon to their location, where they are all attacked by Nemesis Prime. As the planet breaks up, the 'Cons shoot down the Axalon and escape.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Uprising
programme.desc: The 'Bots reach Cybertron to find Megatron (now calling himself Galvatron) already winning the war. The minicons fend off an attack by Unicron, warning of great danger, but Galvatron believes it just an Autobot trick.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Dash
programme.desc: While the battle continues, Hot Shot goes to Cybertron to try to convince Galvatron of the impending danger. Thrust's true allegiance and agenda is revealed.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Drift
programme.desc: Thrust flees into the depths of Cybertron, pursued by Hot Shot and Wheeljack - and, separately, Starscream, who saves the children from being killed. The children discover the origins of the minicons.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Portent
programme.desc: Thrust joins Sideways by passing through a portal deep underground: his pursuers follow and find themselves on Cybertron's moon, which begins to disintegrate. To everyone's horror, Unicron is revealed.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Cramp
programme.desc: To convince Galvatron he must ally with Optimus to prevent Unicron taking over the universe, Starscream makes the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Alliance
programme.desc: With the Decepticons and Autobots allied, both armadas engage the planet-sized, transformed Unicron in battle in order to save Cybertron.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Union
programme.desc: The only way to defeat Unicron is to wake the minicons inside him and attack from within as well as without. Red Alert and the kids use the portal to travel to Unicron's core.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Origin
programme.desc: With the minicons protecting Cybertron and Hot Shot's team attacking Unicron from outside, and Optimus and Galvatron facing Sideways at Unicron's heart, the purpose and meaning behind the endless war is revealed.

programme.title: Transformers: Armada: Mortal Combat
programme.desc: With Unicron seemingly defeated, Galvatron insists on settling things with Optimus, and the fight wakes Unicron again. Galvatron makes the ultimate sacrifice to finally end the threat. Jetfire and Hot Shot return the children to earth.

programme.title: Transformers: Cybertron: Fallen
programme.desc: When Cybertron is threatened by a colossal black hole, Optimus Prime and the Autobots give the order to evacuate the planet. However, a mysterious stranger holds one last hope…

programme.title: Transformers: Cybertron: Haven
programme.desc: With the help of their human friends, the Autobots construct a new HQ on Earth, but will Megatron discover their secret base before it's finished?

channel.desc: WELCOME TO THE INCREDIBLE UNIVERSE OF TRANSFORMERS. It is a universe of constant change, where nothing is as it seems. A universe where incredible, shape-shifting, sentient, living robots hide in plain sight, disguised as vehicles and beasts, and battle

programme.title: Survivorman: Alaska
programme.desc: As Stroud enters an ocean bay called "Taroka Arm" by sea kayak, there's only about four hours of twilight per day and he knows that Mother Nature is going to wreak havoc upon his internal clock.

programme.title: Survivorman: Canadian Arctic
programme.desc: Les has been equipped with a bare minimum of raw materials to aid him for the next 7 days; a hunk of uncooked seal liver, some oil-rich blubber for heat, a seal hook, three matches, and a knife.

programme.title: Survivorman: Lost at Sea
programme.desc: Les will be set adrift in an inflatable life raft off the coast of Belize. Not only does the life raft have a few bad water leaks, but it also leaks air, requiring Les to frequently re-inflate it.

programme.title: Survivorman: Texas/Utah
programme.desc: Les tracks Sasquatch from East Texas to rural Utah in an effort to elicit an encounter.

programme.title: Survivorman: Oregon
programme.desc: Les recreates the real life story of family who were lost and stranded for six days in the forests of Oregon.

programme.title: Survivorman: Top Ten
programme.desc: Les reviews his experiences surviving in the wild. While counting down ten wilderness survival issues he has faced, he shows segments of both shows relevant to each item.

programme.title: Survivorman: Where the Myth Began
programme.desc: Les tracks Bigfoot in the ancient red cedar forests of northwest California. This Sasquatch hotspot is renowned for reports of Bigfoot, and the forest is crawling with black bears. Will Les brave its dangers and catch Sasquatch on camera?

programme.title: Survivorman: Georgian Swamp
programme.desc: The swamplands of Georgia's Altamaha River Basin are all that one would expect of a primordial bog; dank, menacing, swimming with slithering creepy crawlies and of course, alligator infested.

programme.title: Survivorman: Oregon
programme.desc: Survivorman Legends tells the real life stories of people who survived: those who suffered terribly but made it through and those who died trying.

programme.title: Survivorman: Tierra del Fuego
programme.desc: Les will be dropped into this inhospitable landscape of Tierra del Fuego, Argentina, the easternmost tip of Isla Grande and left to survive with no food, no shelter, no water, and no safety gear or camera crew.

programme.title: Survivorman: The Hidden World
programme.desc: Les plants himself in Bigfoot hot spots across North America, collecting stories and experiences from Bigfoot believers, gathering and examining evidence to debunk the mysteries that surround this ancient legend.

programme.title: Survivorman: Smoky Mountain Sasquatch
programme.desc: Les goes deep into the heart of Tennessee's Great Smoky Mountains in pursuit of Bigfoot. Encounters with an unknown creature have been reported in this black bear hotspot, and Les knows that where bears thrive, Sasquatch can thrive, too.

programme.title: Survivorman: Northern Ontario
programme.desc: Temagami is home of some of the oldest rocks on the face of the planet, old growth pine forests, clear deep lakes, and boasts artifacts and stone drawings dating as far back as 6000 B.C.

programme.title: Survivorman: Kalahari
programme.desc: Les has his work cut out for him surviving in the scorching red sands of the Kalahari Desert. With only enough water for four days, Les mimics the Bushmen and sits still in the shade during daylight.

programme.title: Survivorman: Sierra Nevada Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Les finds himself in the predicament of a lost hiker. Travelling with a typical "day hiker" pack – only provisions for an overnight stay – Les needs to make the most of what he's brought with him.

programme.title: Survivorman: The Lost Pilot Summer
programme.desc: This one-hour special chronicles Les's first time surviving for the cameras in August of 2001. With just two cameras, a few items and his wits, Les survives in the Canadian wild.

channel.desc: Outdoorsman and survival expert Les Stroud permits himself to be stranded for a week in a remote location with no equipment or supplies apart from his one-man camera rig, documenting his experience and providing insight into how to manage the wilderness.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: How a biochemistry and molecular biology professor's evidence exonerated a woman convicted of murdering her infant.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: After a young woman goes missing on the way to the train station, investigators use a strand of hair and a bloody pillowcase to identify a suspect.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A speck of bicycle paint and a speck of nickel left over from a collision with a twice-convicted child molester's car provide critical clues in the murder of a 9-year-old.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A 2-year-old boy's brain seizures and breathing problems baffle doctors until they learn the mother exhibits signs of Munchausen syndrome by proxy, a rare condition that led her to physically abuse her son and contributed to her daughter's death.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A man in intense pain checks into the hospital, but he deteriorates. Something he's being given in the hospital isn't curing him, it's poisoning him.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police track the killer of two adolescent boys by using profiling, hypnosis and a scientific analysis of the rope used during the crimes.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Hi-tech computer image enhancement leads to an arrest in a murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A new life-insurance policy sparks suspicions of murder when a woman's body is found at the bottom of the basement stairs.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When more than a dozen children contract a mysterious and deadly illness in Seattle, medical investigators frantically search for a cause and cure.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: After the baffling deaths of more than 20 people on an Indian reservation, Navajo medicine men provide a clue that leads to a most unlikely killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A man says he returned to his hotel after a run to find his wife drowned in the bathtub, but a life insurance policy raises investigators' suspicions.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: This edition shows how computer technology and behavioural science combine to create a new forensic tool - geographical profiling which helps police in their pursuit of a rapist.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a 22-year-old woman falsely confesses to a series of murders, investigators inspect incriminating fibres that lead to the real killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The bodies of a woman and her son are found in a field. Insects found on the bodies and a suspicious blond hair help to track down the killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A decomposed body is found in a barrel, and a dilapidated address book may hold the answer, but investigators must find a way to read the pages because the passage of 30 years has turned them blank.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a policeman's home is burned to the ground, he later arrests a man who confesses to the arson, but the confession is dubious.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a pregnant woman was attacked, her unborn child was killed. She accused her husband, who spent years in jail until new DNA evidence emerged.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A mother and her two young daughters are found brutally murdered and sexually violated. The crime scene has no shortage of evidence, but investigators cannot find a conclusive link to their prime suspect.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young girl is found dead, the victim of an apparent sex-killer. There are few clues to the killer's identity, but authorities are intrigued by unusual orange fibers embedded in clothing found near the victim.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A man descends into a life of seclusion and is later accused of killing his wife, but the marks found on her body could prove his innocence.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In a Texan hospital, more kids are dying than in any other hospital in the country. Police close in on a nurse who was on duty during the fatalities.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When the decomposed body of a young girl is discovered, police have no clues to her identity. But days earlier, a stabbing victim told them she thought she might have witnessed a murder.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a doctor's wife disappears, investigators use concrete from the doctor's yard and the recollections of a child to determine what happened.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Romanian archbishop Valerian D. Trifa, living in the U.S., is accused of being a Nazi war criminal, and forensic experts find evidence on an incriminating, 40-year-old postcard.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young woman goes missing, and the police investigation reveals her past double life as a call girl. Both her clients and her boyfriend are suspects in her disappearance.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Police investigating the death of a gym teacher suspect his wife of foul play. A videotape recorded by the victim just before his death reveals his strange marriage.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a gym teacher was found shot to death, the police suspect his wife of foul play, and a videotape recorded by the victim reveals his strange marriage.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In Delano, California, investigators discover a dead girl on desolate farmland. Mail box keys found on her person help them solve the mystery.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Detectives question a death that was originally deemed an accident. An exhumation and second post mortem will determine what really happened.

channel.desc: This long-running iconic true crime series examines the extraordinary forensic techniques used to catch some of America’s most infamous murderers, featuring expert testimony and reconstructions to reveal how science helps resolve criminal convictions.

programme.title: Mega Builders: London Olympic Aquatics Centre
programme.desc: A group of engineers in England and Wales has taken on the biggest challenge of the next Summer Olympic Games -- the construction of a complex steel-truss roof for the new Aquatics Centre.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Peak Power
programme.desc: Deep in Canada's rugged western coastal mountains a new hydroelectric project is underway. It's a 600 million dollar venture diverting massive glacial rivers into a huge pipeline built against down steep mountain slopes.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Spanning the Saigon River
programme.desc: In Ho Chi Minh City (formerly known as Saigon), engineers are on a mission to modernize. Construction is underway to raise Phu My Bridge, a brand-new $100 million cable-stayed bridge.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: Which was the invention that propelled the construction of higher and higher buildings? Concrete? Iron? It's the elevator. From the Tower of Babel to the Kingdom Tower in Saudi Arabia, humankind has always searched to build bigger and higher.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: How are gravity defying bridges designed? For centuries there have been countless and huge advances in the field of civil engineering. Thanks to the explanations of leading, the viewer plunges into a world of inventions.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: To fly... A dream that has shaped the history of humanity. A story of crazy flyers - inventors, scientists - pursuing their dream, often risking their lives doing so. Matthieu Barreau went in search of these intrepid pioneers.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: For centuries there have been countless and huge advances in the field of civil engineering. Thanks to the explanations of leading experts in physics, maths and other hard sciences. In this film we look at the masters of rail.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering
programme.desc: 70% of the earth's surface is covered by water and much of the history of man's discovery of the earth is linked to oceans. From the fragile boats which sailed along the Mediterranean coasts to the majestic ships which sailed off to the New World.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Best Of
programme.desc: This season Mega Builders Vl will take viewers back to some of the most amazing engineering projects we’ve ever covered over the past five seasons to see them reach completion after years of hard work.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Tunnel Vision
programme.desc: Deep under the Swiss alps there is a light at the end of the world’s longest tunnel. This April, after twelve long years it will be completely cut end to end.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Bangkok Bridge
programme.desc: The new 13-km Industrial Ring Road will be a combination of elevated roads, bridges and tunnels, designed to help ease the congestion in Bangkok.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Tunneling Through History
programme.desc: Deep beneath the layers of bones, broken pottery and foundations of ancient mosques and early Christian churches, the final TBM is about to emerge after tunneling through the last underground station.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: A new iconic stadium rises in Rio De Janeiro. The futuristic Joao Havelange Olympic Stadium will be the main venue for the 2007 Pan Am Games.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Extreme Elevation
programme.desc: An international team of the best construction engineers on the planet are building the world's tallest skyscraper in the United Arab Emirate city of Dubai.

programme.title: Mega Builders: Sinking Wings
programme.desc: The goal is to turn the coastal waters off southern British Columbia in Canada into the wreck-diving capital of the world by sinking massive objects, wait a few years for the fish to move in, and the corals to grow.

channel.desc: Join us on Pluto TV Big Builds as we celebrate the world's most gigantic marvels of engineering! Get ready for a massive line-up of shows that delve into the biggest, most complex and most dangerous building projects in the world.

programme.title: Wardens: Operation Summer Recreation
programme.desc: This week, we're near Seeley Lake, Montana, as the wardens from Region 2 are kept busy with the summer recreation crowd.

programme.title: Wardens: Operation Rocky Mountain Front
programme.desc: This week, game wardens are kept busy during hunting season as they're out catching poachers with an elk decoy, tracking down trespassers, and checking tags.

programme.title: Wardens: Operation Check Point
programme.desc: When your job is protecting our most precious natural resources in some of the nation's most remote areas, there is rarely a dull moment. Wardens chronicles the lives of Conservation Officers in America.

programme.title: World's Wildest Police Videos: World's Scariest Police Stings

programme.title: World's Wildest Police Videos: Riots: Mobs Out of Control
programme.desc: This episode features some of the worst rioting captured on video.

channel.desc: A factual documentary channel following police units as they serve and protect within their communities.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Ninety Degrees
programme.desc: Andy heads out with a very-pregnant Marlo to find a volatile woman who’s gone missing after group therapy, but neither Andy nor Marlo are prepared when Marlo suddenly goes into labor.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fresh Paint
programme.desc: Andy McNally’s first shift on the job turns into mayhem when shots are fired in a downtown rooming house. In the midst of the chaos, Andy triumphantly makes her first big arrest

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Mercury Retrograde
programme.desc: As the other rookies hunt down a dangerous escaped convict, Swarek drags Andy through his undercover hauntson a mission he won’t explain. At first, Andy assumes Swarek is a rogue cop trying to settle scores from his undercover days.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fite Nite
programme.desc: While working on a high-stakes gun raid, Andy and Gail stumble upon a victim of domestic abuse whose brutal experience in the system has taught her not to trust the police.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Signals Crossed
programme.desc: Andy’s undercover skills are tested –and found to be lacking –during a citywidecampaign to clean up the streets, whenshe’s tapped to pose as a prostitute in order to arrest unsuspecting johns.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Broad Daylight
programme.desc: A home invasion at an upscale address leads to a massive first response call that brings out the training officers in full force. After the scene is cleared, Andy and Traci remain behind with the terrified homeowner.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bullet Proof
programme.desc: Andy’s romance with Det. Luke Callaghan gets complicated when he chooses her for a special assignment -serving a search warrant for a bullet lodged in the head of a witness to murder.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Hot & Bothered
programme.desc: A severe heat wave wreaks havoc on the city, forcing the rookies to work around the clock to keep the peace. In the midst of the chaos, Andy discovers that a serial rapist may have resurfaced to prey on vulnerable teenage girls.

channel.desc: Serve. Protect. Don’t screw up. At the police academy they trained, fought, drank and slept together. Now they’re on the job together. They’re ready to brave anything on the job; it’s only their personal lives that could use the back-up.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: After returning home to England, Robin of Loxley learns that the evil Sheriff of Nottingham has seized his family estate. He soon joins forces with a band of oppressed rebels in a daring plan to rob the Sheriff of his money and take away his power.

programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.

programme.title: The Changeover

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team steps in to protect a main prosecution witness whose life has been threatened prior to the trial.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: A Jiridian probe headed for Earth is shot down by the Taelon Embassy and crashes outside of D.C. Liam recovers the probe, but he, Augur, and Julia are captured by another underground resistance movement led by the real Colonel Liam Kincaid.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crossfire
programme.desc: As the election draws near, Liam believes Zo'or is trying to have Jonathan Doors murdered. The Resistance worries that an attack is imminent at the final debate. Julia mobilizes a group to protect Doors against Liam's wishes.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crackdown
programme.desc: An unknown woman saves Augur and Liam from the raids on the Resistance. Lili sabotages the mother ship, but Zo'or stops its total destruction. Lili is reportedly dead. The investigation on the President's shooter continues.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Vanished
programme.desc: Some who were detained during the Resistance sweep have not reappeared after their release. Lili is taken to a lab run by Sandoval and implanted. Renee tries to help Liam find the missing people.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Emancipation
programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: A joint Doors International/Taelon venture creates a machine that allows people to vividly relive a memory, but Liam suspects a back alley version of the device is leading to the death of some users.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Once and Future World
programme.desc: Artifacts believed to be Taelon are found in South America. Renee and Liam try to beat Sandoval to the source to determine the importance of the found pieces.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Thicker than Blood
programme.desc: An old business partner of Augur's is hired by Da'an to get information about the Resistance, resulting in the death of many members. Meanwhile, Sandoval finds out he has a life threatening blood disorder.

programme.title: The Lost World: Into the Fire
programme.desc: The incredible occurs when a Navy airship flies over the plateau. Malone manages to climb aboard, but is ambushed once inside and meets the deceptive Captain Askwith.

programme.title: The Lost World: Out of the Blue
programme.desc: Marguerite, Roxton, and Challenger take the place of Askwith aboard his ghost ship and return to the day of its fatal departure in 1915. Back on the Plateau, Veronica chases down Askwith.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Travelers
programme.desc: Malone remains missing, and the explorers' search party crosses paths with a trio of travelers. Marguerite becomes taken with the dashing leader, especially when he offers her a way off the Plateau.

programme.title: The Lost World: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: Roxton learns what it's like to be the hunted after he kills a Triceratops. Osina-a mystical, half-dinosaur guardian-puts a curse on him that makes him the target of a mysterious hunter.

programme.title: The Lost World: True Spirit
programme.desc: Veronica and Marguerite use a ouija board to communicate with Malone, who Veronica believes is trapped in a spirit realm. However, their attempt may have aroused the spirit of Saros, a dead warlord.

programme.title: Sanctuary: The Five
programme.desc: While leading a covert meeting in Rome, Magnus encounters Nikola Tesla, an old friend from her past who confides that the Cabal has come to exact revenge on her for the events in 'Fata Morgana'.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Edward
programme.desc: A young artist with an uncanny ability to draw remarkably detailed pictures from memory may be the key to a solving a case surrounding the suspicious death of his abusive father.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Requiem
programme.desc: Magnus and Will investgate a distressing call for help deep below the Bermuda Triangle resulting in a deadly battle to save Magnus’s life.

channel.desc: More TV Sci-fi brings you even more aliens, spaceships and downright weirdness to satisfy your sci-fi cravings!

programme.title: Aliens Among Us: The Michael Wolf Theory
programme.sub-title: Aliens Among Us : The Michael Wolf Theory
programme.desc: Michael K. Wolf shares 30 years of insights on UFOs, aliens, government projects, and crop circles.

programme.title: The UFO Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: 1942 LA: A mysterious UFO causes blackout & artillery fire. Remains unexplained.

programme.title: Ancient Alien America
programme.desc: Native cultures have handed down shocking accounts for generations of Aliens from other worlds visiting Earth in the ancient past and their involvement with them.

programme.title: 27 Alien Encounters
programme.desc: Strange and bizarre UFO encounters abound, but recent Alien encounters by highly credible eyewitnesses are so unusual and perplexing that they challenge our understanding of physics and the Universe as we know it.

programme.title: Confessions Of An Alien Abductee
programme.desc: Chantelle, Marie and Simon are all alien abductees. These ordinary people share their extraordinary stories as they seek help through the curiously named Anomalous Mind Management Abductee Contactee Helpline, or AMMACH.

programme.title: Linda Napolitano: The Alien Abduction of the Century
programme.desc: Linda Napolitano's 1989 alien abduction is the abduction case of the century.

programme.title: The Hills' Abduction: The Zeta Reticuli Incident
programme.sub-title: The Hills' Abduction : The Zeta Reticuli Incident
programme.desc: Barney & Betty Hill's abduction and the Zeta reticuli incident explored.

programme.title: The Falcon Lake Incident
programme.desc: Aliens visit Earth often; Canada's 1967 Falcon Lake UFO incident stands out. Canada's frequent sightings make it enigmatic.

programme.title: UFO Conspiracies: The Hidden Truth
programme.desc: This documentary charts the US government's involvement with UFO phenomenon from 1947 to the present day. Featuring rare classified footage, expert interviews, cover-ups and the revelation of a secret 20 million dollar UFO research program.

programme.title: Ancient Alien Origins
programme.desc: Researchers discover that aliens from another world assisted in the evolution of man and were the genesis of a very real bloodline that remains intact today.

programme.title: Ancient Engineers: Aliens On Earth
programme.desc: Our evolution may be influenced by our ancestors and their Gods. We are not alone in the universe.

channel.desc: Learn the shocking truth about extraterrestrial beings on planet Earth and join 'Ancient Aliens' star Philip Coppens, top scientists and military strategists who dramatize what would happen if and when aliens attack. Watch now on Pluto TV Alien Invasion!

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 4
programme.desc: Michael needs help with a holiday tattoo that's writing cheques his anatomy can't cash. Superfan Emma wants to commit to ink her love for Cheryl Fernandez-Versini. A fire-eater lights up Jay's eyes.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 11
programme.desc: Jay covers Jack's offensive nickname tatt, while Sketch sweeps away Mark's cobwebs.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 2
programme.desc: Sketch slays Fiona's zombie, while Glen gives magician George a frightening new friend.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 12
programme.desc: Sketch helps Sian cover a clown tattoo that's scaring the life out of anyone who sees it. Jay has to deal with Emma's extremely intimate cat portrait. Daz needs assistance covering a boastful tattoo.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 3
programme.desc: Glamour model Bex wants to put her Jedward tattoo behind her, and Andy has an inspirational tattoo story. Annie hopes to fix a tattoo that, after a mid-inking disagreement, didn't turn out as planned.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 7
programme.desc: Drag queen Devon feels snared by his barbed-wire tattoo because it's a painful reminder of an ex. Alice welcomes Halloween-loving Chippy, whose portrait of her daughter is more than a little spooky.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 12
programme.desc: Glen devours Harri's fast food foul-up, while Sketch knocks out boxer Russell's tattoo.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 15
programme.desc: Hayley's cheeky cartoon tattoo is threatening to derail her wedding plans. Mick wants to cover an X-rated inking that's causing embarrassment to his daughter. Dom's saucy camel is giving him the hump.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 9
programme.desc: Alice paints over Francesca's pitiful Picasso. Sketch gives Madison a memorial to her mum.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 14
programme.desc: The artists cover Zoe's tattoo dedicated to her favourite food, Sean's lewd and lengthy leprechaun that his wife wants rid of, and Chantal's pitiful pop portrait that looks like a famous footballer.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 7
programme.desc: Sketch tackles Nick's measuring stick, while Glen helps heathen Bob get an honour inking.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 8
programme.desc: Jay tackles Mark's Greek tragedy, while Alice helps Lois to celebrate her penguin persona.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 1
programme.desc: Vicky celebrates her family with an animal tribute tattoo, Abby's cringe-worthy celebrity crush is covered, Jordan needs to lose the ink he got to win an argument, and Adam has a rather personal tatt.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 9
programme.desc: Ladies' man Ash needs help covering an embarrassing portrait of his beloved mum. Sean wants a cover for his leg tattoo of two dogs doing what comes naturally. Dancer Jay-Jay loses her X-rated tatt.

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers: Episode 11
programme.desc: Jay covers Jack's offensive nickname tatt, while Sketch sweeps away Mark's cobwebs.

channel.desc: Talented tattoo artists transform extreme inking disasters into walking works of art as clients with regrettable tattoos visit their pop-up parlour for a badly needed body art consultation.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Star of Nadir
programme.desc: An anonymous Sultan's wife Danielle dies in mysterious circumstances in the desert. However, she had called for Sydney to help. Sydney believes Danielle was searching for the Star of Nadir.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?

programme.title: Renegade: Liar's Poker
programme.desc: A woman escapes from a correctional facility and goes on the run. Reno and Bobby take on the case and enlist the help of a local Sheriff.

programme.title: Renegade: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Reno poses as a ranch hand once again and uncovers a plot where con artists are selling illegitimate horses as supposed top thoroughbreds.

programme.title: Renegade: An Uncle in the Business
programme.desc: Reno goes to see Lisa, the daughter of the hit man who was sent to kill him. While he's there, someone breaks into the house.

programme.title: Renegade: Offshore Thunder
programme.desc: A well publicized death at a regatta gets Reno's attention when he sees his dead fiancée's sister on television.

programme.title: Renegade: Studs
programme.desc: A woman from Bobby's past gets victimized by an upscale male escort service that sets up robberies of its wealthy clients.

programme.title: Renegade: Another Place and Time
programme.desc: A mafia prince is murdered in broad daylight. The assassin is so well connected that he is virtually untouchable.

programme.title: Renegade: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Dutch Dixon's son Donnie gets out of prison and decides that he will sell his father up the river for the right price.

programme.title: The Debt Collector
programme.desc: French is a martial artist that takes on a job as a mob debt collector in order to make ends meet. He does whatever it takes to chase down individuals until he meets a bartender that makes him question whether he should do the right thing.

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.

channel.desc: It’s time to go into overdrive by jumping off buildings, flying a burning plane, driving in a car chase and saving the world. Pluto TV Action brings you blockbusters, stars, and a strong dose of high-octane excitement.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keep Your Enemies Closer
programme.desc: The shuttle Liam and Zo'or are in crashes over wilderness, but survive in safety bubbles. The people they meet live off the earth and know nothing of the Taelons. However, Zo'or is injured and missing a Synod meeting on the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Subterfuge
programme.desc: Sandoval has a mole attempting to gain information about Liam - particularly concerning his commitment to the Taelons. When a Taelon and protector are killed in a portal that malfunctions, Liam is suspicious that it was intentional.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: Bombings begin at embassies and Liam believes they may reignite the SI (Sino-Indian) War, which ended with an armistice several years before. An old intelligence agency friend of Renee's has interesting holographic technology.

programme.title: Frank Herbert's Dune: Episode 1
programme.desc: On order of the emperor, Duke Leto Atreides moves his family from his home planet Caladan to another planet, Arrakis, also known as Dune. After an attack on their stronghold, his son Paul and his concubine flee into the desert.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Liam Kincaid races against the clock to find Zo'or, who disappears after contracting an ancient Taelon virus that has the potential to cause a devastating plague.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Through Your Eyes
programme.desc: Zo'or kidnaps a comatose policeman in order to use the man's body as a 'vessel' in a consciousness transfer experiment that will allow him to 'test' the human survival instinct and cause havoc on Earth.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Time Bomb
programme.desc: While examining Ma'el's ship, Liam and Renee find a chamber and in it are some life pods and the persons are all dead except for one.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Fields
programme.desc: Liam investigates a mission run by the Church of the Companions when a friend of his disappears. Sandoval and the Taelons are concerned about "the fields" where something vital to the Taelons' survival is harvested.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Apparition
programme.desc: Liam investigates the suspicious death of a banker, which he saw in a dream. It seems to be an exiled Taelon spirit that is contacting him. Da'an berates Zo'or for his money and power hungry attitude.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: One Taelon Avenue
programme.desc: Joshua Doors is running his own technology development company and Renee goes undercover to find out what is going on. An artificial intelligence program of the Taelons that controls human minds seems to be acting on its own.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Abduction
programme.desc: A volunteer who was working to interpret an ancient message from Ma'el assaults Da'an and escapes through a portal. Sandoval helps Da'an avoid interrogation from Zo'or while they try to locate her.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Arrival
programme.desc: A Taelon shuttle is shot down over Antarctica. There are Jiridians aboard, but two of the passengers escape. When Augur discovers Lili's blood on the ship, he is convinced that she is not dead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors. Starring: Brittany Allen, Freddie Stroma, Jesse Moss

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone. Starring: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet

channel.desc: Explore the farthest reaches of space, battle evil robots, and travel through time on Pluto TV Sci-Fi, the mothership for the best science fiction and fantasy movies in the galaxy, beaming up to you 24 hours a day.

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: The Stoke crews cope with a major heart attack and a nasty football injury, while in Dudley, the paramedics help an elderly diabetic man with severe stomach pains.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Grime artist and self-taught chef Big Zuu travels to Croydon with his food truck and sidekicks Hyder and Tubsey to cook a meal that will impress Jimmy Carr just after he steps off stage.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu heads to Portsmouth to cook a meal for comedian Rosie Jones. Rosie is on tour and is desperate for some quality fish and chips. In an attempt to meet her expectations, Zuu goes out for a spot of fishing.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu goes regal as he visits Royal Leamington Spa to prepare a feast for actor and comedian Guz Khan. In order to impress Guz, Zuu sets out to prepare both meat-based and plant-based dishes.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu is back home in London as he prepares to cook for comedian Phil Wang whilst he tours with his show. Eager to impress, Zuu's mum is enlisted to help make the perfect jollof rice.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu and the boys are back on the road heading to Cardiff to cook for American stand-up and actor Desiree Burch. She's in the Welsh capital with her new show, 'Desiree's Coming Early'.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu heads off to Hackney in East London in order to prepare a three-course meal for comedian Jamali Maddix. Along the way, he dives deep into the local delicacy that is jellied eels.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu and the boys are going international flying all the way to the Isle of Man to cook for comedian, Josh Widdicombe, who on his Bit Much tour. However, first they will need to source a new food truck on the island.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu heads to Soho to see if he can meet the culinary expectations of comedian London Hughes. To make his task even more interesting, London makes a £1,000 wager that he won't be able to impress her.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu takes his food van to Manchester in order to prepare a slap-up meal for comedian Ed Gamble. The fact that Ed is a self-confessed cheese lover gives Zuu plenty of options when it comes to deciding what to cook.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Big Eats
programme.desc: Big Zuu and sidekicks Tubsey and Hyder travel to the spa town of Bath in order to cook for comedian Lou Sanders. Providing an extra challenge is the fact that Lou is a committed vegan.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Christmas Eats
programme.desc: AJ Tracey, JME, Julie Adenuga and Loyle Carner chat around the dinner table while Zuu serves Big Zuu Bissap, a V-Gang Gobi Christmas Curry and a next level Christmas dinner.

programme.title: Big Zuu's Christmas Eats
programme.desc: Phil Wang, Desiree Burch, Ed Gamble and Rosie Jones return for more of Zuu's delicious eats but not before he takes them on some festive foraging.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 1
programme.desc: Gemma Collins – with team mates James “Arg” Argent, legendary TV personality Carol Vorderman, comedian Ellie Taylor and TV presenter Rick Edwards fighting to maintain any sense of decorum and to get a word in edge wise.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 8
programme.desc: This show sees DJ Matt Edmondson lead his teammates TV legend Debbie McGee, dancer Kimberley Wyatt, retired footballer Michael Owen and reality TV star Chris Hughes.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 3
programme.desc: This week’s celebrities taking on the maze are Rylan Clarke, Adil Ray, Tamara Wall and Joel Dommett.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 12
programme.desc: TV presenter Laura Whitmore Captains her team; comedian Chris Ramsey, dancers Perri Kiely and Jordan Banjo, and retired rugby player Gareth Thomas into a world of physical, mental, skilful and mysterious challenges.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Celeb 3 - David, Wayne, Rachel, Charlotte, Judy
programme.sub-title: Celeb 3 - David, Wayne, Rachel, Charlotte, Judy
programme.desc: Judy Murray captains a team of celebs hoping to ace their way to the Crystal Dome. Paralympic David Weir, footballer Wayne Bridge, Countdown's Rachel Riley and TV’s Charlotte Crosby all combine to tackle skill, physical, mystery and mental challenges.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 5
programme.desc: This instalment of the Crystal Maze sees DJ Melvin Odoom captain comedian Al Murray, actor Kara Tointon, reality TV stalwart Olivia Attwood and actor Ashley Taylor-Dawson through the ubiquitous 4 zones.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Celeb 5 - The Derry Girls cast
programme.desc: Maze Master Richard Ayoade leads team captain Saoirse Monica Jackson and her fellow cast members Jamie-Lee O'Donnell, Louisa Harland, Nicola Coughlan and Dylan Llewellyn on a time-travelling adventure to collect those precious crystals.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 6
programme.desc: This week’s intrepid band of celebrity Mazekateers are ably led by ‘dad vibe’ BAFTA winning actor and League Of Gentlemen lynchpin Steve Pemberton. Hot stepping support comes in the form of Strictly’s Oti Mabuse and Naked Attraction’s Anna Richardson.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 1
programme.desc: Tonight’s celebrity adventurers are Steve Jones, Scarlett Moffatt, David Coulthard, Jodie Kidd & Joey Essex.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 9
programme.desc: Pop star and captain Fleur East leads this thespian filled episode of the Crystal Maze guiding actors John Thompson, Nina Wadia and Natalie Cassidy as well as realty TV’s Georgia “Toff” Toffolo on a wild ride full of twists and turns in every zone.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Episode 4
programme.desc: This gathering of the Crystal Maze is captained by actor Sunetra Sarker as she pilots plucky TV broadcaster Matthew Wright, seasoned politician Anne Widdecombe actor Nikki Sampson and reality TV Hunk Wes Nelson.

programme.title: The Crystal Maze Celebrity: Celeb 1 - Big Narstie, Kelly, Greg, Jorgie, Alfie
programme.sub-title: Celeb 1 - Big Narstie, Kelly, Greg, Jorgie, Alfie
programme.desc: Olympic legend Dame Kelly Holmes takes charge of grime MC Big Narstie, actress Jorgie Porter, internet superstar Alfie Deyes and fellow gold medallist Greg Rutherford on an action-packed journey to the Crystal Dome.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The search for Lori Hackingfollows the investigation into her disappearance and how a multitude of forensic techniques revealed her killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The investigation into the shooting and how the FBI and FMPD identified the killer and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: 'Conned to Death' covers the murder of Michele MacNeill and how investigators and forensics brought her killer to justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: December 2000: 19-year-old Rachel Manning was murdered in Milton Keynes. Two men were wrongfully convicted, but new advances in forensics proved that evil always leaves a trace.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: When the body of a child is found, Boston State Police have no leads, but with the help of the National Centre for Missing and Exploited Children, a trace is found.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Edinburgh, October 1977: Christine Eadie and Helen Scott vanish without a trace. The police never stopped hunting for justice, even changing the law to bring justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Tracie Andrews purportedly witnessed the murder of her boyfriend, Lee Harvey, in a country lane on the night of 1st December 1996; but all was not what it seemed.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: In late 1992, an attack led to an investigation which would last nearly a quarter of a century. Over time, DNA profiling helped to close a case which detectives feared would never be solved.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: David Jackson left his home to buy beer and cigarettes. He was never seen again. For 15 years his disappearance remained unsolved, until one investigator broke the case wide open.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: The murder of Lynette White led to the longest murder trial in British history at the time. Find out how police work and DNA eventually led police to her killer.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: Rachel O'Reilly was savagely murdered in her home, in what looked like a burglary gone wrong. A ground-breaking investigation finally put her killer behind bars.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: A popular, healthy, 60-year-old woman suffered a sudden, painful death. Detectives managed to trace the killer, despite their calculated and elaborate web of deceit.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: A killer, who stalked and gained his victim's trust, enticed her to her death. Almost two decades later scientific advances brought the perpetrator to justice.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: A man returning from a family visit stops to help what appears to be a stranded group on the Belt Parkway in Brooklyn, NY. Half an hour later, he is found dead.

programme.title: Evidence of Evil
programme.desc: In January 1992, when an estate agent went missing, both police and her family feared the worst. For 25-year-old Stephanie Slater, it was the start of an 8 day ordeal defined by torture and terror.

channel.desc: The series relives some landmark criminal cases of recent times where these new and innovative investigative techniques have changed the course of the investigations and dramatically assisted detectives in bringing the guilty to justice.

programme.title: South Park: Tonsil Trouble
programme.desc: Tonsil Trouble: A botched blood transfusion results in Cartman getting AIDS. How far will he go to find a cure? Kyle had better watch out... (S12, E01)

programme.title: South Park: Britney's New Look
programme.desc: Britney's New Look: The media circus arrives in South Park as Britney Spears hides in the town. After a photo of her urinating on a ladybug sells for $100,000 the boys have a brain wave. (S12, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Major B**bage
programme.desc: Major B**bage: The hysterical parents of South Park have another reason to panic after 'cheesing' becomes popular among kids. Kenny becomes addicted to the out-of-this-world hallucinations. (S12, E03)

programme.title: South Park: Canada on Strike
programme.desc: Canada on Strike: Canada is brought to the brink of collapse after a drawn out strike in pursuit of 'some of that internet money'. Can the boys save the day with a "YouToob" sensation? (S12, E04)

programme.title: South Park: Eek, A Pen*s!
programme.desc: Eek, A Pen*s! Ms. Garrison wants to become a man again, so whilst she is away Cartman becomes the sub teacher. It's not long before Cartman is teaching innercity kids the fun of cheating! (S12, E05)

channel.desc: Relive the dawn of the South Park era, with legendary episodes of the groundbreaking, Emmy® Award-winning animated classic. Follow everyone's favorite troublemakers—Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny--from the very beginning of their unforgettable adventures.

programme.desc: More mechanical mayhem as teams of roboteers do battle to become king of the scrap heap.
