programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: More mechanical mayhem as teams of roboteers do battle to become king of the scrap heap. Let the trials begin!

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The small but mighty Storm II takes on Mayhem, Rhino and Supernova in round one, as Mayhem fights its first battle. Team Steel Avenger named the heat, the Heat of Doom as it includes Supernova, Shredder Evolution and Storm II.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Thermidor 2 and Kronic the Wedgehog meet again in a replay of another heat. Thermidor 2 puts up an impressive fight as it takes down every robot in its path.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Heat number 11 of the series sees controversy as T-Wrecks makes a bold move that breaks the rule about having an active weapon. Round one pits Mantis, Infernal Contraption, Bulldog Breed and Jabber against one another.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight robots enter the arena, including old crowd favourite, Behemoth. Heat L also features a grudge match to settle the score between Behemoth and Crushtacean.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Champion robot Panic Attack returns in the thirteenth heat of the series. A series 5 round is replicated as the Four Horsemen and Team Panic Attack are once again pitted against each another.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: In the 14th heat of the seventh series, round one sees Spawn Again, Chip and NEATer Machine do battle with Revenge of Trouble & Strife. The next round pits Topbot against R.O.C.S and Raging Nightmare.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: As the semifinals draw near, Bigger Brother makes its mark in the arena, as it takes on Colossus and Typhoon 2 in round one. Round two sees DisConstructor tackle Xenomorph, Hammerhead 2 and Iron-Awe 2.1.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Firestorm makes a long-awaited comeback in a battle against Daisy-Cutter, Black and Blue, and Bamm Bamm. Heat P determines the robots who will make it to the semi-finals of the seventh series.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Eight competitors compete for a spot in the next semi-final round as half are eliminated. Round 1 sees Tornado employ the use of a spinner drum to flip its opponent.

channel.desc: Mech+ is the home of Robot Wars, remastered in HD for the first time! Mech+ features every series of Robot Wars UK, both classics and the revival seasons, and also includes never before seen episodes considered ‘lost media’.

programme.title: A Haunting: A Haunting in Ireland
programme.desc: The Fahey family’s new addition stirs up psychic energy of a crime committed years ago.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghost Protector
programme.desc: A mother and daughter both believe their house is haunted. But while the mother believes it's the spirit of her murdered boyfriend, her daughter believes it's much darker. Paranormal experts investigate and uncover an epic battle between good and evil.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Apartment
programme.desc: The Spencer’s move to a new apartment that is loud with spirits.

programme.title: A Haunting: Living Nightmare
programme.desc: Angela, a newlywed, is excited to start her new life with Stephen when nightmares that she experienced as a child suddenly resurface. Soon the menacing old hag from her dreams terrorizes her daughter and takes temporary possession of her son.

programme.title: A Haunting: Demons Never Die
programme.desc: Shortly after starting a new job and moving his family to the suburbs, Bill Toler suspects his house is haunted. Paranormal investigators uncover a portal in their home and discover a demon followed Bill home from his job at the state penitentiary.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Exorcism Of Cindy Sauer
programme.desc: Georgia single mother Cindy Sauer is finally getting back on her feet after the sudden death of her husband. But as she is recovering from her loss, nightmares and dark shadows haunt the family and mark the beginning of something far worse.

programme.title: A Haunting: Dark Dreams
programme.desc: A nightmare starts when Chris starts renovating his family dream house. A ghost haunts the home. Only with the help of paranormal investigators, priests, psychics, and shamans does Chris figure out a way to protect his family and "evict" the evil spirit.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ashes To Evil
programme.desc: Soon after moving in a large apartment in Hampton, Tennessee, Amelia’s family can’t shake the feeling that they are not alone. An evil entity lurks in their dream home and is targeting family members. They turn to paranormal investigators for help.

programme.title: A Haunting: Blood Visions
programme.desc: Faced with a supernatural threat, Betty Johnson and her family move hoping to leave their troubles behind. But when Betty’s oldest child starts experiencing bloody visions and is physically attacked, the family realizes "it" has followed them.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Wheatsheaf Horror
programme.desc: New owners of the Wheatsheaf Pub find bits of clothing and bones behind the walls.

programme.title: A Haunting: A Haunting in Florida
programme.desc: Ed, Beth and their toddler soon learn they are not alone at their ranch house.

programme.title: A Haunting: Bewitched
programme.desc: All appears to be on track when Sidney moves his pregnant girlfriend into the home he shares with his mother. But their happiness is suddenly shattered when an ex-friend is trying to tear the couple apart through witchcraft and has endangered everyone.

programme.title: A Haunting: Immortal Love
programme.desc: Shortly after Whitney's family moving into their first home, a restless spirit shatters the serenity of their suburban life. Whitney calls in a paranormal team who uncover the truth behind the spirit's tragic death and his intense obsession with Whitney.

programme.title: A Haunting: Evil Rises
programme.desc: After a major surgery forces Jacinda Rearick to recuperate at home, she discovers orbs in family photos. At first, Jacinda believes that they are her deceased parents watching over her. But something much more sinister is invading her home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Conjuring Evil
programme.desc: Harold and Cindy have found the perfect retreat in suburban Alaska for their family. But after their daughter begins to experiment in witchcraft, she unknowingly attracts the attention of a dark entity. Harold calls in experts to help reclaim the home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Hidden Terror
programme.desc: After Mike and Lisa move in their new house, Lisa’s personality begins to change dramatically.

channel.desc: The terrifying 'true' stories of the paranormal told by the people who experienced them. Watch, as the mystery and origin of each haunting unravels. By the end, you will be left with the sense that life and death are far stranger than you ever imagined.

programme.title: Medium: Wicked Game - Part 2
programme.desc: A shocking and brutal conclusion awaits Allison and Cynthia as they delve into the decade-old case of the kidnapping and murder of Cynthia's daughter.

programme.title: Medium: Lady Killer
programme.desc: As Allison teams up with Scanlon to track down the dangerous cougar they believe is responsible for the murders of young men, she also has visions that Devalos' campaign is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Medium: Partners In Crime
programme.desc: When Joe presents his new solar power-based invention to an investment firm, he piques the interest of venture capitalist Meghan Doyle.

programme.title: Medium: A Cure For What Ails You
programme.sub-title: A Cure For What Ails You
programme.desc: Allison has visions of a friend of Scanlon and Lynn DiNovi dying in a home mishap.

programme.title: Medium: Car Trouble

programme.title: Medium: Being Joey Carmichael
programme.desc: Allison has dreams that help Scanlon in his search to find out who killed a wealthy local drug dealer.

programme.title: Medium: Drowned World
programme.desc: In the fourth season finale, Allison tries to help a young couple who thinks their house is haunted, but her efforts result in murder.

programme.title: Medium: Pilot
programme.desc: Allison, a pre-law student, and mother of three discover that she is able to help the helpless, but not by using her law books.

programme.title: Medium: Suspicions and Certainties
programme.desc: Desperate to convict a serial killer Devalos calls in Allison to help with the jury, giving her the opportunity to prove herself.

programme.title: Medium: Night of the Wolf
programme.desc: Allison is convinced that a witness has given a bogus description of the man who killed to fiance and is determined to track down the real killer.

programme.title: Medium: Coming Soon
programme.desc: Allison's powers heighten when she finds herself able to not only see the past, but also to see the future.

programme.title: Medium: The Other Side of the Tracks
programme.sub-title: The Other Side of the Tracks
programme.desc: A reoccurring dream keeps Allison from getting sleep and begins to interfere with her life and her job.

programme.title: Medium: In Sickness & In Adultery
programme.desc: Allison is convinced Joe is having an affair while at the same time Devalos asks Allison to lie under oath for him.

programme.title: Medium: Lucky
programme.desc: Allison is disturbed when she has a dream about the death of her step-brother but is more concerned with his mental health when he shows up on her doorstep.

programme.title: Medium: Jump Start
programme.desc: Allison finds herself drawn to a cliff only to discover the body of a dead girl and learns that the only suspect is another lawyer.

programme.title: Medium: A Couple of Choices
programme.desc: Allison helps a detective solve a cluster of investigations that everyone believes are murder-suicides, but he believes are homicides.

channel.desc: Suburban mum Allison DuBois attempts to balance family life with solving mysteries using her special gift: the dead send her visions of their deaths or other crimes while she sleeps.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 9
programme.desc: A seven car motorway pile-up leaves a local council's waste truck in trouble. Fluff does his best to shift one of the heaviest loads his vehicle can lift. Meanwhile, Fluff's girlfriend Marta is called to a stranded truck in a quarry.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 10
programme.desc: A burnt out van abandoned on an isolated towpath presents a serious challenge for Steve and Marta, but the solution comes in the form of a bespoke, bright yellow rescue truck.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 1
programme.desc: A 44 tonne Artic straddling the central reservation of the M1 is a rush hour headache for Incident Manager Steve and his colleague Pat. Recovery op Steve rescues a broken down dustcart from a busy London street. Recovery op Jim gets drenched as he risks l

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 3
programme.desc: Things are far from simple for the recovery crews this week. When a loaded HGV suffers a puncture on a busy motorway, Crouch recovery op Jim Howard and heavy vehicle mechanic Jack Watson, are called to the scene.

programme.title: Trucking Hell
programme.desc: A digger has fallen off the back of a lorry and rolled over on its side - blocking one side of a busy A road. Richard Crouch and recovery op Lee Brown have a hay bale of a time trying to get a valuable straw load on a broken down trailer back safely to it

programme.title: Trucking Hell
programme.desc: At Crouch HQ, there is excitement in the air as the team help to make trucking superfan Chris's wedding day extra special. Snod is called to recover two crashed cars from the side of the M69 - the exact stretch of road that his friend was killed on while

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 6
programme.desc: Dave and Adam are under pressure to recover a 100 tonne train engine before it sinks into the soft ground. Jim has to rescue a lorry that has become stuck in a ditch.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 8
programme.desc: A luxury coach gives up the ghost on a busy motorway slip road. A straightforward job segues into disaster for Marta. Scott races to recover a damaged trailer before dark descends.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 9
programme.desc: Jim must rescue a 32-tonne truck from a soft dirt embankment. Chris manouevres a skip lorry out of city centre traffic. Marta is driven around the bend trying to deliver a 48-foot articulated bus.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 10
programme.desc: A recycling plant needs two old portable cabins swapped out for new ones, making for some serious heavy lifting for Nick. Jim sees to an old Toyota abandoned in a live lane on the M1.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 11
programme.desc: Jim and his team face a difficult foggy morning on the M1 when a crash between two artics causes a five-mile-long tailback.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 12
programme.desc: Veteran driver Jim attends an emergency call-out to recover a lorry that has broken down bang in the middle of a busy ring road. Motor racing fanatic Merrie has a hunch she may have landed her dream job when she attends a broken down lorry.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 13
programme.desc: Steve and the team find themselves in deep water when they attempt to recover a car that has crashed into a river. Jim is tasked with recovering a van that has become wedged on top of a garden wall.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 14
programme.desc: Steve battles rush hour traffic to manoeuvre his recovery vehicle around the narrow roads to get to a 7.5-tonne lorry out of a ditch, while Rory must deliver a dodgy van to a scrapyard for destruction.

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 15
programme.desc: Lantern's only female driver Merrie is tasked with the removal of an abandoned lorry, but it is soon clear this will not be a routine job. As she takes a closer look, she discovers that not only has the lorry been used as a mobile home, but that it is hou

programme.title: Trucking Hell: Episode 16
programme.desc: Rory risks life and limb to recovered a skip lorry from the M1. Jim has a happy reunion with his own truck. Chris has to find a way of separating two HGVs that have somehow become wedged together.

channel.desc: A documentary series following rescue drivers working for two of the UK's leading heavy rescue specialists. We follow the work of the drivers as they endeavor to solve the problems caused by large and heavy vehicles.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 2
programme.desc: On the way to Omashu, the kids meet some nomads who show them a shortcut through the `cave of two lovers'. When they get lost in the caves, they must trust in love to escape.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 3
programme.desc: The kids return to Omashu so that Aang can learn Earthbending from King Bumi; however, when they get there, they are shocked to find the city is now in Fire Nation hands.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 4
programme.desc: When the kids end up in a mysterious and strange swamp, their fears are exposed. And Aang learns about being `connected to the Earth' from an unlikely teacher.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 5
programme.desc: Aang and the gang discover an Earth town that celebrates `Avatar Day'. They learn that it is not a celebration of the Avatar, but a festival of anger for something Aang did in his past.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 6
programme.desc: In search for an Earthbending teacher for Aang, the kids go to an underground Earthbending tournament where they encounter Toph, a blind, but powerful Earthbender.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 7
programme.desc: Travelling without Uncle now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy. Meanwhile, Zuko is haunted by memories of his own youth.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 8
programme.desc: As the kids are pursued relentlessly by a mysterious machine, their exhaustion puts them at each other's throats.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 9
programme.desc: When Aang struggles with a block while trying to learn Earthbending from Toph, he wonders if the problem is with him or his teacher. Meanwhile, Sokka gets himself in a jam.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 10
programme.desc: A professor leads the kids to a spirit library in the middle of the desert, where Sokka hopes to discover powerful secrets to use against the Fire Nation.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 11
programme.desc: Aang searches for Appa, while Katara struggles to keep everyone together so they can survive in the vast desert. Meanwhile, Uncle and Zuko seek help from an ancient secret society.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 12
programme.desc: When the kids can't take the easy way into Ba Sing Se, they must escort a family of refugees there the hard way, through the deadly Serpent's Pass.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 13
programme.desc: Aang discovers a colossal Fire Nation invention heading for Ba Sing Se, and the kids must stop it before it destroys the great wall that protects the city.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 14
programme.desc: Aang and the kids finally arrive in Ba Sing Se to see the Earth King, only to find mysterious forces within the city conspiring to stop them.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 15
programme.desc: A series of short stories that explore the individual adventures of Katara and Toph, Uncle, Sokka, Aang, Zuko, and Momo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 16
programme.desc: In this special episode, we go back in time to the moment Appa was stolen.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 17
programme.desc: While searching for Appa, the kids run into Jet but are torn about whether to trust him or not. Meanwhile, Zuko also hunts for Appa.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 18
programme.desc: The kids battle Long Feng when they try to show the Earth King the conspiracy taking place in his city. Zuko becomes seriously ill and has odd dreams as he faces a spiritual crisis.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 19
programme.desc: A guru at the Eastern Air Temple helps Aang take the next step in his Avatar journey. Plus, Sokka meets his long-lost father, Azula hatches a diabolical plan, and Uncle and Zuko open a tea shop.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 20
programme.desc: Everyone races against time to stop Azula's sinister conquest of Ba Sing Se. Zuko and Katara spend time together, while Aang's destiny hangs in the balance, as does Zuko's.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 1
programme.desc: After sustaining serious injuries, Aang awakens to find himself aboard a Fire Nation ship. Meanwhile, Zuko journeys home.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 2
programme.desc: To better camouflage themselves as real Fire Nation citizens, the kids check out a Fire Nation school. Also, Zuko confronts Uncle.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 3
programme.desc: The gang arrive at a suffering Fire Nation fishing village, and a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 4
programme.desc: Sokka feels that he is not contributing enough to the group, and searches for a mysterious master to teach him the ways of the sword.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 5
programme.desc: Zuko, Azula, Mai, and Ty Lee go on vacation at Lo and Li's beach house, where they learn a lot about themselves and each other. Meanwhile, the kids face a new enemy.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 6
programme.desc: Aang and Zuko are taken on parallel adventures that give them insight into their forefathers' pasts, but how does the tale of Roku and Sozin matter to them now?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 7
programme.desc: When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 8
programme.desc: In a spooky village, Katara makes a special connection; the group investigate strange disappearances that occur during full moons.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 9
programme.desc: On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's worry overtakes him and his dreams become nightmares. Before long, he can't tell the difference between what's real and what's not.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 10
programme.desc: With the day of the eclipse upon them, the kids, along with a ragtag force of old friends, enact their long-planned invasion of the Fire Nation.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Ep 11
programme.desc: As the invasion force fights their way to the Fire Nation capital, the kids help Aang find the Firelord in time for the eclipse, but after a few surprises.

channel.desc: The world is divided into four elemental nations. The Avatar upholds the balance, but when the Fire Nation invaded, he vanishes. A hundred years later, Katara and Sokka discover the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Shredder's New Sword
programme.desc: In Dimension X Krang is using a long-range scanner and discovers a rare metal buried in a ruined castle in England. The metal turns out to be King Arthur's legendary sword, Excalibur.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Lost Queen of Atlantis
programme.desc: Shredder, Rocksteady and Bebop are searching for a valuable energy source in Athens and discover that it is April's new necklace.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Turtles on the Orient Express
programme.desc: April is covering the revival of the Orient Express. Shredder is on the train with Rocksteady and Bebop carrying the supercharger, a device to accelerate the train to super speed.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): April Gets in Dutch
programme.desc: April is covering the showing of the world-famed Duchess Diamond. Krang wants the diamond, a flawless stone, to focus the rays on his laser dimension blade.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Northern Lights Out
programme.desc: Eric Red seizes both April and Professor Swenson's map to the underground volcanoes in Scandinavia to tap into the molten energy and melt the polar ice caps.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Elementary, My Dear Turtle
programme.desc: The Turtles are in England, when they are taken back to the past, via an experimental atomic clock and must team up with Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson in order to get the clock back and return to the present.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Night of the Dark Turtle
programme.desc: When Donatello receives a jolt of electrical energy, he undergoes a radical personality transformation, turning into 'The Dark Turtle', a psychotic caped crimefighter on a mission of revenge against Shredder!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Starchild
programme.desc: The Turtles face a crisis of galactic proportions when they must play babysitter to an alien infant with incredible powers.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Legend of Koji
programme.desc: The Turtles take an incredible trip back in time when they follow Shredder back to 16th Century Japan, where they join forces with Splinter's ancestor, the youthful samurai koji, and help him found the Foot Clan.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Convicts from Dimension X
programme.desc: Donatello, tinkering with his InterDimensional Early Warning System device, accidently frees two vicious convicts from their maximum security cell on Dimension X, bringing them to earth.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): White Belt, Black Heart
programme.desc: Splinter's ancient sensei, Master Mogo-San, arrives from Japan, seeking to find his grandson, to hand him a precious family heirloom - a sacred white ninja belt.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Night of the Rogues
programme.desc: Determined to stop the turtles once and for all, Shredder enlists some of the most memorable villains from past episodes into an army of 'rogues'!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Attack of the Neutrinos
programme.desc: When Krang captures the Neutrino's, he subjects the fun-loving, hot-rodding teenagers from Dimension X to a brain treatment which turns them evil!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Escape from the Planet of the Turtleoids
programme.sub-title: Escape from the Planet of the Turtleoids
programme.desc: The Turtles must once again help their Turtleoid friend Kurma defend the planet Shellri-La from alien invaders.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Revenge of the Fly
programme.desc: When Baxter Stockman, AKA the Fly, gets his pincers on some of Krang and Shredder's mutagen, he uses it to start turning everyone in the city into giant hideous mutant insects!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Atlantis Awakes
programme.desc: The Turtles join forces with Merdude, a strange fish-creature, and journey with him to the fabulous underwater city of Atlantis.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Dirk Savage: Mutant Hunter
programme.desc: When eccentric zillionaire A.J. Howard hires Dirk Savage, a professional mercenary, to rid the city of its 'mutant problem', the first mutants he goes after are the Turtles!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Invasion of the Krangazoids
programme.desc: It's trouble for the Turtles when Krang makes five clones of himself and sends them up to do his bidding in the city.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Combat Land
programme.desc: The Turtles are invited to be the first guests at combat Land, an amusement park where visitors fight a wide variety of robotic warriors from various historical eras.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Shredder Triumphant!
programme.desc: The Turtles face their greatest challenge ever when they become trapped in Dimension X--while Shredder and Krang bring the Technodrome out of the ocean depths and at last conquer the city!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Get Shredder!
programme.desc: Shredder & Krang are still loose on Earth, but without the resources of the Technodrome, they plan to steal equipment from the abandoned Hall of Science at the World Fair.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Wrath of the Rat King
programme.desc: Burne has created a hot line for callers to use should they spot those responsible for the destruction of the Channel Six News Building. Inside the Hall of Science, Shredder is fearful that the Turtles will eventually find a way into the building.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Cyber-Turtles
programme.desc: While investigating the theft of a rare telescope, the Astro-Viewer, the Turtles discover odd tracks leading away from the National Space Exploration Centre.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): State of Shock
programme.desc: After defeating a mysterious group of ninjas at the Emeryville Power Station, the Turtles decode part of a map that they were able to liberate from the would-be thieves.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Cry H.A.V.O.C.!
programme.desc: The Turtles get the drop on masked thieves hijacking a jewellery store, only to have themselves arrested for the crime! Before the turtles can be booked, they are rescued by the mutants Amok and Overdrive.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): H.A.V.O.C. in the Streets!
programme.desc: Titanus sends of couple of his H.A.V.O.C.mutants to bust into the aerospace plant and steal some much needed equipment. Only problem is that the Turtles were waiting for them.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Enter: Krakus
programme.desc: Krakus, a cop from the future, arrives and thinking that the Turtles are in league with Titanus, shakes them down for information.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Turtle Trek
programme.desc: Krang activates his new dimensional portal, thanks to Shredder's installation of the Energy Transmitter at the Power Relay Station, giving him access to Dimension X.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): The Unknown Ninja
programme.desc: While watching video tapes of old battles, Raphael sees a mystery person spying on them. While the Turtles investigate, an alien warlord named Dregg sends his TechnoGansters to steal all the gold on Earth.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (1987): Dregg of the Earth
programme.desc: April contacts the Turtles to let them know that Dregg has landed on Earth and is preparing a press conference. The Turtles rush to meet April at the Park, where they hear Dregg announce his intentions and offers the world his molecular converter.

channel.desc: Cowabunga! Straight from the sewers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are here and ready to take on alien and mutant enemies alike. Grab some pizza and get ready for maximum Turtle Power! This is TOTALLY TURTLES on Pluto TV!

programme.title: Riptide: Oil Bets Are Off
programme.desc: When an oil magnet is murdered and the police aren't doing much about it, the Riptide agency is off to get some answers for the daughter of the deceased.

programme.title: Riptide: Girls Night Out
programme.desc: Two suburban women who owe money to a lone shark are forced to become burglars to pay him back.

programme.title: Riptide: Polly Want An Explanation
programme.desc: The Riptide agency, a wannabe-FBI agent, trouble prone con man Mack McPherson and his parrot all get in trouble with organized crime.

programme.title: Riptide: The Twisted Cross
programme.desc: A woman hires the guys to help her see her son whom her ex husband refuses to let her. They learn that the father is teaching his son to be a Nazi.

programme.title: Riptide: Fuzzy Vision
programme.desc: After the Riptide breaks down, the boys end up in a weird little town where a woman who can see into the future is suspected of murder.

programme.title: Riptide: Arrivederci, Baby
programme.desc: Nick "the pilot, Cody " the mustache" and Bozo "the docter" help Murray's Italian friend Angelo Guirilini, when his son is badly wounded.

programme.title: Riptide: Harmony And Grits
programme.desc: A seminar about harmony and communucation leads -apart from a fistfight and a bunch of arguments- to a concerned wife who's afraid her husband is having an affair.

programme.title: Riptide: Wipe Out
programme.desc: A so-called accident that took the life of a young surfer in 1964, causes repercussions today.

programme.title: Riptide: Thirty-Six Hours Till Dawn
programme.desc: Luitenant Quinlan and his superiors hire the Riptide Agency to pick up a female witness, ready to testify against her crooked husband.

programme.title: Riptide: Does Not Compute
programme.desc: When somebody is using computers to destroy the reputation of a congressman with controversial ideas, our private investigators decide to help out.

programme.title: Riptide: The Bargain Department
programme.desc: Following the notice from their insurance agent that the agency's bond has been canceled, a high-profile security company offers to buy the Riptide Detective Agency.

programme.title: Riptide: Who Really Watches The Sunset?
programme.desc: A reporter who only has six months to live, hires the Riptide Agency to find out who killed her.

programme.title: Riptide: Still Goin' Steady
programme.desc: Murray has been appearing on a game show, 'Brain Basher'.

programme.title: Riptide: Robin And Marian
programme.desc: When a guy who pretends to be Robin Hood robs almost everyone in king harbor, he accidently takes engraving plates for a counterfeiting scheme.

programme.title: Riptide: Requiem For Icarus
programme.desc: Nick reacquaints with an old buddy who he hasn't seen or heard from in five years.

channel.desc: The cases of a private investigations agency run by two Vietnam War veterans and their computer geek friend from high school, armed with toughness, their own helicopter, and the third's technical ability.

programme.title: Kim's Convenience: Sneak Attack
programme.desc: Appa and Umma learn that selling illegal face cream has a downside. Janet adopts an alternate identity to get into a film festival.

programme.title: Mr. D: Staff Hangover
programme.desc: Morning assembly reveals the Xavier staff in rough shape. Last night’s staff party went late and got messy.

programme.title: Mr. D: President Jimmy
programme.desc: Gerry becomes unexpectedly embroiled in the school’s student council election and is forced to seek the help of an old foe.

programme.title: Mr. D: Callaghan’s Daughter
programme.desc: Callaghan’s daughter is in town visiting, and after seeing her old graduation photo, Gerry wants take her out on a date.

programme.title: Mr. D: Dating Maya Student
programme.desc: Gerry’s former pupil, Maya is back at Xavier as a student teacher and Gerry is having difficulty accepting her as an adult.

programme.title: Mr. D: Short Stocked
programme.desc: Gerry and Bill’s house they rent is up for sale and Gerry uses the advice of a market-savvy student raise enough money for a down payment.

programme.title: Mr. D: Corporal Punishment
programme.desc: Gerry’s father Francis visits Xavier, and Gerry decides to take a page from his father’s book when dealing with an insubordinate student.

programme.title: Mr. D: Lockdown
programme.desc: After encountering an attractive police officer during a lockdown drill, Gerry is determined to see her again.

programme.title: Mr. D: Gerry’s Kid
programme.desc: Gerry bumps into an old fling and her daughter and becomes convinced he’s met the child he never knew he had.

programme.title: Mr. D: Teacher Conference
programme.desc: Gerry meets an attractive woman at Barrel’s and drags Lisa with him to a teacher conference in Atlantic City to find her.

programme.title: Mr. D: Coaching Prospects
programme.desc: Gerry’s star player is being scouted by Syracuse University, and Gerry wants to come along as part of a package deal.

programme.title: Mr. D: Bizarro
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening at Xavier Academy. The day to day goings on of Gerry and the rest of the staff have been completely reversed.

programme.title: Mr. D: Coach of the Year
programme.desc: Gerry figures he’s a sure thing for the school’s Coach of the Year award after his team wins the city championship.

programme.title: Mr. D: Gerry’s Redemption
programme.desc: After losing his Xavier Academy job last season over the unfortunate Coach Keenan saga, Gerry finds himself subbing at a tough inner-city school.

programme.title: Mr. D: Educational Assistant
programme.desc: Gerry is assigned an educational assistant, Marty, who quickly becomes a new source of irritation in the classroom.

programme.title: Mr. D: Wrestling For Love
programme.desc: When Lisa asks Gerry to cover coaching duties for the upcoming wrestling tournament, Gerry promises to bring home two trophies.

programme.title: Mr. D: Gerry Runs A Sweatshop
programme.desc: Gerry hatches a new "get rich quick" scheme selling counterfeit One Direction merchandise when he learns the band is in town.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: The Bachelors
programme.desc: The annual birthdates episode. Every year, the ladies celebrate their collective birthday by fixing each other up on blind dates. This time it ends with more than one proposal.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: Comfort and Joy
programme.desc: Joy decides whether to marry Mitch, Simon, or Bob. Victoria’s new CGI movie proves challenging in ways she didn’t expect. Elka tries to bring film jobs to Cleveland.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: Fear and Loathing in Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: Fear and Loathing in Los Angeles
programme.desc: The ladies head to L.A. to meet Zed Simms, the creator of Victoria’s new TV show. Elka tries to convince Zed to move the production to Cleveland.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: Bossy Cups
programme.desc: Inspirational coffee sleeves encourage the women to try new things. Joy helps Victoria create lifestyle videos for her website. Melanie tries to install shelves without Frankie’s help.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: Naked and Afraid
programme.desc: Elka throws a party to sway the vote of a rival politician. Melanie tries to find out if their cute neighbor, Jack, saw her naked. Victoria has no idea what her new TV show is about.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: Tazed and Confused
programme.desc: Joy and Bob take Victoria for a ride-along to prepare for her detective role. Elka and Melanie battle Agnes and Mona in a game competition at Stormi’s.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: Out of Our Minds
programme.desc: Melanie and Jack try to spice up their relationship. Victoria becomes the spokesperson for a new vodka brand. Joy’s new hairstyle backfires when she meets Owen’s office crush.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: Cold In Cleveland: The Christmas Episode
programme.sub-title: Cold In Cleveland: The Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Mortified by an old Christmas movie she made, Victoria tries to get the rights from her ex-husband, Ernie Hudson. Melanie and Sally compete over decorations.

programme.title: Hot In Cleveland: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: Melanie enlists Joy’s help to convince Jenna to go to medical school. Victoria obsesses over a nude scene for her new show. Elka takes “Councilman for the Day,” Lance, under her wing.

programme.title: Key & Peele: Michael Jackson Halloween
programme.desc: Noah really gets into his Halloween costume, and white zombies attack.

programme.title: Key & Peele: Victory
programme.desc: Luther informs Mitt Romney who won the election, and a non-stop party refuses to stop.

programme.title: Key & Peele: Gangsta Standoff
programme.desc: Two gang rivals get inside each other's heads, and a police officer hones his act.

programme.title: Key & Peele: Manly Tears
programme.desc: A tough guy cries in front of his crew, and substitute teacher Mr. Nostrand does not play.

programme.title: Key & Peele: Dueling Hats
programme.desc: One man's bikini-clad woman is another man's mystery, and two friends step up their hat game.

programme.title: Key & Peele: Les Mis
programme.desc: Mr. Garvey clashes with students over club photos, and President Obama addresses the NSA scandal.

channel.desc: Funny AF is your home for the funniest comedians in the funniest shows. With iconic sitcoms, edgy sketch comedy, zany animation, and cult favorites, Funny AF is just that: Funny AF.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of a grad-student-turned escort, the officers discover a pattern of missing women. Since Gail fits the physical description of the victims, she is sent on an undercover sting at a high-end hotel

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time
programme.desc: After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case – bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are still reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues. When they discover that a laptop has been stolen containing sensitive information, they set out to tie up several of open cases

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Rules
programme.desc: Itʼs “back to basics” for 15 Division when Staff Sergeant Frank Best decides itʼs time for his officers to get back on track

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Every Man

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Alter Boys

programme.title: Law & Order: Precious

programme.title: Law & Order: Virtue
programme.desc: The squad has their work cut out when things get out of control.

programme.title: Law & Order: Scoundrels

programme.title: Law & Order: House Counsel

programme.title: Law & Order: Guardian

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Cleanser/Tanner

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Couch Cushion/Furry
programme.desc: While battling her addiction to eating couch cushions, Adele has destroyed 7 couches and 2 chairs. Meanwhile, Lauren is more comfortable in her fur suit than in her own skin.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Glass/Bleaches Skin

programme.sub-title: Married to a Doll/Picking My Scabs

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Supersized Alyson Mawunga swaps her colossal portions and sugary snacks with superskinny Nick Wood, who lives off caffeine drinks and little else.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: In the feeding clinic Louise Knox, queen of convenience food, meets Carly Pitman, who's so busy she never finds the time to eat.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Food hater Louise swaps diets with 39-year-old biker Eddie, who needs to change his diet before it's too late. And Anna Richardson gives up on perfection and accepts what she was born with.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Last year superskinny Gillian and supersize Phillipa entered the feeding clinic to help each other unlock their dysfunctional relationship with food. How are getting on?

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: A year ago, superskinny single Mum Kim weighed in at a shocking 6 stone 2. She was a seriously fussy under eater. And her BMI of 15.4 was one of the lowest Dr Jessen had ever seen.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: This week it’s non stop tears and tantrums as 21 stone 5lbs LouiseHayes is forced to swap her normal 5-6 course feasts for superskinny Josh Evans‘s diet which barely features a proper meal.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: This week it’s atale of twoAmy’s in the feeding clinic as Supersize Amy Green who tips the scales at a staggering 20 stone 8lbs swaps diets with Superskinny Amy Walsh who only weighs 7 stone 10.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: This week it’s war in the feeding clinic as Supersized meat addict 47 year old Dawn Grant goes into meltdown when 21 year old Superskinny calorie counting Charlene Sequiera refuses to eat her mountainous meals.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.sub-title: Janet and Tara vs Joanne and Keith

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Tonight it’s an emotional rollercoaster as Supersize cheese addict Stu Preston takes on Superskinny portion controller Alice Duran. At 27 stone 13lbs Stu is digging himself an early grave with a knife and fork and desperately needs help.

programme.desc: A six-year-old Chinese girl is rushed in with intermittent seizures, but with a language barrier, will the doctor find out what's wrong with her?

programme.desc: A fishing lure embedded in a man's face turns out to be the least of his problems; a pair of unconscious teen-aged mud-boggers are brought to the ER where dramatic family secrets are revealed during resuscitation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Bucket List
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Right Choice
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Big City Home
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: City Dreams
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Cottage Getaways
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Perfect Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Classic Homes Are Timeless
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Agents of Million Dollar Homes
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Glass House (Part 1)
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Glass House (Part 2)
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Palace Fit for a Princess (Part 1)
programme.sub-title: A Palace Fit for a Princess (Part 1)
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: A Palace Fit for a Princess (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Infinite View (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Infinite View (Part 2)
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sunset on the Patio (Part 1)
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sunset on the Patio (Part 2)
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sweet Home Belize (Part 1)
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Sweet Home Belize (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Nice Family Home (Part 1)
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Nice Family Home (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Clever Income (Part 1)
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Clever Income (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Open Concept (Part 1)
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Open Concept (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Big Investment (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: A Big Investment (Part 2)
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Magical Home (Part 1)
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Magical Home (Part 2)
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent: Income for a Rainy Day (Part 1)
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto.

channel.desc: From first-time homebuyers to experienced investors, TMDA has something for everyone, affording a peek into the sumptuous world of international luxury homeownership.

programme.desc: Cops gives viewers access into the daily lives and work of the men and women of law enforcement. Filmed on location, the groundbreaking series follows real officers on patrol as they conduct high-speed pursuits, wild arrests and dangerous police business.

programme.title: COPS: Beer Run
programme.desc: A carjacking results in a chase and a flipped vehicle. Suspects crash a truck after attempting to steal beer. A man attempts to swallow his drugs during a bust.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Pants Down, Hit the Ground
programme.sub-title: Cops Pants Down, Hit the Ground
programme.desc: A man learns a hard lesson about wearing his seatbelt, and police perform a traffic stop and uncover a sad man with a strange story.

programme.title: COPS: Pup and Rescue
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Four Felonies and a Flat Tire
programme.sub-title: Cops Four Felonies and a Flat Tire
programme.desc: A suspected car thief's claims of innocence are undermined by a video he shot of himself earlier that day, and the pursuit of a suspected drunk driver has a surprising end.

programme.title: COPS: Cops Two Doors Down
programme.desc: A deputy calls for backup when he's outnumbered, a former Marine damages his neighbors' property, and a husband and wife are separated after their vehicle is searched.
